title: PLATO Hand: Shaping Contact Behavior with Fingernails for Precise Manipulation
summary: We present the PLATO Hand, a dexterous robotic hand with a hybrid fingertip that embeds a rigid fingernail within a compliant pulp. This design shapes contact behavior to enable diverse interaction modes across a range of object geometries. We develop a strain-energy-based bending-indentation model to guide the fingertip design and to explain how guided contact preserves local indentation while suppressing global bending. Experimental results show that the proposed robotic hand design demonstrates improved pinching stability, enhanced force observability, and successful execution of edge-sensitive manipulation tasks, including paper singulation, card picking, and orange peeling. Together, these results show that coupling structured contact geometry with a force-motion transparent mechanism provides a principled, physically embodied approach to precise manipulation.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为PLATO Hand的灵巧机器人手，其混合指尖设计（刚性指甲嵌入柔性指肉）能适应不同形状物体，实现多种抓取模式。
AI.motivation: 现有机器人手在处理不同形状物体和执行精细操作时存在稳定性、力反馈和操纵精度不足的问题。
AI.method: 设计了一种混合指尖（刚性指甲嵌入柔性指肉），并开发了一个基于应变能的弯曲-压痕模型来指导设计。通过实验验证了该设计在抓取稳定性、力感知和精细操纵任务（如纸张分离、卡片拾取、橙子剥皮）上的性能。
AI.result: PLATO Hand在纸张分离、卡片拾取和橙子剥皮等任务中表现出更高的抓取稳定性、更强的力可观测性和成功率。
AI.conclusion: 将结构化的接触几何与力的运动透明机制相结合，为实现精确操纵提供了一种有原则、物理具身的方法。

title: A Framework for Combining Optimization-Based and Analytic Inverse Kinematics
summary: Analytic and optimization methods for solving inverse kinematics (IK) problems have been deeply studied throughout the history of robotics. The two strategies have complementary strengths and weaknesses, but developing a unified approach to take advantage of both methods has proved challenging. A key challenge faced by optimization approaches is the complicated nonlinear relationship between the joint angles and the end-effector pose. When this must be handled concurrently with additional nonconvex constraints like collision avoidance, optimization IK algorithms may suffer high failure rates. We present a new formulation for optimization IK that uses an analytic IK solution as a change of variables, and is fundamentally easier for optimizers to solve. We test our methodology on three popular solvers, representing three different paradigms for constrained nonlinear optimization. Extensive experimental comparisons demonstrate that our new formulation achieves higher success rates than the old formulation and baseline methods across various challenging IK problems, including collision avoidance, grasp selection, and humanoid stability.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种新的优化逆运动学（IK）问题的方法，通过将解析 IK 解用作变量替换，使得优化问题更易于求解，并在多项具有挑战性的 IK 问题中取得了比现有方法更高的成功率。
AI.motivation: 现有的 IK 求解方法（解析法和优化法）各有优劣，但尚未有统一的方法能结合两者的优势。尤其是优化法在处理关节角度与末端执行器位姿的复杂非线性关系以及碰撞避免等非凸约束时，容易失败。
AI.method: 提出了一种新的 IK 优化方法，该方法利用解析 IK 解作为变量替换，从而简化了优化问题。将此新方法应用于三种不同的约束非线性优化求解器，并进行了实验对比。
AI.result: 在碰撞避免、抓取选择和人形稳定性等具有挑战性的 IK 问题上，新方法相比于旧的优化方法和基线方法，在成功率方面得到了显著提升。
AI.conclusion: 通过将解析 IK 解作为变量替换，可以显著提高优化 IK 求解器的性能，使其更容易处理复杂的非线性关系和非凸约束，从而在各种实际的机器人应用中取得更好的效果。

title: Multi-Sensor Scheduling for Remote State Estimation over Wireless MIMO Fading Channels with Semantic Over-the-Air Aggregation
summary: In this work, we study multi-sensor scheduling for remote state estimation over wireless multiple-input multiple-output (MIMO) fading channels using a novel semantic over-the-air (SemOTA) aggregation approach. We first revisit Kalman filtering with conventional over-the-air (OTA) aggregation and highlight its transmit power limitations. To balance power efficiency and estimation performance, we formulate the scheduling task as a finite-horizon dynamic programming (DP) problem. By analyzing the structure of the optimal Q-function, we show that the resulting scheduling policy exhibits a semantic structure that adapts online to the estimation error covariance and channel variations. To obtain a practical solution, we derive a tractable upper bound on the Q-function via a positive semidefinite (PSD) cone decomposition, which enables an efficient approximate scheduling policy and a low-complexity remote estimation algorithm. Numerical results confirm that the proposed scheme outperforms existing methods in both estimation accuracy and power efficiency.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种新颖的语义空中（SemOTA）聚合方法，用于解决无线MIMO衰落信道下的多传感器远程状态估计调度问题。该方法通过动态规划优化调度策略，以平衡功率效率和估计性能，并在此基础上提出了一种可行的近似调度策略和低复杂度远程估计算法，在估计精度和功率效率方面均优于现有方法。
AI.motivation: 现有基于常规空中（OTA）聚合的卡尔曼滤波方法存在传输功率限制，研究旨在解决功率效率与估计性能之间的权衡问题。
AI.method: 将调度任务形式化为有限时域动态规划（DP）问题，通过分析最优Q函数结构，推导出具有语义结构且能在线适应估计误差协方差和信道变化的调度策略。通过正半定（PSD）锥分解推导Q函数的递减上界，实现高效的近似调度策略和低复杂度远程估计算法。
AI.result: 提出的SemOTA聚合方案在估计精度和功率效率方面均优于现有方法。
AI.conclusion: 本文提出的SemOTA聚合方法能够有效地解决无线MIMO衰落信道下的多传感器远程状态估计调度问题，实现了功率效率和估计性能的良好平衡，并且易于实现。

title: SIDeR: Semantic Identity Decoupling for Unrestricted Face Privacy
summary: With the deep integration of facial recognition into online banking, identity verification, and other networked services, achieving effective decoupling of identity information from visual representations during image storage and transmission has become a critical challenge for privacy protection. To address this issue, we propose SIDeR, a Semantic decoupling-driven framework for unrestricted face privacy protection. SIDeR decomposes a facial image into a machine-recognizable identity feature vector and a visually perceptible semantic appearance component. By leveraging semantic-guided recomposition in the latent space of a diffusion model, it generates visually anonymous adversarial faces while maintaining machine-level identity consistency. The framework incorporates momentum-driven unrestricted perturbation optimization and a semantic-visual balancing factor to synthesize multiple visually diverse, highly natural adversarial samples. Furthermore, for authorized access, the protected image can be restored to its original form when the correct password is provided. Extensive experiments on the CelebA-HQ and FFHQ datasets demonstrate that SIDeR achieves a 99% attack success rate in black-box scenarios and outperforms baseline methods by 41.28% in PSNR-based restoration quality.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为SIDeR的框架，通过将人脸图像分解为身份特征向量和视觉语义组件，利用扩散模型的潜在空间进行语义引导的重构，生成视觉上匿名但身份一致的对抗性人脸，并支持授权恢复。
AI.motivation: 随着人脸识别技术在网络银行、身份验证等服务中的广泛应用，如何在存储和传输图像时保护隐私，实现身份信息与视觉表示的分离，成为一个关键挑战。
AI.method: SIDeR框架将人脸图像分解为身份特征向量和视觉语义组件。利用扩散模型的潜在空间，通过语义引导的重构生成视觉匿名但身份一致的对抗性人脸。框架结合了动量驱动的无限制扰动优化和语义-视觉平衡因子来生成多样化且自然的对抗样本。此外，通过密码授权可以恢复原始图像。
AI.result: 在CelebA-HQ和FFHQ数据集上的实验表明，SIDeR在黑盒场景下实现了99%的攻击成功率，并且在基于PSNR的恢复质量上比基线方法提高了41.28%。
AI.conclusion: SIDeR框架能够有效地在保护隐私的同时，保持人脸的机器可识别性，并能通过授权恢复原始图像，在人脸图像隐私保护方面表现出色。

title: Smart Diagnosis and Early Intervention in PCOS: A Deep Learning Approach to Women's Reproductive Health
comment: 6 pages, 12 figures. This is the author's accepted manuscript of a paper accepted for publication in the Proceedings of the 16th International IEEE Conference on Computing, Communication and Networking Technologies (ICCCNT 2025). The final published version will be available via IEEE Xplore
summary: Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS) is a widespread disorder in women of reproductive age, characterized by a hormonal imbalance, irregular periods, and multiple ovarian cysts. Infertility, metabolic syndrome, and cardiovascular risks are long-term complications that make early detection essential. In this paper, we design a powerful framework based on transfer learning utilizing DenseNet201 and ResNet50 for classifying ovarian ultrasound images. The model was trained on an online dataset containing 3856 ultrasound images of cyst-infected and non-infected patients. Each ultrasound frame was resized to 224x224 pixels and encoded with precise pathological indicators. The MixUp and CutMix augmentation strategies were used to improve generalization, yielding a peak validation accuracy of 99.80% by Densenet201 and a validation loss of 0.617 with alpha values of 0.25 and 0.4, respectively. We evaluated the model's interpretability using leading Explainable AI (XAI) approaches such as SHAP, Grad-CAM, and LIME, reasoning with and presenting explicit visual reasons for the model's behaviors, therefore increasing the model's transparency. This study proposes an automated system for medical picture diagnosis that may be used effectively and confidently in clinical practice.

AI.tldr: 本研究使用迁移学习（DenseNet201和ResNet50）和数据增强技术（MixUp和CutMix）构建了一个用于卵巢超声图像分类的框架，以检测多囊卵巢综合征（PCOS）。结果显示DenseNet201达到了99.80%的验证准确率。此外，还采用了SHAP、Grad-CAM和LIME等可解释AI（XAI）技术来提高模型透明度。
AI.motivation: 多囊卵巢综合征（PCOS）是一种常见的妇科疾病，早期检测对于预防长期并发症（如不孕、代谢综合征和心血管风险）至关重要。需要一种高效、准确且可解释的自动诊断系统。
AI.method: 利用迁移学习，在DenseNet201和ResNet50模型上训练了一个卵巢超声图像分类框架。使用包含3856张图像的数据集，并将图像调整至224x224像素。应用MixUp和CutMix数据增强策略提高泛化能力。采用SHAP、Grad-CAM和LIME等XAI技术进行模型可解释性评估。
AI.result: DenseNet201模型在验证集上达到了99.80%的最高准确率，验证损失为0.617。XAI技术提供了模型决策的视觉解释，增加了透明度。
AI.conclusion: 该研究成功开发了一个基于迁移学习和数据增强的自动化PCOS卵巢超声图像诊断系统，该系统准确且具有可解释性，有望在临床实践中得到有效和自信的应用。

title: BioACE: An Automated Framework for Biomedical Answer and Citation Evaluations
summary: With the increasing use of large language models (LLMs) for generating answers to biomedical questions, it is crucial to evaluate the quality of the generated answers and the references provided to support the facts in the generated answers. Evaluation of text generated by LLMs remains a challenge for question answering, retrieval-augmented generation (RAG), summarization, and many other natural language processing tasks in the biomedical domain, due to the requirements of expert assessment to verify consistency with the scientific literature and complex medical terminology. In this work, we propose BioACE, an automated framework for evaluating biomedical answers and citations against the facts stated in the answers. The proposed BioACE framework considers multiple aspects, including completeness, correctness, precision, and recall, in relation to the ground-truth nuggets for answer evaluation. We developed automated approaches to evaluate each of the aforementioned aspects and performed extensive experiments to assess and analyze their correlation with human evaluations. In addition, we considered multiple existing approaches, such as natural language inference (NLI) and pre-trained language models and LLMs, to evaluate the quality of evidence provided to support the generated answers in the form of citations into biomedical literature. With the detailed experiments and analysis, we provide the best approaches for biomedical answer and citation evaluation as a part of BioACE (https://github.com/deepaknlp/BioACE) evaluation package.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一个名为BioACE的自动化框架，用于评估大型语言模型（LLM）生成的生物医学答案及其引用的质量，该框架考虑了完整性、正确性、精确率和召回率等多个方面，并与人工评估进行了相关性分析。研究还评估了多种现有方法在判断引用证据质量方面的有效性，并提供了最佳的评估方法。
AI.motivation: 随着LLM在生物医学问答中的广泛应用，评估生成答案及其支撑引用的质量变得至关重要。由于需要专家评估来验证与科学文献的一致性和处理复杂的医学术语，对LLM生成的文本进行评估在生物医学领域仍具挑战性。
AI.method: 提出了BioACE自动化框架，评估生物医学答案和引用的完整性、正确性、精确率和召回率，并与人工评估进行相关性分析。同时，研究人员评估了包括自然语言推理（NLI）和预训练语言模型/LLM在内的多种现有方法，以评估引用作为证据的质量。
AI.result: 开发了自动化方法来评估答案的各项质量指标，并进行了大量实验来评估这些指标与人工评估的相关性。研究还确定了在生物医学答案和引用评估方面的最佳方法。
AI.conclusion: BioACE框架提供了一种自动评估生物医学答案和引用的方法，通过考虑多个评估指标并与人工评估进行对比，为生物医学LLM的应用提供了重要的质量保障。研究结果有助于选择最有效的评估技术。

title: Differentiable Inverse Graphics for Zero-shot Scene Reconstruction and Robot Grasping
comment: Submitted to IEEE Robotics and Automation Letters (RA-L) for review. This version includes the statement required by IEEE for preprints
summary: Operating effectively in novel real-world environments requires robotic systems to estimate and interact with previously unseen objects. Current state-of-the-art models address this challenge by using large amounts of training data and test-time samples to build black-box scene representations. In this work, we introduce a differentiable neuro-graphics model that combines neural foundation models with physics-based differentiable rendering to perform zero-shot scene reconstruction and robot grasping without relying on any additional 3D data or test-time samples. Our model solves a series of constrained optimization problems to estimate physically consistent scene parameters, such as meshes, lighting conditions, material properties, and 6D poses of previously unseen objects from a single RGBD image and bounding boxes. We evaluated our approach on standard model-free few-shot benchmarks and demonstrated that it outperforms existing algorithms for model-free few-shot pose estimation. Furthermore, we validated the accuracy of our scene reconstructions by applying our algorithm to a zero-shot grasping task. By enabling zero-shot, physically-consistent scene reconstruction and grasping without reliance on extensive datasets or test-time sampling, our approach offers a pathway towards more data efficient, interpretable and generalizable robot autonomy in novel environments.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种可微分神经图形模型，结合了神经基础模型和基于物理的可微分渲染，实现了零样本场景重建和机器人抓取，无需额外的3D数据或测试时样本。
AI.motivation: 现有技术在处理新颖真实世界环境中的未知物体时，需要大量训练数据和测试时样本来构建场景表示。本研究旨在克服这一限制，实现更有效、可解释和可泛化的机器人自主性。
AI.method: 该模型通过解决一系列约束优化问题，从单个RGBD图像和边界框中估计物理上一致的场景参数（如网格、光照、材质和物体姿态），并结合了神经基础模型和基于物理的可微分渲染。
AI.result: 在模型无关的少样本位姿估计基准测试中，该方法优于现有算法。此外，在零样本抓取任务中验证了场景重建的准确性。
AI.conclusion: 该方法实现了零样本、物理上一致的场景重建和抓取，无需大量数据集或测试时采样，为实现更高效、可解释和可泛化的机器人自主性提供了新的途径。

title: Signal or 'Noise': Human Reactions to Robot Errors in the Wild
summary: In the real world, robots frequently make errors, yet little is known about people's social responses to errors outside of lab settings. Prior work has shown that social signals are reliable and useful for error management in constrained interactions, but it is unclear if this holds in the real world - especially with a non-social robot in repeated and group interactions with successive or propagated errors. To explore this, we built a coffee robot and conducted a public field deployment ($N = 49$). We found that participants consistently expressed varied social signals in response to errors and other stimuli, particularly during group interactions. Our findings suggest that social signals in the wild are rich (with participants volunteering information about the interaction), but "noisy." We discuss lessons, benefits, and challenges for using social signals in real-world HRI.

AI.tldr: 研究人员在公共场所部署了一台咖啡机器人，以了解人们在现实世界中与机器人错误互动的社会反应。他们发现，人们会发出各种各样的社会信号，尤其是在群体互动中，这些信号丰富但“嘈杂”，并讨论了在现实世界的人机交互（HRI）中使用这些信号的经验教训、益处和挑战。
AI.motivation: 现有研究主要集中在实验室环境中，对于人们在现实世界中对非社交机器人重复性或传播性错误如何做出社会反应知之甚少。
AI.method: 研究人员构建了一台咖啡机器人，并在公共场所进行了为期 N=49 人的现场部署实验。
AI.result: 参与者在机器人出现错误和其他刺激时，会持续发出各种社会信号，这种现象在群体互动中尤为明显。观察到的社会信号信息丰富（参与者会主动提供互动信息），但同时也存在“噪声”。
AI.conclusion: 在现实世界的 HRI 中，人们对机器人错误的社会反应是丰富但“嘈杂”的。研究提供了关于在现实环境中利用社会信号的经验教训、益处和挑战。

title: Artificial Intelligence as Strange Intelligence: Against Linear Models of Intelligence
summary: We endorse and expand upon Susan Schneider's critique of the linear model of AI progress and introduce two novel concepts: "familiar intelligence" and "strange intelligence". AI intelligence is likely to be strange intelligence, defying familiar patterns of ability and inability, combining superhuman capacities in some domains with subhuman performance in other domains, and even within domains sometimes combining superhuman insight with surprising errors that few humans would make. We develop and defend a nonlinear model of intelligence on which "general intelligence" is not a unified capacity but instead the ability to achieve a broad range of goals in a broad range of environments, in a manner that defies nonarbitrary reduction to a single linear quantity. We conclude with implications for adversarial testing approaches to evaluating AI capacities. If AI is strange intelligence, we should expect that even the most capable systems will sometimes fail in seemingly obvious tasks. On a nonlinear model of AI intelligence, such errors on their own do not demonstrate a system's lack of outstanding general intelligence. Conversely, excellent performance on one type of task, such as an IQ test, cannot warrant assumptions of broad capacities beyond that task domain.

AI.tldr: 本文批评了AI进步的线性模型，提出了“熟悉智能”和“奇异智能”的概念，认为AI更可能是奇异智能，即在某些领域超人，在另一些领域低于人类，甚至在同一领域也可能出现令人惊讶的错误。作者提出了一种非线性智能模型，认为通用智能并非单一能力，而是广泛环境下的广泛目标达成能力。最后，探讨了这对AI能力评估和对抗性测试的影响。
AI.motivation: 作者受到Susan Schneider对AI线性进步模型的批评的启发，旨在提出一个更符合AI实际发展模式的理论模型，并探讨其对AI评估方法的影响。
AI.method: 本文提出了“熟悉智能”和“奇异智能”两个新概念，并构建了一个非线性智能模型来解释通用智能。理论分析和逻辑论证是主要的研究方法。
AI.result: AI很可能表现为“奇异智能”，即能力分布不均衡，在某些方面远超人类，在另一些方面却可能犯低级错误。通用智能并非一个单一量化指标，而是在广泛环境中达成广泛目标的能力。这种非线性特性意味着，单一任务上的杰出表现或低级错误都不能完全定义AI的通用智能水平。
AI.conclusion: AI的奇异智能特性要求我们调整对AI能力的评估方式。对抗性测试应关注AI在不同领域和环境下的表现，避免过度依赖单一任务的表现来推断其整体智能水平，也不应因为AI在简单任务上出错就否定其高级智能。同样，在特定任务上的优异表现也不能保证其在其他领域的广泛能力。

title: Reinforcement Learning Enhancement Using Vector Semantic Representation and Symbolic Reasoning for Human-Centered Autonomous Emergency Braking
summary: The problem with existing camera-based Deep Reinforcement Learning approaches is twofold: they rarely integrate high-level scene context into the feature representation, and they rely on rigid, fixed reward functions. To address these challenges, this paper proposes a novel pipeline that produces a neuro-symbolic feature representation that encompasses semantic, spatial, and shape information, as well as spatially boosted features of dynamic entities in the scene, with an emphasis on safety-critical road users. It also proposes a Soft First-Order Logic (SFOL) reward function that balances human values via a symbolic reasoning module. Here, semantic and spatial predicates are extracted from segmentation maps and applied to linguistic rules to obtain reward weights. Quantitative experiments in the CARLA simulation environment show that the proposed neuro-symbolic representation and SFOL reward function improved policy robustness and safety-related performance metrics compared to baseline representations and reward formulations across varying traffic densities and occlusion levels. The findings demonstrate that integrating holistic representations and soft reasoning into Reinforcement Learning can support more context-aware and value-aligned decision-making for autonomous driving.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种结合神经符号学特征表示和软化一阶逻辑（SFOL）奖励函数的方法，用于改进基于摄像头的深度强化学习在自动驾驶中的安全性和鲁棒性，特别是在处理道路使用者时。
AI.motivation: 现有基于摄像头的深度强化学习方法在集成高层场景上下文和使用固定奖励函数方面存在不足，导致其在自动驾驶场景中的性能受限，尤其是在安全性方面。
AI.method: 提出了一种结合语义、空间和形状信息的神经符号学特征表示，并增强了动态实体（特别是安全关键的道路使用者）的空间特征。同时，设计了一种软化一阶逻辑（SFOL）奖励函数，通过符号推理模块从分割图中提取语义和空间谓词，并应用于语言规则以获得奖励权重，从而平衡人类价值观。
AI.result: 在CARLA模拟环境中进行的定量实验表明，与基线方法相比，所提出的神经符号学表示和SFOL奖励函数在不同的交通密度和遮挡水平下，显著提高了策略的鲁棒性和与安全相关的性能指标。
AI.conclusion: 将整体表示和软推理整合到强化学习中，可以支持自动驾驶中更具上下文感知能力和价值对齐的决策制定。

title: Learning Nonlinear Continuous-Time Systems for Formal Uncertainty Propagation and Probabilistic Evaluation
comment: 10 pages, 4 figures, to appear in ACM Int'l Conf. on Hybrid Systems: Computation and Control (HSCC), and ACM/IEEE Int'l Conference on Cyber-Physical Systems (ICCPS) 2026
summary: Nonlinear ordinary differential equations (ODEs) are powerful tools for modeling real-world dynamical systems. However, propagating initial state uncertainty through nonlinear dynamics, especially when the ODE is unknown and learned from data, remains a major challenge. This paper introduces a novel continuum dynamics perspective for model learning that enables formal uncertainty propagation by constructing Taylor series approximations of probabilistic events. We establish sufficient conditions for the soundness of the approach and prove its asymptotic convergence. Empirical results demonstrate the framework's effectiveness, particularly when predicting rare events.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种基于连续动力学视角和泰勒级数近似的方法，用于在未知非线性常微分方程模型中进行不确定性传播，尤其擅长预测罕见事件。
AI.motivation: 在学习未知非线性常微分方程模型时，准确传播初始状态的不确定性是一个重大挑战。
AI.method: 该研究引入了一种新的连续动力学视角，通过构建概率事件的泰勒级数近似来实现形式化的不确定性传播。
AI.result: 证明了该方法的健全性和渐近收敛性，并通过实验验证了其有效性，特别是在预测罕见事件方面。
AI.conclusion: 该框架为在学习到的非线性常微分方程模型中进行不确定性传播提供了一种新颖且有效的方法，尤其适用于处理罕见事件的预测。

title: UniTrack: Differentiable Graph Representation Learning for Multi-Object Tracking
summary: We present UniTrack, a plug-and-play graph-theoretic loss function designed to significantly enhance multi-object tracking (MOT) performance by directly optimizing tracking-specific objectives through unified differentiable learning. Unlike prior graph-based MOT methods that redesign tracking architectures, UniTrack provides a universal training objective that integrates detection accuracy, identity preservation, and spatiotemporal consistency into a single end-to-end trainable loss function, enabling seamless integration with existing MOT systems without architectural modifications. Through differentiable graph representation learning, UniTrack enables networks to learn holistic representations of motion continuity and identity relationships across frames. We validate UniTrack across diverse tracking models and multiple challenging benchmarks, demonstrating consistent improvements across all tested architectures and datasets including Trackformer, MOTR, FairMOT, ByteTrack, GTR, and MOTE. Extensive evaluations show up to 53\% reduction in identity switches and 12\% IDF1 improvements across challenging benchmarks, with GTR achieving peak performance gains of 9.7\% MOTA on SportsMOT.

AI.tldr: UniTrack 是一种即插即用的图论损失函数，通过统一的可微分学习直接优化跟踪目标，显著提升多目标跟踪（MOT）性能，无需修改现有跟踪器架构。
AI.motivation: 现有图论 MOT 方法通常需要重新设计跟踪器架构，而本文旨在提供一个通用的训练目标，可以无缝集成到现有 MOT 系统中，从而提升其性能。
AI.method: UniTrack 采用可微分图表示学习，将检测精度、身份保持和时空一致性整合到一个端到端的损失函数中，使网络能够学习跨帧的运动连续性和身份关系。它是一个即插即用的损失函数，无需修改现有跟踪器的架构。
AI.result: UniTrack 在 Trackformer、MOTR、FairMOT、ByteTrack、GTR 和 MOTE 等多种跟踪模型和多个具有挑战性的基准测试中均取得了持续改进。在极具挑战性的基准测试中，身份切换减少了 53%，IDF1 提高了 12%。在 SportsMOT 上，GTR 的 MOTA 提升了 9.7%，达到了峰值性能。
AI.conclusion: UniTrack 作为一种即插即用的图论损失函数，能够通过统一的可微分学习有效提升多目标跟踪性能，并且可以轻松集成到现有跟踪系统中，无需进行架构上的修改。

title: CoWork-X: Experience-Optimized Co-Evolution for Multi-Agent Collaboration System
summary: Large language models are enabling language-conditioned agents in interactive environments, but highly cooperative tasks often impose two simultaneous constraints: sub-second real-time coordination and sustained multi-episode adaptation under a strict online token budget. Existing approaches either rely on frequent in-episode reasoning that induces latency and timing jitter, or deliver post-episode improvements through unstructured text that is difficult to compile into reliable low-cost execution. We propose CoWork-X, an active co-evolution framework that casts peer collaboration as a closed-loop optimization problem across episodes, inspired by fast--slow memory separation. CoWork-X instantiates a Skill-Agent that executes via HTN (hierarchical task network)-based skill retrieval from a structured, interpretable, and compositional skill library, and a post-episode Co-Optimizer that performs patch-style skill consolidation with explicit budget constraints and drift regularization. Experiments in challenging Overcooked-AI-like realtime collaboration benchmarks demonstrate that CoWork-X achieves stable, cumulative performance gains while steadily reducing online latency and token usage.

AI.tldr: 本文提出CoWork-X框架，一种主动协同进化框架，用于解决大型语言模型在交互式环境中进行实时协同任务时面临的实时性、适应性和token预算限制问题。CoWork-X通过技能代理执行HTN技能检索，并通过后回合优化器进行技能整合，实现了性能的稳定提升和资源消耗的降低。
AI.motivation: 现有方法在处理实时协同任务时，要么引入延迟导致实时性不足，要么在回合后进行非结构化更新，难以高效执行。研究旨在克服这些限制，实现实时、高效且具有持续适应能力的语言模型代理。
AI.method: CoWork-X框架包含两个主要部分：1. 技能代理（Skill-Agent）：通过分层任务网络（HTN）从结构化的技能库中检索并执行技能。2. 后回合优化器（Co-Optimizer）：在回合结束后，对技能进行迭代式整合，并受到显式预算限制和漂移正则化的约束。
AI.result: 在Overcooked-AI等实时协同基准测试中，CoWork-X实现了稳定的、累积性的性能提升，同时在线延迟和token使用量稳步下降。
AI.conclusion: CoWork-X框架能够有效地解决大型语言模型在实时协同任务中的挑战，通过主动协同进化机制，实现了低延迟、低token消耗下的持续性能优化和适应性。

title: Informative Path Planning with Guaranteed Estimation Uncertainty
summary:
Environmental monitoring robots often need to reconstruct spatial fields (e.g., salinity, temperature, bathymetry) under tight distance and energy constraints. Classical boustrophedon lawnmower surveys provide geometric coverage guarantees but can waste effort by oversampling predictable regions. In contrast, informative path planning (IPP) methods leverage spatial correlations to reduce oversampling, yet typically offer no guarantees on reconstruction quality. This paper bridges these approaches by addressing informative path planning with guaranteed estimation uncertainty: computing the shortest path whose measurements ensure that the Gaussian-process (GP) posterior variance -- an intrinsic uncertainty measure that lower-bounds the mean-squared prediction error under the GP model -- falls below a user-specified threshold over the monitoring region.
  We propose a three-stage approach: (i) learn a GP model from available prior information; (ii) transform the learned GP kernel into binary coverage maps for each candidate sensing location, indicating which locations' uncertainty can be reduced below a specified target; and (iii) plan a near-shortest route whose combined coverage satisfies the global uncertainty constraint. To address heterogeneous phenomena, we incorporate a nonstationary kernel that captures spatially varying correlation structure, and we accommodate non-convex environments with obstacles. Algorithmically, we present methods with provable approximation guarantees for sensing-location selection and for the joint selection-and-routing problem under a travel budget. Experiments on real-world topographic data show that our planners meet the uncertainty target using fewer sensing locations and shorter travel distances than a recent baseline, and field experiments with bathymetry-mapping autonomous surface and underwater vehicles demonstrate real-world feasibility.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种信息路径规划方法，能够在满足高斯过程（GP）后验方差（即重建不确定性）阈值约束的情况下，计算出最短路径，以用于环境监测。该方法通过学习GP模型、生成覆盖图和规划路径三个阶段实现，并考虑了非平稳现象和障碍物环境。实验证明，该方法比现有基线能用更少的数据点和更短的路径实现目标不确定性。
AI.motivation: 现有环境监测方法要么在距离和能量受限的情况下提供几何覆盖但过度采样（如割草机路径），要么利用空间相关性减少过度采样但缺乏重建质量保证（如信息路径规划）。本研究旨在结合两者的优点，实现具有重建质量保证的信息路径规划。
AI.method: 采用三阶段方法：1. 从先验信息中学习高斯过程（GP）模型。2. 将GP核函数转化为二值覆盖图，指示每个候选传感位置能否将不确定性降低到目标阈值以下。3. 规划一条接近最短的路径，使其联合覆盖满足全局不确定性约束。引入非平稳核函数处理异质现象，并考虑带障碍物的非凸环境。算法上，对传感位置选择和带有旅行预算的联合选择与路由问题提出了具有可证明近似保证的方法。
AI.result: 实验表明，所提出的规划器在真实地形数据上，使用的传感位置更少，旅行距离更短，同时满足了不确定性目标。在真实世界的测深绘图自主水面和水下航行器现场实验中，证明了方法的实际可行性。
AI.conclusion: 该研究成功提出了一种信息路径规划方法，该方法能够以最短路径满足用户指定的高斯过程后验方差阈值，有效解决了环境监测中在资源受限情况下的不确定性保证问题。该方法在模拟和实际应用中均表现出优越性。

title: MINT: Minimal Information Neuro-Symbolic Tree for Objective-Driven Knowledge-Gap Reasoning and Active Elicitation
summary: Joint planning through language-based interactions is a key area of human-AI teaming. Planning problems in the open world often involve various aspects of incomplete information and unknowns, e.g., objects involved, human goals/intents -- thus leading to knowledge gaps in joint planning. We consider the problem of discovering optimal interaction strategies for AI agents to actively elicit human inputs in object-driven planning. To this end, we propose Minimal Information Neuro-Symbolic Tree (MINT) to reason about the impact of knowledge gaps and leverage self-play with MINT to optimize the AI agent's elicitation strategies and queries. More precisely, MINT builds a symbolic tree by making propositions of possible human-AI interactions and by consulting a neural planning policy to estimate the uncertainty in planning outcomes caused by remaining knowledge gaps. Finally, we leverage LLM to search and summarize MINT's reasoning process and curate a set of queries to optimally elicit human inputs for best planning performance. By considering a family of extended Markov decision processes with knowledge gaps, we analyze the return guarantee for a given MINT with active human elicitation. Our evaluation on three benchmarks involving unseen/unknown objects of increasing realism shows that MINT-based planning attains near-expert returns by issuing a limited number of questions per task while achieving significantly improved rewards and success rates.

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了一种名为 MINT（Minimal Information Neuro-Symbolic Tree）的方法，用于在信息不完整的开放世界中，通过与人类交互来优化 AI 代理的规划策略，以主动获取人类输入，从而弥补知识空白。
AI.motivation: 在开放世界中的联合规划任务中，由于信息不完整和未知因素（如物体、人类目标/意图），存在知识空白。AI 代理需要主动地从人类那里获取信息以弥补这些知识空白，并优化交互策略。
AI.method: 提出 MINT（Minimal Information Neuro-Symbolic Tree），通过构建一个符号树来表示可能的人类-AI 交互，并利用神经网络规划策略评估知识空白对规划结果的不确定性。结合 LLM 搜索和总结 MINT 的推理过程，生成最优的提问策略。将问题建模为带有知识空白的扩展马尔可夫决策过程，并分析 MINT 的回报保证。
AI.result: 在包含未知/未见物体且真实性递增的三种基准测试中，基于 MINT 的规划方法在发出有限数量的问题后，能够获得接近专家水平的回报，并显著提高了奖励和成功率。
AI.conclusion: MINT 是一种有效的方法，可以帮助 AI 代理在信息不完整的情况下，通过主动向人类提问来优化联合规划，从而获得更好的规划性能。

title: AI-Based Detection of In-Treatment Changes from Prostate MR-Linac Images
summary: Purpose: To investigate whether routinely acquired longitudinal MR-Linac images can be leveraged to characterize treatment-induced changes during radiotherapy, particularly subtle inter-fraction changes over short intervals (average of 2 days). Materials and Methods: This retrospective study included a series of 0.35T MR-Linac images from 761 patients. An artificial intelligence (deep learning) model was used to characterize treatment-induced changes by predicting the temporal order of paired images. The model was first trained with the images from the first and the last fractions (F1-FL), then with all pairs (All-pairs). Model performance was assessed using quantitative metrics (accuracy and AUC), compared to a radiologist's performance, and qualitative analyses - the saliency map evaluation to investigate affected anatomical regions. Input ablation experiments were performed to identify the anatomical regions altered by radiotherapy. The radiologist conducted an additional task on partial images reconstructed by saliency map regions, reporting observations as well. Quantitative image analysis was conducted to investigate the results from the model and the radiologist. Results: The F1-FL model yielded near-perfect performance (AUC of 0.99), significantly outperforming the radiologist. The All-pairs model yielded an AUC of 0.97. This performance reflects therapy-induced changes, supported by the performance correlation to fraction intervals, ablation tests and expert's interpretation. Primary regions driving the predictions were prostate, bladder, and pubic symphysis. Conclusion: The model accurately predicts temporal order of MR-Linac fractions and detects radiation-induced changes over one or a few days, including prostate and adjacent organ alterations confirmed by experts. This underscores MR-Linac's potential for advanced image analysis beyond image guidance.

AI.tldr: 研究利用AI（深度学习）模型，通过分析MR-Linac治疗过程中的MR图像，能够准确地预测图像的治疗顺序，并检测出治疗引起的细微的解剖结构变化，尤其是在短时间间隔内。
AI.motivation: 研究旨在探索是否能利用MR-Linac治疗过程中常规获取的纵向MR图像来表征放疗引起的治疗相关变化，特别是短时间内（平均2天）的微小分次间变化。
AI.method: 采用回顾性研究，使用761名患者的0.35T MR-Linac图像。利用深度学习模型预测成对图像的时间顺序，从而表征治疗引起的改变。模型分别在第一和最后一分次图像（F1-FL）以及所有分次图像对（All-pairs）上进行训练。通过准确率、AUC、显著性图谱、输入消融实验和放射科医师的评估来衡量模型性能。
AI.result: F1-FL模型取得了近乎完美的结果（AUC为0.99），显著优于放射科医师。All-pairs模型AUC为0.97。模型性能与分次间隔相关，并通过消融实验和专家解读得到支持。预测的主要驱动区域包括前列腺、膀胱和耻骨联合。
AI.conclusion: 该模型能够准确预测MR-Linac分次图像的时间顺序，并检测出治疗后一到几天的辐射诱导变化，包括前列腺和邻近器官的改变，且这些发现得到了专家的确认。这表明MR-Linac在超越图像引导的先进图像分析方面具有巨大潜力。

title: GPU-to-Grid: Voltage Regulation via GPU Utilization Control
summary: While the rapid expansion of data centers poses challenges for power grids, it also offers new opportunities as potentially flexible loads. Existing power system research often abstracts data centers as aggregate resources, while computer system research primarily focuses on optimizing GPU energy efficiency and largely ignores the grid impacts of optimized GPU power consumption. To bridge this gap, we develop a GPU-to-Grid framework that couples device-level GPU control with power system objectives. We study distribution-level voltage regulation enabled by flexibility in LLM inference, using batch size as a control knob that trades off the voltage impacts of GPU power consumption against inference latency and token throughput. We first formulate this problem as an optimization problem and then realize it as an online feedback optimization controller that leverages measurements from both the power grid and GPU systems. Our key insight is that reducing GPU power consumption alleviates violations of lower voltage limits, while increasing GPU power mitigates violations near upper voltage limits in distribution systems; this runs counter to the common belief that minimizing GPU power consumption is always beneficial to power grids.

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了一个GPU到电网（GPU-to-Grid）框架，旨在协调数据中心GPU的功耗与电网电压调控目标，并发现降低GPU功耗并非总是对电网有利。
AI.motivation: 数据中心的快速扩张给电网带来挑战，但也提供了灵活性。现有研究分别关注电网聚合资源和GPU能效优化，忽略了两者之间的联系。本研究旨在弥合这一差距。
AI.method: 提出GPU-to-Grid框架，将GPU功耗控制与电网目标耦合。利用大语言模型（LLM）推理的灵活性，以批处理大小（batch size）作为控制变量，权衡电压影响、推理延迟和吞吐量。将问题建模为优化问题，并实现一个在线反馈优化控制器，结合电网和GPU系统测量数据。
AI.result: 通过调整批处理大小，可以实现分布层级的电压调控。研究发现，降低GPU功耗可以缓解低电压限制违规，但增加GPU功耗可以缓解接近上限的电压限制违规，这与普遍认为降低GPU功耗总是对电网有利的看法相反。
AI.conclusion: GPU-to-Grid框架能够协调GPU功耗与电网电压调控，并揭示了GPU功耗与电网电压之间复杂的相互作用，挑战了单一地最小化GPU功耗对电网有益的观点。

title: DeepRead: Document Structure-Aware Reasoning to Enhance Agentic Search
summary: With the rapid progress of tool-using and agentic large language models (LLMs), Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) is evolving from one-shot, passive retrieval into multi-turn, decision-driven evidence acquisition. Despite strong results in open-domain settings, existing agentic search frameworks commonly treat long documents as flat collections of chunks, underutilizing document-native priors such as hierarchical organization and sequential discourse structure. We introduce DeepRead, a structure-aware, multi-turn document reasoning agent that explicitly operationalizes these priors for long-document question answering. DeepRead leverages LLM-based OCR model to convert PDFs into structured Markdown that preserves headings and paragraph boundaries. It then indexes documents at the paragraph level and assigns each paragraph a coordinate-style metadata key encoding its section identity and in-section order. Building on this representation, DeepRead equips the LLM with two complementary tools: a Retrieve tool that localizes relevant paragraphs while exposing their structural coordinates (with lightweight scanning context), and a ReadSection tool that enables contiguous, order-preserving reading within a specified section and paragraph range. Our experiments demonstrate that DeepRead achieves significant improvements over Search-o1-style agentic search in document question answering. The synergistic effect between retrieval and reading tools is also validated. Our fine-grained behavioral analysis reveals a reading and reasoning paradigm resembling human-like ``locate then read'' behavior.

AI.tldr: DeepRead 是一个结构感知、多轮文档推理代理，通过利用 PDF 文档的层级和顺序结构来改进长文档问答。它将 PDF 转换为结构化 Markdown，并在段落级别进行索引，使用坐标式元数据来编码结构信息。DeepRead 结合了检索工具和阅读节工具，能够定位相关段落并按顺序读取，在实验中显著优于现有的代理搜索方法。
AI.motivation: 现有的代理式搜索框架在处理长文档时，通常将其视为扁平的文本块集合，未能充分利用文档固有的层级组织和顺序话语结构等先验知识，导致信息获取效率低下。作者希望开发一种能够显式利用这些结构信息的代理，以提高长文档问答的性能。
AI.method: DeepRead 首先使用基于 LLM 的 OCR 模型将 PDF 转换为保留标题和段落边界的结构化 Markdown。然后，它在段落级别对文档进行索引，并为每个段落分配一个坐标式元数据键，该键编码了其所属的章节标识和在该章节内的顺序。在此基础上，DeepRead 提供了两个工具：一个检索工具，用于定位相关段落并暴露其结构坐标（带有轻量级扫描上下文）；一个阅读节工具，用于在指定章节和段落范围内进行连续、按顺序的阅读。
AI.result: DeepRead 在文档问答任务上显著优于现有的 Search-o1 风格的代理搜索方法。检索工具和阅读节工具之间的协同效应也得到了验证。细粒度的行为分析表明，DeepRead 的推理过程类似于人类的“定位然后阅读”的行为模式。
AI.conclusion: DeepRead 通过显式地利用文档的结构信息，克服了现有代理式搜索框架在处理长文档时的局限性，显著提高了问答性能。其提出的结构感知方法以及检索与阅读工具的结合，为未来的长文档信息处理和代理智能研究提供了新的方向。

title: Personalized White Matter Bundle Segmentation for Early Childhood
summary: White matter segmentation methods from diffusion magnetic resonance imaging range from streamline clustering-based approaches to bundle mask delineation, but none have proposed a pediatric-specific approach. We hypothesize that a deep learning model with a similar approach to TractSeg will improve similarity between an algorithm-generated mask and an expert-labeled ground truth. Given a cohort of 56 manually labelled white matter bundles, we take inspiration from TractSeg's 2D UNet architecture, and we modify inputs to match bundle definitions as determined by pediatric experts, evaluation to use k fold cross validation, the loss function to masked Dice loss. We evaluate Dice score, volume overlap, and volume overreach of 16 major regions of interest compared to the expert labeled dataset. To test whether our approach offers statistically significant improvements over TractSeg, we compare Dice voxels, volume overlap, and adjacency voxels with a Wilcoxon signed rank test followed by false discovery rate correction. We find statistical significance across all bundles for all metrics with one exception in volume overlap. After we run TractSeg and our model, we combine their output masks into a 60 label atlas to evaluate if TractSeg and our model combined can generate a robust, individualized atlas, and observe smoothed, continuous masks in cases that TractSeg did not produce an anatomically plausible output. With the improvement of white matter pathway segmentation masks, we can further understand neurodevelopment on a population level scale, and we can produce reliable estimates of individualized anatomy in pediatric white matter diseases and disorders.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种基于深度学习的儿科特异性白质分割方法，旨在改进儿科脑白质纤维束的分割精度，并验证其相较于TractSeg的优势，最终构建更可靠的儿科脑白质图谱。
AI.motivation: 现有白质分割方法缺乏针对儿科的特异性方法，儿科脑白质发育具有独特性，需要专门的模型来准确分割。
AI.method: 研究者借鉴TractSeg的2D UNet架构，修改输入以匹配儿科专家定义的脑白质束，采用k折交叉验证，损失函数为masked Dice loss。评估指标包括Dice score、volume overlap和volume overreach，并与TractSeg进行比较，使用Wilcoxon signed rank test和FDR校正进行统计学显著性检验。最后，将TractSeg和本文模型输出相结合，构建60个标签的图谱。
AI.result: 研究结果显示，本文提出的模型在所有度量指标上均与专家标注数据具有统计学上的显著性差异，其中volume overlap除外。将本文模型与TractSeg输出结合，能够生成更平滑、连续且解剖学上更合理的脑白质纤维束分割掩膜，尤其在TractSeg输出不理想的情况下。
AI.conclusion: 本文提出的深度学习模型能够显著提高儿科白质纤维束的分割精度，并优于TractSeg。结合两种模型输出的联合图谱能够生成更稳健、个体化的儿科脑白质图谱，有助于深入理解神经发育和为儿科白质疾病提供可靠的解剖学评估。

title: VISTA: Enhancing Visual Conditioning via Track-Following Preference Optimization in Vision-Language-Action Models
summary: Vision-Language-Action (VLA) models have demonstrated strong performance across a wide range of robotic manipulation tasks. Despite the success, extending large pretrained Vision-Language Models (VLMs) to the action space can induce vision-action misalignment, where action predictions exhibit weak dependence on the current visual state, leading to unreliable action outputs. In this work, we study VLA models through the lens of visual conditioning and empirically show that successful rollouts consistently exhibit stronger visual dependence than failed ones. Motivated by this observation, we propose a training framework that explicitly strengthens visual conditioning in VLA models. Our approach first aligns action prediction with visual input via preference optimization on a track-following surrogate task, and then transfers the enhanced alignment to instruction-following task through latent-space distillation during supervised finetuning. Without introducing architectural modifications or additional data collection, our method improves both visual conditioning and task performance for discrete OpenVLA, and further yields consistent gains when extended to the continuous OpenVLA-OFT setting. Project website: https://vista-vla.github.io/ .

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种新的训练框架，通过显式增强视觉条件来解决视觉-语言-动作（VLA）模型中的视觉-动作不匹配问题，从而提高机器人操作任务的性能。
AI.motivation: 现有VLA模型在将大型预训练VLM扩展到动作空间时，可能出现视觉-动作不匹配，导致动作预测对当前视觉状态的依赖性减弱，从而产生不可靠的动作输出。研究观察到成功执行的任务比失败的任务表现出更强的视觉依赖性，这促使研究者提出旨在加强视觉条件的方法。
AI.method: 该方法包括两个阶段：1. 通过在跟踪跟随（track-following）的代理任务上进行偏好优化，使动作预测与视觉输入对齐；2. 在监督微调过程中，通过潜在空间蒸馏将增强的对齐转移到指令跟随任务。该方法不引入架构修改或额外数据收集。
AI.result: 所提出的方法在离散的OpenVLA任务上提高了视觉条件和任务性能，并且在连续的OpenVLA-OFT设置中也取得了持续的提升。
AI.conclusion: 通过显式增强视觉条件，可以在不修改模型架构或收集额外数据的情况下，有效解决VLA模型中的视觉-动作不匹配问题，并提高其在机器人操作任务中的性能。

title: Capacity Constraints and the Multilingual Penalty for Lexical Disambiguation
summary: Multilingual language models (LMs) sometimes under-perform their monolingual counterparts, possibly due to capacity limitations. We quantify this ``multilingual penalty'' for lexical disambiguation--a task requiring precise semantic representations and contextualization mechanisms--using controlled datasets of human relatedness judgments for ambiguous words in both English and Spanish. Comparing monolingual and multilingual LMs from the same families, we find consistently reduced performance in multilingual LMs. We then explore three potential capacity constraints: representational (reduced embedding isotropy), attentional (reduced attention to disambiguating cues), and vocabulary-related (increased multi-token segmentation). Multilingual LMs show some evidence of all three limitations; moreover, these factors statistically account for the variance formerly attributed to a model's multilingual status. These findings suggest both that multilingual LMs do suffer from multiple capacity constraints, and that these constraints correlate with reduced disambiguation performance.

AI.tldr: 本研究量化了多语言语言模型（LMs）在词汇消歧任务上相对于单语LMs的“多语言惩罚”，并发现这种性能下降与模型容量限制（表示、注意力、词汇）有关。
AI.motivation: 研究人员注意到多语言LMs在性能上可能不如单语LMs，并试图量化这种“多语言惩罚”，特别是针对需要精确语义表示和上下文机制的词汇消歧任务。
AI.method: 使用控制过的人类相关性判断数据集，针对英语和西班牙语中的歧义词，比较了相同系列单语和多语言LMs在词汇消歧任务上的表现。研究了三种潜在的容量限制：表示（词嵌入各向同性降低）、注意力（对消歧线索的关注减少）和词汇（多词分割增加）。
AI.result: 研究一致发现多语言LMs在词汇消歧任务上表现出性能下降。同时，研究发现了所有三种容量限制的证据，并且这些因素可以统计上解释模型多语言性所带来的性能差异。
AI.conclusion: 多语言LMs确实受到多种容量限制的影响，并且这些限制与词汇消歧性能的降低相关。这些发现为理解和改进多语言LMs提供了方向。

title: MobileManiBench: Simplifying Model Verification for Mobile Manipulation
summary: Vision-language-action models have advanced robotic manipulation but remain constrained by reliance on the large, teleoperation-collected datasets dominated by the static, tabletop scenes. We propose a simulation-first framework to verify VLA architectures before real-world deployment and introduce MobileManiBench, a large-scale benchmark for mobile-based robotic manipulation. Built on NVIDIA Isaac Sim and powered by reinforcement learning, our pipeline autonomously generates diverse manipulation trajectories with rich annotations (language instructions, multi-view RGB-depth-segmentation images, synchronized object/robot states and actions). MobileManiBench features 2 mobile platforms (parallel-gripper and dexterous-hand robots), 2 synchronized cameras (head and right wrist), 630 objects in 20 categories, 5 skills (open, close, pull, push, pick) with over 100 tasks performed in 100 realistic scenes, yielding 300K trajectories. This design enables controlled, scalable studies of robot embodiments, sensing modalities, and policy architectures, accelerating research on data efficiency and generalization. We benchmark representative VLA models and report insights into perception, reasoning, and control in complex simulated environments.

AI.tldr: 提出一个模拟优先的框架和名为MobileManiBench的大规模基准，用于在真实部署前验证视觉-语言-动作（VLA）机器人模型，该框架能自动生成多样化的操作轨迹和丰富的注释。
AI.motivation: 现有VLA模型依赖于静态、桌面场景的远程操作数据集，限制了其在更广泛机器人操作任务中的应用。需要一种更高效、可扩展的方法来验证和改进VLA模型。
AI.method: 使用NVIDIA Isaac Sim和强化学习构建一个模拟流水线，自主生成带有语言指令、多视图图像、对象/机器人状态和动作注释的操作轨迹。构建MobileManiBench基准，包含两种机器人平台、两种摄像头、630个对象、5种技能和100个任务。
AI.result: MobileManiBench生成了300K条轨迹，支持对机器人本体、传感模态和策略架构进行可控、可扩展的研究。通过对代表性VLA模型的基准测试，获得了关于复杂模拟环境中感知、推理和控制的见解。
AI.conclusion: 模拟优先的框架和MobileManiBench基准能够加速VLA模型在数据效率和泛化性方面的研究，并为理解机器人在复杂环境中的行为提供有价值的见解。

title: Nonlinear Predictive Cost Adaptive Control of Pseudo-Linear Input-Output Models Using Polynomial, Fourier, and Cubic Spline Observables
summary: Control of nonlinear systems with high levels of uncertainty is practically relevant and theoretically challenging. This paper presents a numerical investigation of an adaptive nonlinear model predictive control (MPC) technique that relies entirely on online system identification without prior modeling, training, or data collection. In particular, the paper considers predictive cost adaptive control (PCAC), which is an extension of generalized predictive control. Nonlinear PCAC (NPCAC) uses recursive least squares (RLS) with subspace of information forgetting (SIFt) to identify a discrete-time, pseudo-linear, input-output model, which is used with iterative MPC for nonlinear receding-horizon optimization. The performance of NPCAC is illustrated using polynomial, Fourier, and cubic-spline basis functions.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种完全依赖于在线系统辨识的自适应非线性模型预测控制（MPC）技术，即预测成本自适应控制（PCAC），并使用多项式、傅里叶和三次样条基函数进行了性能验证。
AI.motivation: 控制具有高度不确定性的非线性系统在理论和实践中都具有挑战性。
AI.method: 采用预测成本自适应控制（PCAC），该方法是广义预测控制的扩展。非线性PCAC（NPCAC）使用带信息遗忘子空间的递归最小二乘法（RLS）来辨识离散时间、伪线性、输入-输出模型，并结合迭代MPC进行非线性递推优化。
AI.result: 通过使用多项式、傅里叶和三次样条基函数，展示了NPCAC在处理非线性系统时的性能。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的NPCAC技术能够完全通过在线系统辨识来控制非线性系统，无需先验模型、训练或数据收集。

title: Trojan Attacks on Neural Network Controllers for Robotic Systems
comment: Paper submitted to the 2026 IEEE Conference on Control Technology and Applications (CCTA)
summary: Neural network controllers are increasingly deployed in robotic systems for tasks such as trajectory tracking and pose stabilization. However, their reliance on potentially untrusted training pipelines or supply chains introduces significant security vulnerabilities. This paper investigates backdoor (Trojan) attacks against neural controllers, using a differential-drive mobile robot platform as a case study. In particular, assuming that the robot's tracking controller is implemented as a neural network, we design a lightweight, parallel Trojan network that can be embedded within the controller. This malicious module remains dormant during normal operation but, upon detecting a highly specific trigger condition defined by the robot's pose and goal parameters, compromises the primary controller's wheel velocity commands, resulting in undesired and potentially unsafe robot behaviours. We provide a proof-of-concept implementation of the proposed Trojan network, which is validated through simulation under two different attack scenarios. The results confirm the effectiveness of the proposed attack and demonstrate that neural network-based robotic control systems are subject to potentially critical security threats.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种针对基于神经网络的机器人控制器（以差速驱动移动机器人为例）的后门攻击方法，攻击者可以嵌入一个轻量级的特洛伊木马网络，在特定触发条件下操纵控制器输出，导致机器人行为异常。
AI.motivation: 神经网络控制器在机器人系统中越来越普及，但其训练过程或供应链可能存在安全漏洞，容易受到后门攻击，对机器人系统的安全性构成威胁。
AI.method: 研究人员设计了一个轻量级的并行特洛伊木马网络，该网络可以嵌入到机器人的神经网络控制器中。该特洛伊木马网络在检测到由机器人姿态和目标参数定义的特定触发条件时，会激活并操纵主控制器的轮速指令。
AI.result: 通过在模拟环境中针对两种不同的攻击场景进行了概念验证实现，结果表明该后门攻击有效，能够导致机器人产生非预期的、潜在不安全的行为。
AI.conclusion: 基于神经网络的机器人控制系统存在严重的安全威胁，即使是轻量级的后门攻击也可能导致关键功能被破坏，带来安全风险。

title: Food Portion Estimation: From Pixels to Calories
summary: Reliance on images for dietary assessment is an important strategy to accurately and conveniently monitor an individual's health, making it a vital mechanism in the prevention and care of chronic diseases and obesity. However, image-based dietary assessment suffers from estimating the three dimensional size of food from 2D image inputs. Many strategies have been devised to overcome this critical limitation such as the use of auxiliary inputs like depth maps, multi-view inputs, or model-based approaches such as template matching. Deep learning also helps bridge the gap by either using monocular images or combinations of the image and the auxillary inputs to precisely predict the output portion from the image input. In this paper, we explore the different strategies employed for accurate portion estimation.

AI.tldr: 本文综述了利用二维图像进行食物份量估计的现有策略，特别是深度学习方法，以克服食物三维尺寸估算的挑战。
AI.motivation: 图像在膳食评估中的应用对于准确便捷地监测个体健康至关重要，尤其是在慢性病和肥胖的预防和治疗方面。然而，基于图像的膳食评估在从二维图像估计食物三维尺寸方面存在困难，这促使了对更准确的份量估计策略的研究。
AI.method: 本文探讨了为实现准确份量估计而采用的各种策略，包括利用辅助输入（如深度图、多视图输入）以及基于模型的方法（如模板匹配）。此外，还介绍了深度学习方法，这些方法利用单目图像或图像与辅助输入的组合来精确预测输出份量。
AI.result: 文章未具体说明实验结果，而是侧重于对现有策略的分类和回顾。
AI.conclusion: 准确估计食物份量对于基于图像的膳食评估至关重要，并且已经开发了多种方法来解决这一挑战，包括利用辅助输入和深度学习技术。

title: Diffusion-aided Extreme Video Compression with Lightweight Semantics Guidance
summary: Modern video codecs and learning-based approaches struggle for semantic reconstruction at extremely low bit-rates due to reliance on low-level spatiotemporal redundancies. Generative models, especially diffusion models, offer a new paradigm for video compression by leveraging high-level semantic understanding and powerful visual synthesis. This paper propose a video compression framework that integrates generative priors to drastically reduce bit-rate while maintaining reconstruction fidelity. Specifically, our method compresses high-level semantic representations of the video, then uses a conditional diffusion model to reconstruct frames from these semantics. To further improve compression, we characterize motion information with global camera trajectories and foreground segmentation: background motion is compactly represented by camera pose parameters while foreground dynamics by sparse segmentation masks. This allows for significantly boosts compression efficiency, enabling descent video reconstruction at extremely low bit-rates.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种基于生成模型（特别是扩散模型）的视频压缩框架，通过压缩高层语义信息并利用扩散模型进行帧重建，同时将运动信息分解为全局相机轨迹和前景分割，以在极低比特率下实现有效的视频重建。
AI.motivation: 现有视频编解码器和基于学习的方法在极低比特率下难以进行语义重建，因为它们依赖于低级时空冗余。生成模型，特别是扩散模型，提供了一种新的视频压缩范式，可以利用高级语义理解和强大的视觉合成能力。
AI.method: 该方法压缩视频的高层语义表示，然后使用条件扩散模型从这些语义重建帧。为了进一步提高压缩效率，方法将运动信息分解为全局相机轨迹（用于背景运动）和前景分割（用于前景动态），分别通过相机姿态参数和稀疏分割掩码进行紧凑表示。
AI.result: 该框架能够显著提高压缩效率，实现在极低比特率下的视频重建。
AI.conclusion: 将生成模型（扩散模型）与语义表示和优化的运动信息表示相结合，可以极大地降低视频压缩的比特率，同时保持重建质量，为极低比特率视频压缩提供了一种有前景的方法。

title: Low-Cost Underwater In-Pipe Centering and Inspection Using a Minimal-Sensing Robot
summary: Autonomous underwater inspection of submerged pipelines is challenging due to confined geometries, turbidity, and the scarcity of reliable localization cues. This paper presents a minimal-sensing strategy that enables a free-swimming underwater robot to center itself and traverse a flooded pipe of known radius using only an IMU, a pressure sensor, and two sonars: a downward-facing single-beam sonar and a rotating 360 degree sonar. We introduce a computationally efficient method for extracting range estimates from single-beam sonar intensity data, enabling reliable wall detection in noisy and reverberant conditions. A closed-form geometric model leverages the two sonar ranges to estimate the pipe center, and an adaptive, confidence-weighted proportional-derivative (PD) controller maintains alignment during traversal. The system requires no Doppler velocity log, external tracking, or complex multi-sensor arrays. Experiments in a submerged 46 cm-diameter pipe using a Blue Robotics BlueROV2 heavy remotely operated vehicle demonstrate stable centering and successful full-pipe traversal despite ambient flow and structural deformations. These results show that reliable in-pipe navigation and inspection can be achieved with a lightweight, computationally efficient sensing and processing architecture, advancing the practicality of autonomous underwater inspection in confined environments.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种仅使用惯性测量单元（IMU）、压力传感器和两个声纳（下视单波束声纳和360度旋转声纳）的最小传感策略，使自由游动的水下机器人能够自行定位并穿越已知半径的淹没管道。
AI.motivation: 在浑浊、光线不足且缺乏可靠定位线索的封闭水下环境中，对水下管道进行自主检查具有挑战性。
AI.method: 该研究开发了一种计算高效的方法，从单波束声纳强度数据中提取距离估计，以可靠地检测墙壁。利用两个声纳的距离信息，通过封闭形式的几何模型来估计管道中心。一个自适应、置信加权的比例-微分（PD）控制器在穿越过程中保持对中。该系统无需多普勒计程仪、外部跟踪或复杂的多传感器阵列。
AI.result: 在直径46厘米的淹没管道中进行的实验表明，该系统能够实现稳定的对中和成功的全管道穿越，即使在存在环境流和结构变形的情况下也能如此。
AI.conclusion: 该研究表明，通过轻量级、计算效率高的传感和处理架构，可以实现可靠的管道内导航和检查，从而提高了在封闭环境中进行自主水下检查的实用性。

title: Locas: Your Models are Principled Initializers of Locally-Supported Parametric Memories
summary: In this paper, we aim to bridge test-time-training with a new type of parametric memory that can be flexibly offloaded from or merged into model parameters. We present Locas, a Locally-Supported parametric memory that shares the design of FFN blocks in modern transformers, allowing it to be flexibly permanentized into the model parameters while supporting efficient continual learning. We discuss two major variants of Locas: one with a conventional two-layer MLP design that has a clearer theoretical guarantee; the other one shares the same GLU-FFN structure with SOTA LLMs, and can be easily attached to existing models for both parameter-efficient and computation-efficient continual learning. Crucially, we show that proper initialization of such low-rank sideway-FFN-style memories -- performed in a principled way by reusing model parameters, activations and/or gradients -- is essential for fast convergence, improved generalization, and catastrophic forgetting prevention. We validate the proposed memory mechanism on the PG-19 whole-book language modeling and LoCoMo long-context dialogue question answering tasks. With only 0.02\% additional parameters in the lowest case, Locas-GLU is capable of storing the information from past context while maintaining a much smaller context window. In addition, we also test the model's general capability loss after memorizing the whole book with Locas, through comparative MMLU evaluation. Results show the promising ability of Locas to permanentize past context into parametric knowledge with minimized catastrophic forgetting of the model's existing internal knowledge.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为Locas的新型参数化记忆机制，用于增强Transformer模型在持续学习中的表现，其特点是易于集成、参数效率高，并能有效防止灾难性遗忘。
AI.motivation: 现有的测试时训练方法在持续学习中面临挑战，尤其是如何有效地在模型参数中存储和检索过去的知识，同时避免灾难性遗忘。
AI.method: 提出了Locas，一种在FFN（前馈网络）块中设计的局部支持参数化记忆。Locas有两种变体：一种是传统的两层MLP设计，另一种是与SOTA LLMs共享GLU-FFN结构。研究的关键在于提出了一种基于复用模型参数、激活或梯度的初始化方法，以加速收敛、提高泛化能力和防止灾难性遗忘。
AI.result: 在PG-19和LoCoMo任务上的实验表明，Locas-GLU仅需极少的额外参数（最低0.02%），就能存储历史上下文信息，同时保持较小的上下文窗口。与MMLU评估结果的对比显示，Locas能有效将历史上下文转化为参数化知识，同时最大限度地减少对模型现有内部知识的灾难性遗忘。
AI.conclusion: Locas是一种灵活且高效的参数化记忆机制，能够有效地实现持续学习，将过去的上下文信息永久化为模型参数，同时减轻灾难性遗忘，为增强模型在长上下文和持续学习场景下的能力提供了有前景的解决方案。

title: Context-Aware Asymmetric Ensembling for Interpretable Retinopathy of Prematurity Screening via Active Query and Vascular Attention
summary: Retinopathy of Prematurity (ROP) is among the major causes of preventable childhood blindness. Automated screening remains challenging, primarily due to limited data availability and the complex condition involving both structural staging and microvascular abnormalities. Current deep learning models depend heavily on large private datasets and passive multimodal fusion, which commonly fail to generalize on small, imbalanced public cohorts. We thus propose the Context-Aware Asymmetric Ensemble Model (CAA Ensemble) that simulates clinical reasoning through two specialized streams. First, the Multi-Scale Active Query Network (MS-AQNet) serves as a structure specialist, utilizing clinical contexts as dynamic query vectors to spatially control visual feature extraction for localization of the fibrovascular ridge. Secondly, VascuMIL encodes Vascular Topology Maps (VMAP) within a gated Multiple Instance Learning (MIL) network to precisely identify vascular tortuosity. A synergistic meta-learner ensembles these orthogonal signals to resolve diagnostic discordance across multiple objectives. Tested on a highly imbalanced cohort of 188 infants (6,004 images), the framework attained State-of-the-Art performance on two distinct clinical tasks: achieving a Macro F1-Score of 0.93 for Broad ROP staging and an AUC of 0.996 for Plus Disease detection. Crucially, the system features `Glass Box' transparency through counterfactual attention heatmaps and vascular threat maps, proving that clinical metadata dictates the model's visual search. Additionally, this study demonstrates that architectural inductive bias can serve as an effective bridge for the medical AI data gap.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为CAA Ensemble的视网膜母细胞瘤（ROP）自动筛查模型，该模型通过两个专业流（MS-AQNet和VascuMIL）模拟临床诊断，并在公开数据集上取得了最先进的性能，同时提供了模型的可解释性。
AI.motivation: 目前的ROP自动筛查模型面临数据量有限、ROP病情复杂（包括结构分期和微血管异常）以及现有模型泛化能力差的问题。研究旨在克服这些挑战，提高ROP筛查的准确性和可解释性。
AI.method: 提出了一种上下文感知的不对称集成模型（CAA Ensemble），包含两个专业流：1. 多尺度主动查询网络（MS-AQNet）用于结构分析，利用临床上下文作为查询向量来定位纤维血管脊；2. VascuMIL利用血管拓扑图（VMAP）和门控多实例学习（MIL）网络识别血管扭曲。最后，通过一个协同元学习器集成这两个独立信号。
AI.result: 在包含188名婴儿（6004张图像）的公开不平衡数据集上，CAA Ensemble在ROP分期任务上实现了0.93的Macro F1分数，在Plus Disease检测任务上实现了0.996的AUC，均达到最先进水平。模型通过反事实注意力热图和血管威胁图提供了“透明玻璃”式的可解释性。
AI.conclusion: CAA Ensemble模型通过模拟临床推理并结合结构和血管信息，有效解决了ROP自动筛查中的数据稀疏和泛化能力问题，并提供了良好的可解释性。该研究表明，架构归纳偏置可以有效弥合医学AI的数据鸿沟。

title: Evaluating Large Language Models on Solved and Unsolved Problems in Graph Theory: Implications for Computing Education
summary:
Large Language Models are increasingly used by students to explore advanced material in computer science, including graph theory. As these tools become integrated into undergraduate and graduate coursework, it is important to understand how reliably they support mathematically rigorous thinking. This study examines the performance of a LLM on two related graph theoretic problems: a solved problem concerning the gracefulness of line graphs and an open problem for which no solution is currently known. We use an eight stage evaluation protocol that reflects authentic mathematical inquiry, including interpretation, exploration, strategy formation, and proof construction.
  The model performed strongly on the solved problem, producing correct definitions, identifying relevant structures, recalling appropriate results without hallucination, and constructing a valid proof confirmed by a graph theory expert. For the open problem, the model generated coherent interpretations and plausible exploratory strategies but did not advance toward a solution. It did not fabricate results and instead acknowledged uncertainty, which is consistent with the explicit prompting instructions that directed the model to avoid inventing theorems or unsupported claims.
  These findings indicate that LLMs can support exploration of established material but remain limited in tasks requiring novel mathematical insight or critical structural reasoning. For computing education, this distinction highlights the importance of guiding students to use LLMs for conceptual exploration while relying on independent verification and rigorous argumentation for formal problem solving.

AI.tldr: 研究评估了大型语言模型（LLM）在图论方面的表现，发现其在已解决的问题上表现良好，能提供正确定义、回忆相关结果并构建有效证明；但在开放性问题上，模型虽能进行解释和探索，但无法推进至解决方案，并能承认不确定性。
AI.motivation: 随着LLM在计算机科学（如图论）教学中的广泛应用，研究者希望了解其在支持数学严谨性思考方面的可靠性。
AI.method: 研究采用一个包含八个阶段的评估协议，模拟真实的数学探究过程，包括解释、探索、策略形成和证明构建。评估了LLM在图论中的一个已解决问题（线图的优雅性）和一个开放性问题上的表现。
AI.result: 对于已解决问题，LLM能准确提供定义、识别相关结构、回忆已知结果且无幻觉，并能构建一个由专家确认的有效证明。对于开放性问题，LLM能生成合理的解释和探索性策略，但未能找到解决方案，并且没有捏造结果，而是承认了不确定性。
AI.conclusion: LLM能够支持对既有知识的探索，但在需要新颖数学洞察力或批判性结构推理的任务上仍有限制。对于计算教育而言，应指导学生利用LLM进行概念探索，同时依靠独立验证和严谨论证来进行正式的问题解决。

title: Towards Reducible Uncertainty Modeling for Reliable Large Language Model Agents
summary: Uncertainty quantification (UQ) for large language models (LLMs) is a key building block for safety guardrails of daily LLM applications. Yet, even as LLM agents are increasingly deployed in highly complex tasks, most UQ research still centers on single-turn question-answering. We argue that UQ research must shift to realistic settings with interactive agents, and that a new principled framework for agent UQ is needed. This paper presents the first general formulation of agent UQ that subsumes broad classes of existing UQ setups. Under this formulation, we show that prior works implicitly treat LLM UQ as an uncertainty accumulation process, a viewpoint that breaks down for interactive agents in an open world. In contrast, we propose a novel perspective, a conditional uncertainty reduction process, that explicitly models reducible uncertainty over an agent's trajectory by highlighting "interactivity" of actions. From this perspective, we outline a conceptual framework to provide actionable guidance for designing UQ in LLM agent setups. Finally, we conclude with practical implications of the agent UQ in frontier LLM development and domain-specific applications, as well as open remaining problems.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一个用于大型语言模型（LLM）智能体（agent）不确定性量化（UQ）的新框架，以解决现有方法在单轮问答场景下有效，但在复杂交互任务中失效的问题。
AI.motivation: 现有的大型语言模型（LLM）不确定性量化（UQ）研究主要集中在单轮问答，而LLM智能体正被越来越多地部署到复杂的交互式任务中，因此需要一个新的、更通用的、适用于交互式智能体的UQ框架。
AI.method: 作者首先提出了一个更通用的智能体UQ的数学表述，该表述可以包含现有的大部分UQ方法。在此基础上，作者指出先前的工作将LLM UQ视为不确定性累积过程，而这在开放世界的交互式智能体中是不可靠的。随后，作者提出了一个新视角：条件不确定性降低过程，通过强调动作的“交互性”来显式地为智能体轨迹中的可约不确定性建模。作者还提出了一个概念框架来指导LLM智能体设置中的UQ设计。
AI.result: 通过新的视角，作者指出不确定性并非仅仅是累积的，而是可以通过交互和动作来降低。提出了一个概念框架，为在LLM智能体场景中设计UQ提供了行动指导。
AI.conclusion: 本文提出了首个通用的智能体UQ表述，并引入了条件不确定性降低这一新视角，为LLM智能体在现实世界中的安全应用提供了理论基础和实践指导，并讨论了其在LLM开发和特定领域应用的潜在影响。

title: Visual concept ranking uncovers medical shortcuts used by large multimodal models
summary: Ensuring the reliability of machine learning models in safety-critical domains such as healthcare requires auditing methods that can uncover model shortcomings. We introduce a method for identifying important visual concepts within large multimodal models (LMMs) and use it to investigate the behaviors these models exhibit when prompted with medical tasks. We primarily focus on the task of classifying malignant skin lesions from clinical dermatology images, with supplemental experiments including both chest radiographs and natural images. After showing how LMMs display unexpected gaps in performance between different demographic subgroups when prompted with demonstrating examples, we apply our method, Visual Concept Ranking (VCR), to these models and prompts. VCR generates hypotheses related to different visual feature dependencies, which we are then able to validate with manual interventions.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为视觉概念排序（VCR）的方法，用于识别大型多模态模型（LMMs）中的重要视觉概念，并将其应用于医学成像任务，以审计模型在不同人口统计学子群体中的性能差距。
AI.motivation: 在医疗保健等安全关键领域，确保机器学习模型的可靠性至关重要。需要审计方法来发现模型的缺点，特别是当模型在不同人口统计学群体中表现出性能差异时。
AI.method: 提出了一种名为视觉概念排序（VCR）的新方法，该方法能够识别LMMs中的重要视觉概念。将VCR应用于LMMs和医学成像任务（主要是皮肤病变分类，并辅以胸部X光和自然图像实验），以生成关于不同视觉特征依赖性的假设，然后通过手动干预进行验证。
AI.result: 通过VCR方法，发现了LMMs在处理医学成像任务时，在不同人口统计学子群体之间存在意料之外的性能差距。该方法能够生成可验证的关于视觉特征依赖性的假设。
AI.conclusion: VCR是一种有效的方法，可以识别LMMs中的重要视觉概念，并揭示模型在医学成像任务中存在的对不同人口统计学子群体的不公平性。通过VCR生成的假设可以指导进一步的干预和模型改进。

title: Data Kernel Perspective Space Performance Guarantees for Synthetic Data from Transformer Models
summary: Scarcity of labeled training data remains the long pole in the tent for building performant language technology and generative AI models. Transformer models -- particularly LLMs -- are increasingly being used to mitigate the data scarcity problem via synthetic data generation. However, because the models are black boxes, the properties of the synthetic data are difficult to predict. In practice it is common for language technology engineers to 'fiddle' with the LLM temperature setting and hope that what comes out the other end improves the downstream model. Faced with this uncertainty, here we propose Data Kernel Perspective Space (DKPS) to provide the foundation for mathematical analysis yielding concrete statistical guarantees for the quality of the outputs of transformer models. We first show the mathematical derivation of DKPS and how it provides performance guarantees. Next we show how DKPS performance guarantees can elucidate performance of a downstream task, such as neural machine translation models or LLMs trained using Contrastive Preference Optimization (CPO). Limitations of the current work and future research are also discussed.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了数据核视角空间（DKPS）来提供数学分析基础，为变压器模型的输出质量提供具体的统计保证，以解决标签化训练数据稀缺的问题，并展示了DKPS如何揭示下游任务（如神经机器翻译或CPO训练的LLM）的性能。
AI.motivation: 构建高性能语言技术和生成式AI模型面临标签化训练数据稀缺的挑战。尽管LLM常用于生成合成数据，但其“黑箱”特性使得合成数据属性难以预测。研究旨在解决这种不确定性，提供一种基于数学分析的方法。
AI.method: 提出数据核视角空间（DKPS），进行了数学推导，证明其能提供性能保证。此外，展示了DKPS性能保证如何解释下游任务（如神经机器翻译模型或使用对比偏好优化（CPO）训练的LLM）的性能。
AI.result: DKPS为理解和保证变压器模型输出质量提供了数学框架。研究展示了DKPS如何应用于分析和预测下游模型的性能。
AI.conclusion: DKPS为解决语言技术领域数据稀缺问题和提高模型性能提供了理论基础和分析工具，并对未来研究方向进行了探讨。

title: Affordance-Aware Interactive Decision-Making and Execution for Ambiguous Instructions
summary: Enabling robots to explore and act in unfamiliar environments under ambiguous human instructions by interactively identifying task-relevant objects (e.g., identifying cups or beverages for "I'm thirsty") remains challenging for existing vision-language model (VLM)-based methods. This challenge stems from inefficient reasoning and the lack of environmental interaction, which hinder real-time task planning and execution. To address this, We propose Affordance-Aware Interactive Decision-Making and Execution for Ambiguous Instructions (AIDE), a dual-stream framework that integrates interactive exploration with vision-language reasoning, where Multi-Stage Inference (MSI) serves as the decision-making stream and Accelerated Decision-Making (ADM) as the execution stream, enabling zero-shot affordance analysis and interpretation of ambiguous instructions. Extensive experiments in simulation and real-world environments show that AIDE achieves the task planning success rate of over 80\% and more than 95\% accuracy in closed-loop continuous execution at 10 Hz, outperforming existing VLM-based methods in diverse open-world scenarios.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为 AIDE 的双流框架，通过整合交互式探索和视觉-语言推理，来解决现有 VLM 方法在处理模糊人类指令和识别任务相关物体方面的不足，并在仿真和真实世界环境中取得了优于现有方法的性能。
AI.motivation: 现有基于 VLM 的方法在处理不熟悉的环境、模糊的人类指令以及实时任务规划和执行方面存在效率低下和缺乏环境交互的问题。
AI.method: 提出了一种名为 AIDE 的双流框架，其中包含多阶段推理（MSI）作为决策流和加速决策（ADM）作为执行流。该框架整合了交互式探索和视觉-语言推理，实现了零样本能力分析和模糊指令的解释。
AI.result: AIDE 在仿真和真实世界环境中均取得了超过 80% 的任务规划成功率和超过 95% 的闭环连续执行准确率（10 Hz），在多样化的开放世界场景中优于现有的 VLM 方法。
AI.conclusion: AIDE 框架能够有效地实现交互式物体识别和模糊指令理解，从而赋能机器人在不熟悉的环境中进行探索和执行任务，并且在性能上超越了现有的 VLM 方法。

title: Policy-Driven Orchestration Framework for Multi-Operator Non-Terrestrial Networks
comment: Accepted for publication in IEEE Transactions on Communications
summary: Non-terrestrial networks (NTNs) have gained significant attention for their scalability and wide coverage in next-generation communication systems. A large number of NTN nodes, such as satellites, are required to establish a global NTN, but not all operators have the capability to deploy such a system. Therefore, cooperation among multiple operators, facilitated by an orchestrator, enables the construction of virtually large-scale constellations. In this paper, we propose a weak-control-based orchestration framework that coordinates multiple NTN operators while ensuring that operations align with the policies of both the orchestrator and the individual operators. Unlike centralized orchestration frameworks, where the orchestrator determines the entire route from source to destination, the proposed framework allows each operator to select preferred routes from multiple candidates provided by the orchestrator. To evaluate the effectiveness of our proposed framework, we conducted numerical simulations under various scenarios and network configurations including dynamic NTN environments with time-varying topologies, showing that inter-operator cooperation improves the availability of feasible end-to-end routes. Furthermore, we analyzed the iterative negotiation process to address policy conflicts and quantitatively demonstrated the "price of autonomy," where strict individual policies degrade global feasibility and performance. The results also demonstrate that outcomes of the proposed framework depend on the operators' policies and that hop count and latency increase as the number of operators grows. These findings validate the proposed framework's ability to deliver practical benefits of orchestrated multi-operator collaboration in future NTN environments.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于弱控制的协调框架，用于协调多个非地面网络（NTN）运营商，以增强互联互通能力，并量化了自决权带来的成本。
AI.motivation: 建立全球性的非地面网络（NTN）需要大量的节点，并非所有运营商都能独立部署。因此，需要一种机制来实现多运营商的协同，以构建大规模的NTN。
AI.method: 提出了一种基于弱控制的协调框架，该框架允许运营商在协调器提供的多个候选路由中选择自己偏好的路由。框架还包括一个迭代协商过程来解决策略冲突。
AI.result: 数值模拟结果表明，运营商间的协作提高了可行端到端路由的可用性。同时，分析了迭代协商过程，量化了“自决权价格”，即严格的个体策略会降低全局可行性和性能。研究还发现，框架的结果取决于运营商的策略，并且随着运营商数量的增加，跳数和延迟会增加。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的框架能够实现由协调的多运营商协作在未来NTN环境中带来切实的效益，并验证了其在动态NTN环境中的有效性。

title: CLEAR-HPV: Interpretable Concept Discovery for HPV-Associated Morphology in Whole-Slide Histology
summary: Human papillomavirus (HPV) status is a critical determinant of prognosis and treatment response in head and neck and cervical cancers. Although attention-based multiple instance learning (MIL) achieves strong slide-level prediction for HPV-related whole-slide histopathology, it provides limited morphologic interpretability. To address this limitation, we introduce Concept-Level Explainable Attention-guided Representation for HPV (CLEAR-HPV), a framework that restructures the MIL latent space using attention to enable concept discovery without requiring concept labels during training. Operating in an attention-weighted latent space, CLEAR-HPV automatically discovers keratinizing, basaloid, and stromal morphologic concepts, generates spatial concept maps, and represents each slide using a compact concept-fraction vector. CLEAR-HPV's concept-fraction vectors preserve the predictive information of the original MIL embeddings while reducing the high-dimensional feature space (e.g., 1536 dimensions) to only 10 interpretable concepts. CLEAR-HPV generalizes consistently across TCGA-HNSCC, TCGA-CESC, and CPTAC-HNSCC, providing compact, concept-level interpretability through a general, backbone-agnostic framework for attention-based MIL models of whole-slide histopathology.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为CLEAR-HPV的框架，用于在全切片组织病理学图像中发现与HPV相关的形态学概念，从而提高解释性并降低特征维度。
AI.motivation: 现有的基于注意力机制的多实例学习（MIL）方法在预测HPV相关癌症方面表现出色，但缺乏形态学可解释性。
AI.method: CLEAR-HPV通过在注意力加权的潜在空间中操作，无需概念标签即可自动发现角化、基底样和基质等形态学概念，并生成空间概念图，最后将每个切片表示为紧凑的概念分数向量。
AI.result: CLEAR-HPV可以将原始MIL嵌入的1536维特征空间压缩到10个可解释的概念，同时保留预测信息，并且在不同的数据集（TCGA-HNSCC, TCGA-CESC, CPTAC-HNSCC）上表现出一致的泛化能力。
AI.conclusion: CLEAR-HPV提供了一种通用、骨干无关的框架，为基于注意力机制的MIL模型在全切片组织病理学图像中提供了紧凑、概念层面的可解释性。

title: Optimizing Mission Planning for Multi-Debris Rendezvous Using Reinforcement Learning with Refueling and Adaptive Collision Avoidance
comment: Accpeted at Conference: 15th IAA Symposium on Small Satellites for Earth System Observation At: Berlin
summary:
As the orbital environment around Earth becomes increasingly crowded with debris, active debris removal (ADR) missions face significant challenges in ensuring safe operations while minimizing the risk of in-orbit collisions. This study presents a reinforcement learning (RL) based framework to enhance adaptive collision avoidance in ADR missions, specifically for multi-debris removal using small satellites. Small satellites are increasingly adopted due to their flexibility, cost effectiveness, and maneuverability, making them well suited for dynamic missions such as ADR.
  Building on existing work in multi-debris rendezvous, the framework integrates refueling strategies, efficient mission planning, and adaptive collision avoidance to optimize spacecraft rendezvous operations. The proposed approach employs a masked Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO) algorithm, enabling the RL agent to dynamically adjust maneuvers in response to real-time orbital conditions. Key considerations include fuel efficiency, avoidance of active collision zones, and optimization of dynamic orbital parameters.
  The RL agent learns to determine efficient sequences for rendezvousing with multiple debris targets, optimizing fuel usage and mission time while incorporating necessary refueling stops. Simulated ADR scenarios derived from the Iridium 33 debris dataset are used for evaluation, covering diverse orbital configurations and debris distributions to demonstrate robustness and adaptability. Results show that the proposed RL framework reduces collision risk while improving mission efficiency compared to traditional heuristic approaches.
  This work provides a scalable solution for planning complex multi-debris ADR missions and is applicable to other multi-target rendezvous problems in autonomous space mission planning.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一个基于强化学习（RL）的框架，用于增强小型卫星在多碎片主动移除（ADR）任务中的自适应碰撞规避能力，通过PPO算法优化燃料效率和任务规划，并在模拟环境中验证了其优于传统方法的性能。
AI.motivation: 地球轨道空间碎片日益增多，给主动碎片移除（ADR）任务的安全操作带来了挑战。小型卫星因其灵活性、成本效益和机动性，在ADR任务中得到越来越广泛的应用，需要更优的策略来处理多目标移除和避免碰撞。
AI.method: 研究提出了一种基于强化学习（RL）的框架，集成了加注策略、任务规划和自适应碰撞规避。具体采用了掩码近端策略优化（PPO）算法，使RL智能体能够根据实时轨道条件动态调整机动动作，同时考虑燃料效率、避开碰撞区域以及优化轨道参数。
AI.result: 在基于Iridium 33碎片数据集的模拟ADR场景中，该RL框架在降低碰撞风险和提高任务效率方面表现优于传统启发式方法。智能体能够学习到高效的多碎片会合序列，优化燃料消耗和任务时间，并包含必要的加注停靠。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为复杂的多碎片ADR任务规划提供了一个可扩展的解决方案，并且适用于其他多目标自主空间任务规划问题。

title: Learning Soccer Skills for Humanoid Robots: A Progressive Perception-Action Framework
summary: Soccer presents a significant challenge for humanoid robots, demanding tightly integrated perception-action capabilities for tasks like perception-guided kicking and whole-body balance control. Existing approaches suffer from inter-module instability in modular pipelines or conflicting training objectives in end-to-end frameworks. We propose Perception-Action integrated Decision-making (PAiD), a progressive architecture that decomposes soccer skill acquisition into three stages: motion-skill acquisition via human motion tracking, lightweight perception-action integration for positional generalization, and physics-aware sim-to-real transfer. This staged decomposition establishes stable foundational skills, avoids reward conflicts during perception integration, and minimizes sim-to-real gaps. Experiments on the Unitree G1 demonstrate high-fidelity human-like kicking with robust performance under diverse conditions-including static or rolling balls, various positions, and disturbances-while maintaining consistent execution across indoor and outdoor scenarios. Our divide-and-conquer strategy advances robust humanoid soccer capabilities and offers a scalable framework for complex embodied skill acquisition. The project page is available at https://soccer-humanoid.github.io/.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为 PAiD 的渐进式架构，用于解决人形机器人足球任务中感知-行动集成的问题，该架构将技能学习分解为三个阶段，并在 Unitree G1 上进行了实验，证明了其在各种条件下实现高保真度和鲁棒性的能力。
AI.motivation: 现有的人形机器人足球方法存在模块化流水线中的模块间不稳定性或端到端框架中的训练目标冲突等问题。
AI.method: 提出了一种名为 Perception-Action integrated Decision-making (PAiD) 的渐进式架构，该架构将足球技能获取分解为三个阶段：通过人体运动跟踪获取运动技能、轻量级的感知-行动集成以实现位置泛化、以及考虑物理特性的仿真到现实迁移。
AI.result: 在 Unitree G1 上进行的实验表明，该方法能够实现高保真度、类似人类的踢球动作，在静态或滚动的球、各种位置和干扰等多样化条件下表现出鲁棒性，并在室内外场景中保持一致的执行效果。
AI.conclusion: PAiD 采用分而治之的策略，提高了人形机器人足球能力的鲁棒性，并为复杂具身技能的获取提供了一个可扩展的框架。

title: Multilingual Extraction and Recognition of Implicit Discourse Relations in Speech and Text
summary: Implicit discourse relation classification is a challenging task, as it requires inferring meaning from context. While contextual cues can be distributed across modalities and vary across languages, they are not always captured by text alone. To address this, we introduce an automatic method for distantly related and unrelated language pairs to construct a multilingual and multimodal dataset for implicit discourse relations in English, French, and Spanish. For classification, we propose a multimodal approach that integrates textual and acoustic information through Qwen2-Audio, allowing joint modeling of text and audio for implicit discourse relation classification across languages. We find that while text-based models outperform audio-based models, integrating both modalities can enhance performance, and cross-lingual transfer can provide substantial improvements for low-resource languages.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种多模态（文本+音频）方法，用于跨语言（英语、法语、西班牙语）的隐式语篇关系分类，并构建了一个新的多语言多模态数据集。该方法通过Qwen2-Audio联合建模文本和音频信息，结果表明多模态融合优于单一模态，且跨语言迁移对低资源语言有显著提升。
AI.motivation: 传统的隐式语篇关系分类仅依赖文本，无法捕捉跨模态（如语音语调）和跨语言的上下文线索。现有方法在处理远程和不相关语言对时存在不足，并且低资源语言的性能有待提高。
AI.method: 1. 构建了一个多语言（英、法、西）、多模态（文本+音频）的隐式语篇关系数据集，解决了远程和不相关语言对的构建问题。2. 提出了一种多模态分类方法，利用Qwen2-Audio模型联合处理文本和音频信息，进行隐式语篇关系分类。
AI.result: 1. 文本模型在分类任务上优于纯音频模型。2. 文本和音频多模态融合能够提升分类性能。3. 跨语言迁移学习对低资源语言的性能提升显著。
AI.conclusion: 多模态信息（文本和音频）对于隐式语篇关系分类是重要的，并且可以有效提升分类性能。跨语言迁移是改善低资源语言模型性能的有效策略。

title: Towards Segmenting the Invisible: An End-to-End Registration and Segmentation Framework for Weakly Supervised Tumour Analysis
summary: Liver tumour ablation presents a significant clinical challenge: whilst tumours are clearly visible on pre-operative MRI, they are often effectively invisible on intra-operative CT due to minimal contrast between pathological and healthy tissue. This work investigates the feasibility of cross-modality weak supervision for scenarios where pathology is visible in one modality (MRI) but absent in another (CT). We present a hybrid registration-segmentation framework that combines MSCGUNet for inter-modal image registration with a UNet-based segmentation module, enabling registration-assisted pseudo-label generation for CT images. Our evaluation on the CHAOS dataset demonstrates that the pipeline can successfully register and segment healthy liver anatomy, achieving a Dice score of 0.72. However, when applied to clinical data containing tumours, performance degrades substantially (Dice score of 0.16), revealing the fundamental limitations of current registration methods when the target pathology lacks corresponding visual features in the target modality. We analyse the "domain gap" and "feature absence" problems, demonstrating that whilst spatial propagation of labels via registration is feasible for visible structures, segmenting truly invisible pathology remains an open challenge. Our findings highlight that registration-based label transfer cannot compensate for the absence of discriminative features in the target modality, providing important insights for future research in cross-modality medical image analysis. Code an weights are available at: https://github.com/BudhaTronix/Weakly-Supervised-Tumour-Detection

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了一种用于肝脏肿瘤消融的跨模态弱监督方法，旨在解决术中 CT 图像肿瘤不可见的问题。尽管该方法在注册和分割健康肝脏解剖结构方面取得了一定成功，但在肿瘤分割方面表现不佳，凸显了仅依靠配准进行标签迁移以处理目标模态中缺乏区分性特征的不可见病灶的局限性。
AI.motivation: 术中 CT 图像中的肝脏肿瘤由于与正常组织的对比度低而难以辨别，而术前 MRI 图像中肿瘤清晰可见。研究旨在解决这种跨模态可见性差异带来的临床挑战，探索在一种模态（MRI）可见病灶而在另一种模态（CT）不可见的情况下进行弱监督分割的可行性。
AI.method: 提出了一种混合配准-分割框架，该框架结合了 MSCGUNet 进行模态间图像配准，以及一个基于 UNet 的分割模块。该框架能够生成基于配准的 CT 图像伪标签，用于训练分割模型。研究通过分析“域隙”和“特征缺失”问题来评估方法的有效性。
AI.result: 在 CHAOS 数据集上的评估显示，该流水线能够成功配准并分割健康的肝脏解剖结构，Dice 分数达到 0.72。然而，在包含肿瘤的临床数据上，性能显著下降（Dice 分数仅为 0.16）。这表明当目标病灶在目标模态中缺乏相应的视觉特征时，现有的配准方法存在根本性局限。
AI.conclusion: 研究表明，通过配准进行标签的空间传播对于可见结构是可行的，但分割真正不可见的病灶仍然是一个开放的挑战。基于配准的标签迁移无法弥补目标模态中区分性特征的缺失，这对于未来跨模态医学图像分析的研究提供了重要启示。

title: Disc-Centric Contrastive Learning for Lumbar Spine Severity Grading
summary: This work examines a disc-centric approach for automated severity grading of lumbar spinal stenosis from sagittal T2-weighted MRI. The method combines contrastive pretraining with disc-level fine-tuning, using a single anatomically localized region of interest per intervertebral disc. Contrastive learning is employed to help the model focus on meaningful disc features and reduce sensitivity to irrelevant differences in image appearance. The framework includes an auxiliary regression task for disc localization and applies weighted focal loss to address class imbalance. Experiments demonstrate a 78.1% balanced accuracy and a reduced severe-to-normal misclassification rate of 2.13% compared with supervised training from scratch. Detecting discs with moderate severity can still be challenging, but focusing on disc-level features provides a practical way to assess the lumbar spinal stenosis.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种基于椎间盘的自动评估腰椎管狭窄严重程度的方法，结合了对比预训练和椎间盘级微调，并在T2加权MRI图像上进行了实验，取得了良好的效果。
AI.motivation: 自动、准确地评估腰椎管狭窄的严重程度，以提高诊断效率和准确性。
AI.method: 采用了一种以椎间盘为中心的分析方法，结合了对比预训练和椎间盘级微调。该方法利用每个椎间盘的解剖学定位感兴趣区域，并通过对比学习让模型关注有意义的椎间盘特征。此外，还包含一个用于椎间盘定位的辅助回归任务，并使用加权 Focal Loss 来处理类别不平衡问题。
AI.result: 在平衡准确率方面达到了 78.1%，并且严重与正常类别误分类率降低至 2.13%，优于从头开始的监督训练。
AI.conclusion: 基于椎间盘的特征分析为评估腰椎管狭窄提供了一种实用的方法，尽管检测中度严重程度的椎间盘仍有挑战。该方法在提高严重程度分级准确性方面显示出潜力。

title: Robust data-driven model-reference control of linear perturbed systems via sliding mode generation
summary: This paper introduces a data-based integral sliding mode control scheme for robustification of model-reference controllers, accommodating generic multivariable linear systems with unknown dynamics and affected by matched disturbances. Specifically, an integral sliding mode control (ISMC) law is recast into a data-based framework relying on an integral sliding variable depending only on the reference model, without the need of modeling the plant.
