The main strength of the proposed approach is the enforcement of the desired reference model in closed-loop under sliding mode conditions, despite the lack of knowledge of the model dynamics and the presence of the matched disturbances. Moreover, the conditions required to guarantee an integral sliding mode generation and the closed-loop stability are formally analyzed in the paper, remarking the generality of the proposed data-driven integral sliding mode control (DD-ISMC) with respect to the related model-based counterpart. Finally, the main practices for the data-based design of the proposed control scheme are deeply discussed in the paper, and the proposed method is tested in simulation on a benchmark example, and experimentally on a real laboratory setup. Simulation and experimental evidence fully corroborates the theoretical analysis, thus motivating further research in this direction.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于数据的积分滑模控制方案，用于增强模型参考控制器的鲁棒性，适用于具有未知动力学和匹配扰动的通用多变量线性系统。该方法仅依赖于参考模型，无需植物建模，即可在滑模条件下强制实现期望的参考模型。
AI.motivation: 研究的动机是开发一种能够处理具有未知动力学和匹配扰动的通用多变量线性系统的鲁棒控制器，并能实现期望的模型参考行为。
AI.method: 该方法将积分滑模控制（ISMC）律重构为基于数据的框架，利用仅依赖于参考模型的积分滑移变量，从而无需植物建模。控制律的生成和闭环稳定性通过形式化分析得到保证。
AI.result: 该方法成功地在滑模条件下强制实现了期望的参考模型，即使在植物模型未知和存在匹配扰动的情况下。所提出的数据驱动积分滑模控制（DD-ISMC）在通用性方面优于相关的基于模型的对应方法。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的数据驱动积分滑模控制方案能够有效处理具有未知动力学和匹配扰动的通用多变量线性系统，并能实现鲁棒的模型参考行为。仿真和实验结果充分证实了理论分析的有效性，并鼓励进一步的研究。

title: VERA-MH: Reliability and Validity of an Open-Source AI Safety Evaluation in Mental Health
summary: Millions now use leading generative AI chatbots for psychological support. Despite the promise related to availability and scale, the single most pressing question in AI for mental health is whether these tools are safe. The Validation of Ethical and Responsible AI in Mental Health (VERA-MH) evaluation was recently proposed to meet the urgent need for an evidence-based automated safety benchmark. This study aimed to examine the clinical validity and reliability of the VERA-MH evaluation for AI safety in suicide risk detection and response. We first simulated a large set of conversations between large language model (LLM)-based users (user-agents) and general-purpose AI chatbots. Licensed mental health clinicians used a rubric (scoring guide) to independently rate the simulated conversations for safe and unsafe chatbot behaviors, as well as user-agent realism. An LLM-based judge used the same scoring rubric to evaluate the same set of simulated conversations. We then compared rating alignment across (a) individual clinicians and (b) clinician consensus and the LLM judge, and (c) examined clinicians' ratings of user-agent realism. Individual clinicians were generally consistent with one another in their safety ratings (chance-corrected inter-rater reliability [IRR]: 0.77), thus establishing a gold-standard clinical reference. The LLM judge was strongly aligned with this clinical consensus (IRR: 0.81) overall and within key conditions. Clinician raters generally perceived the user-agents to be realistic. For the potential mental health benefits of AI chatbots to be realized, attention to safety is paramount. Findings from this human evaluation study support the clinical validity and reliability of VERA-MH: an open-source, fully automated AI safety evaluation for mental health. Further research will address VERA-MH generalizability and robustness.

AI.tldr: 本研究验证了用于评估心理健康AI聊天机器人安全性的VERA-MH（Validation of Ethical and Responsible AI in Mental Health）评估工具的临床有效性和可靠性，发现其与临床共识高度一致，表明该工具可用于自动化评估AI在自杀风险检测和响应方面的安全性。
AI.motivation: 随着生成式AI聊天机器人被广泛用于心理支持，确保其安全性成为AI心理健康领域最紧迫的问题。VERA-MH评估被提出用于建立一个基于证据的自动化安全基准。
AI.method: 研究人员模拟了大量包含用户代理（LLM驱动）和通用AI聊天机器人的对话。由持证心理健康临床医生使用评分指南独立评估对话的安全性（安全/不安全行为）和用户代理的真实性。同时，一个LLM驱动的裁判也使用相同的评分指南对对话进行评估。随后，比较了临床医生之间的评分一致性、临床共识与LLM裁判的一致性，以及用户代理真实性评分。
AI.result: 临床医生在安全评分上具有较高的一致性（IRR: 0.77），形成了临床金标准。LLM裁判与临床共识高度一致（IRR: 0.81）。用户代理的真实性也得到了临床评估者的认可。
AI.conclusion: 研究结果支持VERA-MH评估工具的临床有效性和可靠性，该工具是一个开源的、全自动的心理健康AI安全评估工具，为实现AI聊天机器人的潜在心理健康益处奠定了安全基础。未来研究将进一步探讨VERA-MH的通用性和鲁棒性。

title: ARGaze: Autoregressive Transformers for Online Egocentric Gaze Estimation
summary: Online egocentric gaze estimation predicts where a camera wearer is looking from first-person video using only past and current frames, a task essential for augmented reality and assistive technologies. Unlike third-person gaze estimation, this setting lacks explicit head or eye signals, requiring models to infer current visual attention from sparse, indirect cues such as hand-object interactions and salient scene content. We observe that gaze exhibits strong temporal continuity during goal-directed activities: knowing where a person looked recently provides a powerful prior for predicting where they look next. Inspired by vision-conditioned autoregressive decoding in vision-language models, we propose ARGaze, which reformulates gaze estimation as sequential prediction: at each timestep, a transformer decoder predicts current gaze by conditioning on (i) current visual features and (ii) a fixed-length Gaze Context Window of recent gaze target estimates. This design enforces causality and enables bounded-resource streaming inference. We achieve state-of-the-art performance across multiple egocentric benchmarks under online evaluation, with extensive ablations validating that autoregressive modeling with bounded gaze history is critical for robust prediction. We will release our source code and pre-trained models.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为ARGaze的新型在线单目注视估计方法，该方法将注视估计重塑为序列预测任务，利用过去和当前的视觉信息以及近期注视目标的固定长度上下文窗口，以自回归方式进行预测，在多个基准测试中取得了最先进的性能。
AI.motivation: 在线单目注视估计任务缺乏显式的头部或眼部信号，需要从稀疏、间接的线索（如手部-物体交互和场景内容）中推断视觉注意力。研究者观察到，注视在目标导向的活动中具有很强的时序连续性。
AI.method: 受视觉-语言模型中的视觉条件自回归解码的启发，提出ARGaze模型。该模型将注视估计视为序列预测任务，在每个时间步，一个Transformer解码器通过以下两点进行条件化预测当前注视：(i) 当前的视觉特征；(ii) 近期注视目标估计的固定长度注视上下文窗口（Gaze Context Window）。
AI.result: ARGaze在多个在线评估的单目基准测试中取得了最先进的性能。消融实验证实，具有有限注视历史的自回归模型对于鲁棒的预测至关重要。
AI.conclusion: ARGaze模型通过将注视估计视为序列预测任务，并利用近期注视信息的上下文窗口，成功地提高了在线单目注视估计的准确性和鲁棒性，并且适用于资源受限的流式推理场景。

title: RoboPaint: From Human Demonstration to Any Robot and Any View
summary: Acquiring large-scale, high-fidelity robot demonstration data remains a critical bottleneck for scaling Vision-Language-Action (VLA) models in dexterous manipulation. We propose a Real-Sim-Real data collection and data editing pipeline that transforms human demonstrations into robot-executable, environment-specific training data without direct robot teleoperation. Standardized data collection rooms are built to capture multimodal human demonstrations (synchronized 3 RGB-D videos, 11 RGB videos, 29-DoF glove joint angles, and 14-channel tactile signals). Based on these human demonstrations, we introduce a tactile-aware retargeting method that maps human hand states to robot dex-hand states via geometry and force-guided optimization. Then the retargeted robot trajectories are rendered in a photorealistic Isaac Sim environment to build robot training data. Real world experiments have demonstrated: (1) The retargeted dex-hand trajectories achieve an 84\% success rate across 10 diverse object manipulation tasks. (2) VLA policies (Pi0.5) trained exclusively on our generated data achieve 80\% average success rate on three representative tasks, i.e., pick-and-place, pushing and pouring. To conclude, robot training data can be efficiently "painted" from human demonstrations using our real-sim-real data pipeline. We offer a scalable, cost-effective alternative to teleoperation with minimal performance loss for complex dexterous manipulation.

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了一种“实-仿-实”数据收集和编辑流程，无需机器人遥操作，即可将人类演示转化为机器人可执行、环境特定的训练数据，从而解决机器人灵巧操作数据收集瓶颈。
AI.motivation: 为了扩展视觉-语言-动作（VLA）模型在灵巧操作中的应用，获取大规模、高保真度的机器人演示数据是一个关键瓶颈。
AI.method: 构建标准化数据收集房间，捕获多模态人类演示（RGB-D视频、RGB视频、手套关节角度、触觉信号）。提出一种触觉感知的重定向方法，通过几何和力导向优化将人类手部状态映射到机器人灵巧手状态。在Isaac Sim环境中渲染重定向后的机器人轨迹，生成机器人训练数据。
AI.result: 重定向后的灵巧手轨迹在10个不同的物体操作任务中实现了84%的成功率。仅使用生成数据训练的VLA策略（Pi0.5）在pick-and-place、pushing和pouring三个代表性任务上取得了80%的平均成功率。
AI.conclusion: 提出的“实-仿-实”数据流程可以高效地从人类演示中生成机器人训练数据，为复杂灵巧操作提供了一种可扩展、成本效益高且性能损失最小的替代遥操作的方法。

title: GreekMMLU: A Native-Sourced Multitask Benchmark for Evaluating Language Models in Greek
summary: Large Language Models (LLMs) are commonly trained on multilingual corpora that include Greek, yet reliable evaluation benchmarks for Greek-particularly those based on authentic, native-sourced content-remain limited. Existing datasets are often machine-translated from English, failing to capture Greek linguistic and cultural characteristics. We introduce GreekMMLU, a native-sourced benchmark for massive multitask language understanding in Greek, comprising 21,805 multiple-choice questions across 45 subject areas, organized under a newly defined subject taxonomy and annotated with educational difficulty levels spanning primary to professional examinations. All questions are sourced or authored in Greek from academic, professional, and governmental exams. We publicly release 16,857 samples and reserve 4,948 samples for a private leaderboard to enable robust and contamination-resistant evaluation. Evaluations of over 80 open- and closed-source LLMs reveal substantial performance gaps between frontier and open-weight models, as well as between Greek-adapted models and general multilingual ones. Finally, we provide a systematic analysis of factors influencing performance-including model scale, adaptation, and prompting-and derive insights for improving LLM capabilities in Greek.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一个名为 GreekMMLU 的新型希腊语大规模多任务语言理解评估基准，该基准全部采用源自希腊语的真实内容，包含 21,805 道选择题，覆盖 45 个学科领域，并标注了从小学到专业考试的难度等级。研究评估了 80 多个大语言模型，揭示了不同模型在希腊语处理能力上的显著差距，并分析了影响模型性能的因素。
AI.motivation: 现有的希腊语评估基准大多是机器翻译而来，无法准确反映希腊语的语言和文化特性。研究旨在为大语言模型在希腊语上的评估提供一个更可靠、更具代表性的基准。
AI.method: 构建了一个包含 21,805 道选择题的 GreekMMLU 基准，这些题目源自希腊语的学术、专业和政府考试，并根据新的学科分类和教育难度等级进行组织和标注。研究还评估了超过 80 个大语言模型在该基准上的表现，并分析了模型规模、适配和提示等因素对性能的影响。
AI.result: 在 GreekMMLU 基准上，研究发现前沿模型和开源模型之间存在显著的性能差距，同时，专门适配希腊语的模型比通用多语言模型表现更好。研究还对影响模型性能的因素进行了系统性分析。
AI.conclusion: GreekMMLU 提供了一个更可靠的希腊语大语言模型评估工具。研究结果表明，当前大语言模型在希腊语上的表现仍有提升空间，尤其是在开源模型和通用多语言模型方面。通过模型规模、适配和提示等策略的优化，可以提高大语言模型在希腊语上的能力。

title: AirGlove: Exploring Egocentric 3D Hand Tracking and Appearance Generalization for Sensing Gloves
summary: Sensing gloves have become important tools for teleoperation and robotic policy learning as they are able to provide rich signals like speed, acceleration and tactile feedback. A common approach to track gloved hands is to directly use the sensor signals (e.g., angular velocity, gravity orientation) to estimate 3D hand poses. However, sensor-based tracking can be restrictive in practice as the accuracy is often impacted by sensor signal and calibration quality. Recent advances in vision-based approaches have achieved strong performance on human hands via large-scale pre-training, but their performance on gloved hands with distinct visual appearances remains underexplored. In this work, we present the first systematic evaluation of vision-based hand tracking models on gloved hands under both zero-shot and fine-tuning setups. Our analysis shows that existing bare-hand models suffer from substantial performance degradation on sensing gloves due to large appearance gap between bare-hand and glove designs. We therefore propose AirGlove, which leverages existing gloves to generalize the learned glove representations towards new gloves with limited data. Experiments with multiple sensing gloves show that AirGlove effectively generalizes the hand pose models to new glove designs and achieves a significant performance boost over the compared schemes.

AI.tldr: 现有基于视觉的手部追踪模型在感应手套上的表现不佳，主要原因是外观差异。本文提出的AirGlove通过利用现有手套数据来学习通用手套表示，能够有效泛化到新的手套设计，并在有限数据下显著提升性能。
AI.motivation: 感应手套在远程操作和机器人策略学习中很重要，但传感器追踪的准确性受信号和校准质量影响。现有视觉模型在裸手追踪上表现优异，但在感应手套上的表现未得到充分研究，且存在外观差异问题。
AI.method: 1. 系统性评估现有基于视觉的手部追踪模型在感应手套上的零样本和微调性能。 2. 提出AirGlove方法，利用现有手套数据学习通用手套表示，并泛化到新设计的、仅有少量数据的手套上。
AI.result: 现有裸手追踪模型在感应手套上性能大幅下降。AirGlove方法能够有效泛化手部姿态模型到新的手套设计，并显著优于对比方案。
AI.conclusion: 外观差异是导致现有视觉手部追踪模型在感应手套上性能下降的主要原因。AirGlove通过学习通用手套表示，克服了这一挑战，实现了对手套追踪性能的有效提升。

title: Toward Operationalizing Rasmussen: Drift Observability on the Simplex for Evolving Systems
summary: Monitoring drift into failure is hindered by Euclidean anomaly detection that can conflate safe operational trade-offs with risk accumulation in signals expressed as shares, and by architectural churn that makes fixed schemas (and learned models) stale before rare boundary events occur. Rasmussen's dynamic safety model motivates drift under competing pressures, but operationalizing it for software is difficult because many high-value operational signals (effort, remaining margin, incident impact) are compositional and their parts evolve. We propose a vision for drift observability on the simplex: model drift and boundary proximity in Aitchison geometry to obtain coordinate-invariant direction and distance-to-safety in interpretable balance coordinates. To remain comparable under churn, a monitor would continuously refresh its part inventory and policy-defined boundaries from engineering artifacts and apply lineage-aware aggregation. We outline early-warning diagnostics and falsifiable hypotheses for future evaluation.

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了一种新的漂移检测方法，利用Aitchison几何学在单纯形上对软件运营信号进行建模，以解决现有方法因欧氏距离和架构变更而导致的局限性。
AI.motivation: 传统的欧氏距离异常检测方法难以区分安全的权衡和风险累积，并且架构的频繁变动会导致模型过时，无法及时检测到罕见的边界事件。此外，将高价值运营信号（如资源投入、剩余利润、事故影响）进行软件化操作存在困难，因为这些信号通常是组合式的且其组成部分会不断演变。
AI.method: 该研究提出了一种在单纯形上进行漂移可观测性的方法，将漂移和边界接近度建模在Aitchison几何空间中。利用这种几何空间，可以获得坐标不变的方向和到安全边界的距离（以可解释的平衡坐标表示）。为了应对架构变更，监测器可以持续更新其组件库存和策略定义的边界，并利用血缘关系感知进行聚合。
AI.result: 该研究概述了早期预警诊断和可证伪的假设，为未来的评估奠定了基础。通过在Aitchison几何空间中建模，可以实现对漂移的更精确检测和对安全边界的更可靠度量。
AI.conclusion: 在Aitchison几何空间中对软件运营信号进行建模，可以克服现有漂移检测方法的不足，提供一种对架构变更更鲁棒、更具可解释性的漂移监测方案，并有望实现更有效的早期预警。

title: Evaluating Robustness and Adaptability in Learning-Based Mission Planning for Active Debris Removal
comment: Presented at Conference: International Conference on Space Robotics (ISPARO,2025) At: Sendai,Japan
summary: Autonomous mission planning for Active Debris Removal (ADR) must balance efficiency, adaptability, and strict feasibility constraints on fuel and mission duration. This work compares three planners for the constrained multi-debris rendezvous problem in Low Earth Orbit: a nominal Masked Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO) policy trained under fixed mission parameters, a domain-randomized Masked PPO policy trained across varying mission constraints for improved robustness, and a plain Monte Carlo Tree Search (MCTS) baseline. Evaluations are conducted in a high-fidelity orbital simulation with refueling, realistic transfer dynamics, and randomized debris fields across 300 test cases in nominal, reduced fuel, and reduced mission time scenarios. Results show that nominal PPO achieves top performance when conditions match training but degrades sharply under distributional shift, while domain-randomized PPO exhibits improved adaptability with only moderate loss in nominal performance. MCTS consistently handles constraint changes best due to online replanning but incurs orders-of-magnitude higher computation time. The findings underline a trade-off between the speed of learned policies and the adaptability of search-based methods, and suggest that combining training-time diversity with online planning could be a promising path for future resilient ADR mission planners.

AI.tldr: 本研究比较了三种自主任务规划器在主动碎片清除（ADR）任务中处理多碎片交会问题，包括名义PPO、领域随机化PPO和MCTS。研究发现，领域随机化PPO在适应性方面表现优于名义PPO，而MCTS在处理约束变化方面表现最好但计算成本高昂。
AI.motivation: 为了实现高效、适应性强且满足燃料和任务时长的严格约束的自主主动碎片清除（ADR）任务规划，需要比较不同的规划策略。
AI.method: 本文比较了三种规划器：在固定任务参数下训练的名义Masked Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO)策略，在变化任务约束下训练以提高鲁棒性的领域随机化Masked PPO策略，以及一个基础的Monte Carlo Tree Search (MCTS)基线。评估在具有燃料补充、真实转移动力学和随机碎片场的全保真轨道模拟中进行，涵盖了名义、燃料减少和任务时间减少等300个测试案例。
AI.result: 名义PPO在训练条件匹配时表现最佳，但在分布变化下性能急剧下降。领域随机化PPO通过训练时的多样性展示了更好的适应性，且名义性能仅有适度损失。MCTS由于在线重规划，在处理约束变化方面表现最佳，但计算时间增加了几个数量级。
AI.conclusion: 研究强调了学习策略的速度与基于搜索方法适应性之间的权衡。结合训练时的多样性和在线规划可能是未来开发具有韧性的ADR任务规划器的有前途的途径。

title: Among Us: Measuring and Mitigating Malicious Contributions in Model Collaboration Systems
summary: Language models (LMs) are increasingly used in collaboration: multiple LMs trained by different parties collaborate through routing systems, multi-agent debate, model merging, and more. Critical safety risks remain in this decentralized paradigm: what if some of the models in multi-LLM systems are compromised or malicious? We first quantify the impact of malicious models by engineering four categories of malicious LMs, plug them into four types of popular model collaboration systems, and evaluate the compromised system across 10 datasets. We find that malicious models have a severe impact on the multi-LLM systems, especially for reasoning and safety domains where performance is lowered by 7.12% and 7.94% on average. We then propose mitigation strategies to alleviate the impact of malicious components, by employing external supervisors that oversee model collaboration to disable/mask them out to reduce their influence. On average, these strategies recover 95.31% of the initial performance, while making model collaboration systems fully resistant to malicious models remains an open research question.

AI.tldr: 该研究调查了多语言模型（LM）协作系统中的安全风险，特别是恶意LM的潜在影响。研究人员开发了四种类型的恶意LM，并将其集成到四种流行的协作系统中，发现在推理和安全领域性能显著下降。为应对这一问题，研究提出了一种外部监督策略，该策略能够恢复大部分性能并提高系统对恶意模型的抵抗力，但完全消除风险仍是未来的研究方向。
AI.motivation: 随着多语言模型（LM）在协作系统中的广泛应用，例如通过路由系统、多智能体辩论和模型合并等，存在一个关键的安全风险：部分模型可能被攻击者操纵或成为恶意模型。本研究的动机是量化这种风险并提出应对策略。
AI.method: 研究人员首先设计了四类恶意LM，并将它们集成到四种流行的模型协作系统中，使用10个数据集进行评估。随后，研究提出了一个外部监督策略，该策略通过监视模型协作并禁用或屏蔽恶意模型来减轻其影响。
AI.result: 研究发现，恶意模型对多LM系统的性能产生严重负面影响，尤其是在推理和安全领域，平均性能分别下降了7.12%和7.94%。然而，提出的外部监督策略平均恢复了95.31%的初始性能。
AI.conclusion: 恶意模型对多LM协作系统构成重大安全威胁，但通过引入外部监督器可以有效减轻其负面影响，恢复大部分系统性能。然而，完全实现多LM协作系统的恶意模型抵抗力仍然是一个开放的研究问题。

title: Fairness-aware design of nudging policies under stochasticity and prejudices
summary: We present an injustice-aware innovation-diffusion model extending the Generalized Linear Threshold framework by assigning agents activation thresholds drawn from a Beta distribution to capture the stochastic nature of adoption shaped by inequalities. Because incentive policies themselves can inadvertently amplify these inequalities, building on this model, we design a fair Model Predictive Control (MPC) scheme that incorporates equality and equity objectives for allocating incentives. Simulations using real mobility-habit data show that injustice reduces overall adoption, while equality smooths incentive distribution and equity reduces disparities in the final outcomes. Thus, incorporating fairness ensures effective diffusion without exacerbating existing social inequalities.

AI.tldr: 研究提出了一种考虑不公正因素的创新扩散模型，并在此基础上设计了一种公平的MPC激励分配方案，以避免加剧社会不平等。
AI.motivation: 现有创新扩散模型未能充分考虑社会不平等对用户采纳行为的影响，以及激励政策可能加剧这种不平等的问题。
AI.method: 1. 扩展了广义线性阈值框架，使用Beta分布为代理分配激活阈值，以模拟不平等带来的随机性。 2. 设计了一种公平的模型预测控制（MPC）方案，将平等和公平目标纳入激励分配。
AI.result: 模拟结果表明，不公正会降低整体采纳率；平等性可以平滑激励分配；公平性可以减少最终结果的差异。公平性确保了有效的扩散，而不会加剧现有的社会不平等。
AI.conclusion: 将公平性纳入创新扩散模型和激励分配策略，是实现有效技术采纳并同时减少社会不平等的关键。

title: Benchmarking Affordance Generalization with BusyBox
summary:
Vision-Language-Action (VLA) models have been attracting the attention of researchers and practitioners thanks to their promise of generalization. Although single-task policies still offer competitive performance, VLAs are increasingly able to handle commands and environments unseen in their training set. While generalization in vision and language space is undoubtedly important for robust versatile behaviors, a key meta-skill VLAs need to possess is affordance generalization -- the ability to manipulate new objects with familiar physical features.
  In this work, we present BusyBox, a physical benchmark for systematic semi-automatic evaluation of VLAs' affordance generalization. BusyBox consists of 6 modules with switches, sliders, wires, buttons, a display, and a dial. The modules can be swapped and rotated to create a multitude of BusyBox variations with different visual appearances but the same set of affordances. We empirically demonstrate that generalization across BusyBox variants is highly challenging even for strong open-weights VLAs such as $π_{0.5}$ and GR00T-N1.6. To encourage the research community to evaluate their own VLAs on BusyBox and to propose new affordance generalization experiments, we have designed BusyBox to be easy to build in most robotics labs. We release the full set of CAD files for 3D-printing its parts as well as a bill of materials for (optionally) assembling its electronics. We also publish a dataset of language-annotated demonstrations that we collected using the common bimanual Mobile Aloha robot on the canonical BusyBox configuration. All of the released materials are available at https://microsoft.github.io/BusyBox.

AI.tldr: 该论文介绍了 BusyBox，一个用于评估视觉-语言-动作（VLA）模型在操作新物体方面的泛化能力的物理基准。实验表明，即使是强大的 VLA 模型在处理具有相同可操作性的不同视觉外观的 BusyBox 变体时也面临挑战。研究人员还发布了 BusyBox 的设计文件、材料清单以及一个包含语言标注演示的数据集，以促进 VLA 模型在可操作性泛化方面的研究。
AI.motivation: 视觉-语言-动作（VLA）模型在泛化方面展现出巨大潜力，但其在操作新物体（即可操作性泛化）方面的能力仍需提高，这对于实现更通用的机器人行为至关重要。
AI.method: 提出了 BusyBox 物理基准，包含多种可交换和旋转的模块（如开关、滑块、按钮等），用于系统地评估 VLA 模型在不同视觉外观但具有相同可操作性的环境中的泛化能力。通过在 BusyBox 变体上测试 $π_{0.5}$ 和 GR00T-N1.6 等模型来评估其性能。
AI.result: 即使是强大的开源 VLA 模型（如 $π_{0.5}$ 和 GR00T-N1.6）在 BusyBox 变体之间的泛化能力也面临严峻挑战，表明可操作性泛化是 VLA 模型的一个重要研究方向。
AI.conclusion: BusyBox 是一个易于构建的物理基准，能够有效评估 VLA 模型的可操作性泛化能力。该研究鼓励社区进一步探索 VLA 模型在这一领域的能力，并提供了相关设计文件、材料清单和演示数据集以支持研究。

title: GAMMS: Graph based Adversarial Multiagent Modeling Simulator
summary: As intelligent systems and multi-agent coordination become increasingly central to real-world applications, there is a growing need for simulation tools that are both scalable and accessible. Existing high-fidelity simulators, while powerful, are often computationally expensive and ill-suited for rapid prototyping or large-scale agent deployments. We present GAMMS (Graph based Adversarial Multiagent Modeling Simulator), a lightweight yet extensible simulation framework designed to support fast development and evaluation of agent behavior in environments that can be represented as graphs. GAMMS emphasizes five core objectives: scalability, ease of use, integration-first architecture, fast visualization feedback, and real-world grounding. It enables efficient simulation of complex domains such as urban road networks and communication systems, supports integration with external tools (e.g., machine learning libraries, planning solvers), and provides built-in visualization with minimal configuration. GAMMS is agnostic to policy type, supporting heuristic, optimization-based, and learning-based agents, including those using large language models. By lowering the barrier to entry for researchers and enabling high-performance simulations on standard hardware, GAMMS facilitates experimentation and innovation in multi-agent systems, autonomous planning, and adversarial modeling. The framework is open-source and available at https://github.com/GAMMSim/GAMMS/

AI.tldr: GAMMS是一个轻量级、可扩展的基于图的多智能体仿真框架，旨在促进快速开发和评估智能体行为，支持大规模部署，并易于集成机器学习库等外部工具。
AI.motivation: 现实世界应用中智能系统和多智能体协调日益重要，但现有高保真仿真器计算成本高，不适合快速原型开发和大规模部署，因此需要一种可扩展且易于访问的仿真工具。
AI.method: 提出GAMMS（Graph based Adversarial Multiagent Modeling Simulator）框架，采用基于图的模型，强调可扩展性、易用性、集成优先架构、快速可视化反馈和现实世界关联。支持多种类型的智能体（启发式、优化、学习式，包括LLM），并能与外部工具集成。
AI.result: GAMMS能够高效仿真城市路网和通信系统等复杂领域，提供最小配置即可实现的内置可视化，支持不同策略类型的智能体，并在标准硬件上实现高性能仿真。
AI.conclusion: GAMMS通过降低研究门槛和实现高性能仿真，促进了多智能体系统、自主规划和对抗建模领域的实验和创新，该框架已开源。

title: The Single-Multi Evolution Loop for Self-Improving Model Collaboration Systems
summary: Model collaboration -- systems where multiple language models (LMs) collaborate -- combines the strengths of diverse models with cost in loading multiple LMs. We improve efficiency while preserving the strengths of collaboration by distilling collaborative patterns into a single model, where the model is trained on the outputs of the model collaboration system. At inference time, only the distilled model is employed: it imitates the collaboration while only incurring the cost of a single model. Furthermore, we propose the single-multi evolution loop: multiple LMs collaborate, each distills from the collaborative outputs, and these post-distillation improved LMs collaborate again, forming a collective evolution ecosystem where models evolve and self-improve by interacting with an environment of other models. Extensive experiments with 7 collaboration strategies and 15 tasks (QA, reasoning, factuality, etc.) demonstrate that: 1) individual models improve by 8.0% on average, absorbing the strengths of collaboration while reducing the cost to a single model; 2) the collaboration also benefits from the stronger and more synergistic LMs after distillation, improving over initial systems without evolution by 14.9% on average. Analysis reveals that the single-multi evolution loop outperforms various existing evolutionary AI methods, is compatible with diverse model/collaboration/distillation settings, and helps solve problems where the initial model/system struggles to.

AI.tldr: 研究提出了一种模型协作蒸馏方法，将多个语言模型的协作模式压缩到一个单一模型中，以提高效率并保留协作优势。同时，还提出了单-多模型演化循环，使模型能够通过相互协作和蒸馏进行自我改进。
AI.motivation: 为了在利用多模型协作优势的同时，降低加载和运行多个语言模型的成本，并进一步提升协作系统的性能。
AI.method: 通过蒸馏多模型协作系统的输出，训练一个单一模型来模仿协作模式。提出了单-多模型演化循环，其中多个模型协作，每个模型从协作输出中蒸馏，然后这些改进后的模型再次协作，形成一个集体演化生态系统。
AI.result: 1. 单一蒸馏模型平均提高了8.0%，同时将成本降低到单个模型。2. 经过蒸馏和演化的模型组成的协作系统，性能比初始系统平均提高了14.9%。
AI.conclusion: 单-多模型演化循环是一种有效的模型协作和自我改进方法，它超越了现有的演化人工智能方法，并且具有良好的兼容性和适应性，能够解决初始模型难以处理的问题。

title: Ontology-Driven Robotic Specification Synthesis
summary: This paper addresses robotic system engineering for safety- and mission-critical applications by bridging the gap between high-level objectives and formal, executable specifications. The proposed method, Robotic System Task to Model Transformation Methodology (RSTM2) is an ontology-driven, hierarchical approach using stochastic timed Petri nets with resources, enabling Monte Carlo simulations at mission, system, and subsystem levels. A hypothetical case study demonstrates how the RSTM2 method supports architectural trades, resource allocation, and performance analysis under uncertainty. Ontological concepts further enable explainable AI-based assistants, facilitating fully autonomous specification synthesis. The methodology offers particular benefits to complex multi-robot systems, such as the NASA CADRE mission, representing decentralized, resource-aware, and adaptive autonomous systems of the future.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为RSTM2的本体驱动方法，用于将机器人系统的任务转化为可执行的规范，并支持蒙特卡洛仿真，以应对复杂和任务关键型应用中的不确定性。
AI.motivation: 旨在解决机器人系统工程中，高层目标与形式化、可执行规范之间的差距，特别是在安全和任务关键型应用中。
AI.method: 采用本体驱动的、分层的RSTM2方法，利用带资源的随机时序Petri网，支持任务到模型的转换，并进行蒙特卡洛仿真。
AI.result: 通过一个假设的案例研究，证明了RSTM2方法在支持架构权衡、资源分配和不确定性下的性能分析方面的能力。本体概念还支持可解释的AI助手，实现自主规范合成。
AI.conclusion: RSTM2方法为复杂多机器人系统（如NASA CADRE任务）提供了显著优势，能够表示去中心化、资源感知和自适应的未来自主系统。

title: SHaSaM: Submodular Hard Sample Mining for Fair Facial Attribute Recognition
summary: Deep neural networks often inherit social and demographic biases from annotated data during model training, leading to unfair predictions, especially in the presence of sensitive attributes like race, age, gender etc. Existing methods fall prey to the inherent data imbalance between attribute groups and inadvertently emphasize on sensitive attributes, worsening unfairness and performance. To surmount these challenges, we propose SHaSaM (Submodular Hard Sample Mining), a novel combinatorial approach that models fairness-driven representation learning as a submodular hard-sample mining problem. Our two-stage approach comprises of SHaSaM-MINE, which introduces a submodular subset selection strategy to mine hard positives and negatives - effectively mitigating data imbalance, and SHaSaM-LEARN, which introduces a family of combinatorial loss functions based on Submodular Conditional Mutual Information to maximize the decision boundary between target classes while minimizing the influence of sensitive attributes. This unified formulation restricts the model from learning features tied to sensitive attributes, significantly enhancing fairness without sacrificing performance. Experiments on CelebA and UTKFace demonstrate that SHaSaM achieves state-of-the-art results, with up to 2.7 points improvement in model fairness (Equalized Odds) and a 3.5% gain in Accuracy, within fewer epochs as compared to existing methods.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为SHaSaM（Submodular Hard Sample Mining）的新型组合方法，通过子模块化硬样本挖掘和组合损失函数来解决深度神经网络中的偏见问题，提高了公平性和准确性。
AI.motivation: 深度神经网络在训练过程中会继承标注数据中的社会和人口偏见，导致预测不公平，尤其是在存在种族、年龄、性别等敏感属性时。现有的方法往往会因数据不平衡而加剧不公平性。
AI.method: 该方法包含两个阶段：1. SHaSaM-MINE：采用子模块化子集选择策略挖掘困难正负样本，缓解数据不平衡。2. SHaSaM-LEARN：引入基于子模块化条件互信息的组合损失函数，最大化目标类别之间的决策边界，同时最小化敏感属性的影响。
AI.result: 在CelebA和UTKFace数据集上的实验表明，SHaSaM在模型公平性（Equalized Odds）方面提高了2.7个百分点，在准确率方面提高了3.5%，并且比现有方法需要更少的训练周期。
AI.conclusion: SHaSaM是一种新颖的组合方法，能够有效地解决深度学习中的偏见问题，通过限制模型学习与敏感属性相关的特征，在不牺牲性能的前提下显著提高公平性。

title: Observer-based Control of Multi-agent Systems under STL Specifications
comment: This paper has been submitted for consideration to the 23rd IFAC World Congress
summary: This paper proposes a decentralized controller for large-scale heterogeneous multi-agent systems subject to bounded external disturbances, where agents must satisfy Signal Temporal Logic (STL) specifications requiring cooperation among non-communicating agents. To address the lack of direct communication, we employ a decentralized k-hop Prescribed Performance State Observer (k-hop PPSO) to provide each agent with state estimates of those agents it cannot communicate with. By leveraging the performance bounds on the state estimation errors guaranteed by the k-hop PPSO, we first modify the space robustness of the STL tasks to account for these errors, and then exploit the modified robustness to design a decentralized continuous-time feedback controller that ensures satisfaction of the STL tasks even under worst-case estimation errors. A simulation result is provided to validate the proposed framework.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种去中心化的控制器，用于处理受限外部干扰的大规模异构多智能体系统，使其能够满足涉及非通信智能体合作的信号时序逻辑（STL）规范。
AI.motivation: 研究动机是为无法直接通信的大规模异构多智能体系统设计一种去中心化控制器，使其能够满足具有合作要求的STL规范，同时考虑外部干扰和状态估计误差。
AI.method: 使用去中心化的k-hop Prescribed Performance State Observer (k-hop PPSO)为无法通信的智能体提供状态估计。利用k-hop PPSO保证的状态估计误差性能边界，修改STL任务的空间鲁棒性，并基于修改后的鲁棒性设计去中心化连续时间反馈控制器。
AI.result: 该方法能够设计出确保STL任务即使在最坏估计误差下也能满足的去中心化控制器。仿真结果验证了所提出框架的有效性。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的去中心化控制器框架能够有效处理大规模异构多智能体系统中的外部干扰和通信限制，并成功满足涉及合作的STL规范。

title: LOBSTgER-enhance: an underwater image enhancement pipeline
comment: 12 pages, 30 figures, work done as part of LOBSTgER
summary:
Underwater photography presents significant inherent challenges including reduced contrast, spatial blur, and wavelength-dependent color distortions. These effects can obscure the vibrancy of marine life and awareness photographers in particular are often challenged with heavy post-processing pipelines to correct for these distortions.
  We develop an image-to-image pipeline that learns to reverse underwater degradations by introducing a synthetic corruption pipeline and learning to reverse its effects with diffusion-based generation. Training and evaluation are performed on a small high-quality dataset of awareness photography images by Keith Ellenbogen. The proposed methodology achieves high perceptual consistency and strong generalization in synthesizing 512x768 images using a model of ~11M parameters after training from scratch on ~2.5k images.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种基于扩散模型的图像到图像转换方法，用于修复水下摄影中由于光线衰减、散射和颜色偏移造成的图像质量下降问题。
AI.motivation: 水下摄影存在对比度降低、空间模糊和颜色失真等固有挑战，影响图像质量，摄影师需要繁琐的后期处理来校正这些问题。
AI.method: 开发了一个图像到图像转换流程，通过引入一个合成腐蚀模型来模拟水下退化，并利用基于扩散生成模型学习逆转这些退化效应。
AI.result: 在 Keith Ellenbogen 的小型高质量水下摄影数据集上进行了训练和评估，该方法在合成 512x768 图像时实现了高感知一致性和强大的泛化能力，模型参数量约 1100 万，训练数据量约 2500 张。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的基于扩散模型的图像修复方法能够有效地逆转水下摄影的图像退化，生成高质量的图像，并且具有良好的泛化性。

title: Are Open-Weight LLMs Ready for Social Media Moderation? A Comparative Study on Bluesky
summary:
As internet access expands, so does exposure to harmful content, increasing the need for effective moderation. Research has demonstrated that large language models (LLMs) can be effectively utilized for social media moderation tasks, including harmful content detection. While proprietary LLMs have been shown to zero-shot outperform traditional machine learning models, the out-of-the-box capability of open-weight LLMs remains an open question.
  Motivated by recent developments of reasoning LLMs, we evaluate seven state-of-the-art models: four proprietary and three open-weight. Testing with real-world posts on Bluesky, moderation decisions by Bluesky Moderation Service, and annotations by two authors, we find a considerable degree of overlap between the sensitivity (81%--97%) and specificity (91%--100%) of the open-weight LLMs and those (72%--98%, and 93%--99%) of the proprietary ones. Additionally, our analysis reveals that specificity exceeds sensitivity for rudeness detection, but the opposite holds for intolerance and threats. Lastly, we identify inter-rater agreement across human moderators and the LLMs, highlighting considerations for deploying LLMs in both platform-scale and personalized moderation contexts. These findings show open-weight LLMs can support privacy-preserving moderation on consumer-grade hardware and suggest new directions for designing moderation systems that balance community values with individual user preferences.

AI.tldr: 研究表明，开源大型语言模型（LLM）在社交媒体内容审核方面的性能与专有LLM相当，尤其是在敏感性和特异性方面，这为在消费者级硬件上实现隐私保护的内容审核提供了可能性。
AI.motivation: 随着互联网内容的增长，对有效的内容审核需求日益增加。尽管专有LLM在内容审核方面表现出色，但开源LLM的实际能力仍不明确，这促使了本研究。
AI.method: 研究评估了七个最先进的LLM（四个专有，三个开源），使用Bluesky上的真实帖子和人工标注数据进行测试，并分析了LLM与人工审核者在敏感性和特异性上的表现，以及它们之间的一致性。
AI.result: 开源LLM在敏感性（81%-97%）和特异性（91%-100%）方面与专有LLM（72%-98%，93%-99%）表现出高度重叠。研究还发现，在检测粗鲁言论时特异性高于敏感性，而检测不宽容和威胁言论时则相反。
AI.conclusion: 开源LLM在内容审核方面具有与专有LLM相当的能力，可以在消费者级硬件上实现隐私保护的内容审核。研究结果为设计平衡社区价值和用户偏好的内容审核系统提供了新的方向。

title: UAV Trajectory Optimization via Improved Noisy Deep Q-Network
summary: This paper proposes an Improved Noisy Deep Q-Network (Noisy DQN) to enhance the exploration and stability of Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (UAV) when applying deep reinforcement learning in simulated environments. This method enhances the exploration ability by combining the residual NoisyLinear layer with an adaptive noise scheduling mechanism, while improving training stability through smooth loss and soft target network updates. Experiments show that the proposed model achieves faster convergence and up to $+40$ higher rewards compared to standard DQN and quickly reach to the minimum number of steps required for the task 28 in the 15 * 15 grid navigation environment set up. The results show that our comprehensive improvements to the network structure of NoisyNet, exploration control, and training stability contribute to enhancing the efficiency and reliability of deep Q-learning.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种改进的带噪声深度Q网络（Noisy DQN），以提高无人机（UAV）在模拟环境中应用深度强化学习时的探索能力和稳定性。
AI.motivation: 现有深度强化学习方法在无人机应用中存在探索能力不足和训练不稳定的问题，需要改进以提高效率和可靠性。
AI.method: 通过结合残差带噪声线性层（residual NoisyLinear layer）和自适应噪声调度机制来增强探索能力；通过平滑损失函数和软目标网络更新来提高训练稳定性。
AI.result: 在15x15网格导航环境中，所提出的模型比标准DQN收敛更快，奖励提高了高达40%，并且能更快达到任务所需的最少步数（28步）。
AI.conclusion: 对网络结构、探索控制和训练稳定性的全面改进，显著提高了深度Q学习在无人机任务中的效率和可靠性。

title: Understanding LLM Evaluator Behavior: A Structured Multi-Evaluator Framework for Merchant Risk Assessment
summary: Large Language Models (LLMs) are increasingly used as evaluators of reasoning quality, yet their reliability and bias in payments-risk settings remain poorly understood. We introduce a structured multi-evaluator framework for assessing LLM reasoning in Merchant Category Code (MCC)-based merchant risk assessment, combining a five-criterion rubric with Monte-Carlo scoring to evaluate rationale quality and evaluator stability. Five frontier LLMs generate and cross-evaluate MCC risk rationales under attributed and anonymized conditions. To establish a judge-independent reference, we introduce a consensus-deviation metric that eliminates circularity by comparing each judge's score to the mean of all other judges, yielding a theoretically grounded measure of self-evaluation and cross-model deviation. Results reveal substantial heterogeneity: GPT-5.1 and Claude 4.5 Sonnet show negative self-evaluation bias (-0.33, -0.31), while Gemini-2.5 Pro and Grok 4 display positive bias (+0.77, +0.71), with bias attenuating by 25.8 percent under anonymization. Evaluation by 26 payment-industry experts shows LLM judges assign scores averaging +0.46 points above human consensus, and that the negative bias of GPT-5.1 and Claude 4.5 Sonnet reflects closer alignment with human judgment. Ground-truth validation using payment-network data shows four models exhibit statistically significant alignment (Spearman rho = 0.56 to 0.77), confirming that the framework captures genuine quality. Overall, the framework provides a replicable basis for evaluating LLM-as-a-judge systems in payment-risk workflows and highlights the need for bias-aware protocols in operational financial settings.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种评估大型语言模型（LLM）在支付风险场景下推理质量的多评估者框架，结合了评分标准和蒙特卡洛评分方法。研究发现不同 LLM 存在显著的评估偏差，匿名化可以减轻偏差。LLM 评估结果与人类专家评估存在差异，但与支付网络数据的相关性验证了框架的有效性。
AI.motivation: 大型语言模型（LLM）被广泛用作评估推理质量的工具，但在支付风险评估等关键领域，其可靠性和偏差尚不明确。本研究旨在填补这一空白，提供一种系统性的方法来评估 LLM 在商户类别代码（MCC）风险评估中的表现。
AI.method: 研究者开发了一个结构化的多评估者框架，包含一个五项评分标准和蒙特卡洛评分技术，用于评估 LLM 生成的风险评估理由的质量和评估者的稳定性。五个前沿 LLM 在有/无归属条件下生成并交叉评估 MCC 风险理由。引入了一个共识-偏差度量指标，通过比较每个评估者的得分与其他所有评估者得分的平均值来消除循环评估，从而获得一个理论上合理的自我评估和交叉模型偏差度量。
AI.result: 研究结果显示 LLM 评估中存在显著的异质性：GPT-5.1 和 Claude 4.5 Sonnet 表现出负的自我评估偏差（-0.33, -0.31），而 Gemini-2.5 Pro 和 Grok 4 则表现出正偏差（+0.77, +0.71）。匿名化处理使偏差减少了 25.8%。26 位支付行业专家的评估表明，LLM 评估者的得分平均比人类共识高 +0.46 分，并且 GPT-5.1 和 Claude 4.5 Sonnet 的负偏差与人类判断更吻合。使用支付网络数据进行的真实世界验证显示，有四个模型与真实情况有统计学上的显著一致性（Spearman rho = 0.56 至 0.77），证实了该框架能够捕捉到真实的质量。
AI.conclusion: 该框架为评估支付风险工作流程中 LLM 作为评估者的系统提供了可重复的基础，并强调了在实际金融应用中采用具有偏差意识的协议的必要性。研究表明，LLM 在支付风险评估中具有潜力，但需要仔细校准以确保准确性和可靠性。

title: TaSA: Two-Phased Deep Predictive Learning of Tactile Sensory Attenuation for Improving In-Grasp Manipulation
summary: Humans can achieve diverse in-hand manipulations, such as object pinching and tool use, which often involve simultaneous contact between the object and multiple fingers. This is still an open issue for robotic hands because such dexterous manipulation requires distinguishing between tactile sensations generated by their self-contact and those arising from external contact. Otherwise, object/robot breakage happens due to contacts/collisions. Indeed, most approaches ignore self-contact altogether, by constraining motion to avoid/ignore self-tactile information during contact. While this reduces complexity, it also limits generalization to real-world scenarios where self-contact is inevitable. Humans overcome this challenge through self-touch perception, using predictive mechanisms that anticipate the tactile consequences of their own motion, through a principle called sensory attenuation, where the nervous system differentiates predictable self-touch signals, allowing novel object stimuli to stand out as relevant. Deriving from this, we introduce TaSA, a two-phased deep predictive learning framework. In the first phase, TaSA explicitly learns self-touch dynamics, modeling how a robot's own actions generate tactile feedback. In the second phase, this learned model is incorporated into the motion learning phase, to emphasize object contact signals during manipulation. We evaluate TaSA on a set of insertion tasks, which demand fine tactile discrimination: inserting a pencil lead into a mechanical pencil, inserting coins into a slot, and fixing a paper clip onto a sheet of paper, with various orientations, positions, and sizes. Across all tasks, policies trained with TaSA achieve significantly higher success rates than baseline methods, demonstrating that structured tactile perception with self-touch based on sensory attenuation is critical for dexterous robotic manipulation.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为TaSA的深度预测学习框架，通过显式学习机器人自身的触觉动力学模型，并将其应用于运动学习，从而区分自主触碰和外部触碰的触觉信号，以提高机器人在精细操作任务中的成功率。
AI.motivation: 机器人手在执行多指协同操作任务时，难以区分自身接触和外部物体接触产生的触觉信号，这限制了其在复杂场景下的应用。人类通过感知衰减机制，能够区分可预测的自我触碰信号，从而突出新颖的外部物体刺激。研究者希望借鉴人类的这种能力，来解决机器人的触觉感知问题。
AI.method: TaSA是一个两阶段的深度预测学习框架。第一阶段，显式学习机器人自身触觉动力学，即机器人自身的动作如何产生触觉反馈。第二阶段，将学习到的模型整合到运动学习阶段，以强调物体接触信号，并实现对自主触碰信号的抑制。
AI.result: 在插入铅笔芯、硬币和回形针等精细操作任务中，采用TaSA训练的策略比基线方法取得了显著更高的成功率。实验表明，基于感知衰减的自主触碰结构化触觉感知对于灵巧的机器人操作至关重要。
AI.conclusion: 通过借鉴人类的感知衰减机制，TaSA框架能够有效地处理机器人自身的触觉信息，使其在执行需要精细触觉判别的复杂操作任务时表现出更好的性能。这表明结构化的触觉感知对于实现更高级的机器人操作是关键。

title: Democratic Preference Alignment via Sortition-Weighted RLHF
summary: Whose values should AI systems learn? Preference based alignment methods like RLHF derive their training signal from human raters, yet these rater pools are typically convenience samples that systematically over represent some demographics and under represent others. We introduce Democratic Preference Optimization, or DemPO, a framework that applies algorithmic sortition, the same mechanism used to construct citizen assemblies, to preference based fine tuning. DemPO offers two training schemes. Hard Panel trains exclusively on preferences from a quota satisfying mini public sampled via sortition. Soft Panel retains all data but reweights each rater by their inclusion probability under the sortition lottery. We prove that Soft Panel weighting recovers the expected Hard Panel objective in closed form. Using a public preference dataset that pairs human judgments with rater demographics and a seventy five clause constitution independently elicited from a representative United States panel, we evaluate Llama models from one billion to eight billion parameters fine tuned under each scheme. Across six aggregation methods, the Hard Panel consistently ranks first and the Soft Panel consistently outperforms the unweighted baseline, with effect sizes growing as model capacity increases. These results demonstrate that enforcing demographic representativeness at the preference collection stage, rather than post hoc correction, yields models whose behavior better reflects values elicited from representative publics.

AI.tldr: 研究提出了一种名为“民主偏好优化”（DemPO）的框架，通过算法抽签（类似公民大会机制）来改进基于偏好的AI模型对齐方法（如RLHF），以解决现有方法中抽样偏差的问题。DemPO有两种训练方案：Hard Panel（仅使用抽签采样的代表性公众的偏好）和Soft Panel（对所有数据进行加权）。实验表明，DemPO方案能使AI模型更好地反映代表性公众的价值观。
AI.motivation: 现有的基于偏好的AI模型对齐方法（如RLHF）依赖于人类评分者，但这些评分者通常是方便抽样，存在系统性的代表性偏差，导致模型学习到特定人群的价值观，而非更广泛公众的价值观。
AI.method: 提出了Democratic Preference Optimization (DemPO)框架，包含两种训练方案：1. Hard Panel：使用算法抽签（类似公民大会）抽取满足配额的代表性小群体，仅用该群体的偏好进行模型微调。2. Soft Panel：保留所有数据，但根据抽签过程中每个评分者的被选中概率对其偏好进行加权。理论证明了Soft Panel权重可以精确恢复Hard Panel的目标。
AI.result: 在Llama模型（10亿到80亿参数）上进行的实验，使用公开的包含评分者人口统计信息和代表性美国公众提出的宪法条款的偏好数据集。结果显示，在六种聚合方法下，Hard Panel方案始终排名第一，Soft Panel方案始终优于未加权基线，并且模型容量越大，效果差异越显著。
AI.conclusion: 在偏好收集阶段强制执行人口统计代表性，而非事后修正，能够训练出行为更能反映代表性公众价值观的AI模型。

title: ShapePuri: Shape Guided and Appearance Generalized Adversarial Purification
summary: Deep neural networks demonstrate impressive performance in visual recognition, but they remain vulnerable to adversarial attacks that is imperceptible to the human. Although existing defense strategies such as adversarial training and purification have achieved progress, diffusion-based purification often involves high computational costs and information loss. To address these challenges, we introduce Shape Guided Purification (ShapePuri), a novel defense framework enhances robustness by aligning model representations with stable structural invariants. ShapePuri integrates two components: a Shape Encoding Module (SEM) that provides dense geometric guidance through Signed Distance Functions (SDF), and a Global Appearance Debiasing (GAD) module that mitigates appearance bias via stochastic transformations. In our experiments, ShapePuri achieves $84.06\%$ clean accuracy and $81.64\%$ robust accuracy under the AutoAttack protocol, representing the first defense framework to surpass the $80\%$ threshold on this benchmark. Our approach provides a scalable and efficient adversarial defense that preserves prediction stability during inference without requiring auxiliary modules or additional computational cost.

title: Privacy-Preserving Dynamic Average Consensus by Masking Reference Signals
summary: In multi-agent systems, dynamic average consensus (DAC) is a decentralized estimation strategy in which a set of agents tracks the average of time-varying reference signals. Because DAC requires exchanging state information with neighbors, attackers may gain access to these states and infer private information. In this paper, we develop a privacy-preserving method that protects each agent's reference signal from external eavesdroppers and honest-but-curious agents while achieving the same convergence accuracy and convergence rate as conventional DAC. Our approach masks the reference signals by having each agent draw a random real number for each neighbor, exchanges that number over an encrypted channel at the initialization, and computes a masking value to form a masked reference. Then the agents run the conventional DAC algorithm using the masked references. Convergence and privacy analyses show that the proposed algorithm matches the convergence properties of conventional DAC while preserving the privacy of the reference signals. Numerical simulations validate the effectiveness of the proposed privacy-preserving DAC algorithm.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种隐私保护的动态平均共识（DAC）算法，通过引入随机掩码来保护代理的私有参考信号，同时保持与传统DAC相同的收敛性和精度。
AI.motivation: 为了解决多代理系统中，传统的动态平均共识（DAC）算法中代理状态信息容易被攻击者获取并推断私有信息的问题。
AI.method: 提出一种隐私保护方法，每个代理在初始化时为其邻居生成一个随机实数，通过加密通道交换这些随机数，并计算一个掩码值来形成一个掩码参考信号。然后，代理在掩码参考信号上运行传统的DAC算法。
AI.result: 收敛性和隐私性分析表明，所提出的算法在保持隐私性的同时，实现了与传统DAC算法相同的收敛性质。数值模拟验证了该算法的有效性。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的隐私保护DAC算法能够在保护代理参考信号隐私的同时，实现与传统DAC算法相同的收敛精度和收敛速率。

title: DECO: Decoupled Multimodal Diffusion Transformer for Bimanual Dexterous Manipulation with a Plugin Tactile Adapter
summary: Overview of the Proposed DECO Framework.} DECO is a DiT-based policy that decouples multimodal conditioning. Image and action tokens interact via joint self attention, while proprioceptive states and optional conditions are injected through adaptive layer normalization. Tactile signals are injected via cross attention, while a lightweight LoRA-based adapter is used to efficiently fine-tune the pretrained policy. DECO is also accompanied by DECO-50, a bimanual dexterous manipulation dataset with tactile sensing, consisting of 4 scenarios and 28 sub-tasks, covering more than 50 hours of data, approximately 5 million frames, and 8,000 successful trajectories.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为 DECO 的基于 DiT 的多模态策略，通过解耦图像、动作、本体感受状态、可选条件和触觉信号来增强策略性能，并引入了一个新的触觉感知的双手机器人精细操作数据集 DECO-50。
AI.motivation: 现有方法在融合多模态信息（如视觉、本体感受和触觉）以实现精细操作方面存在挑战。研究旨在通过解耦不同模态的条件，并设计一种高效的策略来整合这些信息，从而提升机器人的操作能力。
AI.method: DECO 采用基于 DiT（Diffusion Transformer）的策略，通过以下方式解耦多模态条件：1. 图像和动作令牌通过联合自注意力机制交互。2. 本体感受状态和可选条件通过自适应层归一化注入。3. 触觉信号通过交叉注意力注入。4. 使用轻量级的 LoRA（Low-Rank Adaptation）适配器进行高效微调。此外，研究还发布了一个名为 DECO-50 的新数据集。
AI.result: DECO 框架通过其解耦和高效的多模态信息融合机制，能够有效地处理和利用来自不同模态的输入。DECO-50 数据集包含了丰富的双手机器人精细操作场景和数据，为后续研究提供了宝贵资源。
AI.conclusion: DECO 框架通过解耦多模态条件并采用创新的信息融合方法，为提升机器人的精细操作能力提供了一种有效途径。新发布的 DECO-50 数据集为触觉感知的机器人精细操作研究奠定了基础。

title: Aligning Large Language Model Behavior with Human Citation Preferences
summary: Most services built on powerful large-scale language models (LLMs) add citations to their output to enhance credibility. Recent research has paid increasing attention to the question of what reference documents to link to outputs. However, how LLMs recognize cite-worthiness and how this process should be controlled remains underexplored. In this study, we focus on what kinds of content LLMs currently tend to cite and how well that behavior aligns with human preferences. We construct a dataset to characterize the relationship between human citation preferences and LLM behavior. Web-derived texts are categorized into eight citation-motivation types, and pairwise citation preferences are exhaustively evaluated across all type combinations to capture fine-grained contrasts. Our results show that humans most frequently seek citations for medical text, and stronger models display a similar tendency. We also find that current models are as much as $27\%$ more likely than humans to add citations to text that is explicitly marked as needing citations on sources such as Wikipedia, and this overemphasis reduces alignment accuracy. Conversely, models systematically underselect numeric sentences (by $-22.6\%$ relative to humans) and sentences containing personal names (by $-20.1\%$), categories for which humans typically demand citations. Furthermore, experiments with Direct Preference Optimization demonstrate that model behavior can be calibrated to better match human citation preferences. We expect this study to provide a foundation for more fine-grained investigations into LLM citation preferences.

AI.tldr: 本研究分析了大型语言模型（LLMs）在生成内容时选择引用的行为，并将其与人类的引用偏好进行比较。研究发现，LLMs倾向于引用医学文本，但过度引用标记为需要引用的文本，并低估了数字和人名句子的引用需求。通过DPO优化，模型行为可以被调整以更好地匹配人类偏好。
AI.motivation: 尽管LLMs输出常包含引用以增强可信度，但LLMs如何识别引用价值以及如何控制这一过程仍未被充分探索。本研究旨在了解LLMs当前倾向于引用哪些内容，以及这种行为与人类偏好的一致性。
AI.method: 研究构建了一个数据集，将网络文本分为八种引用动机类型，并对所有类型组合进行了详尽的成对引用偏好评估，以捕捉细微差异。随后，通过直接偏好优化（DPO）实验来校准模型行为。
AI.result: 研究表明，人类最常为医学文本寻求引用，较强的模型也显示出类似趋势。当前模型比人类更倾向于引用Wikipedia等来源中明确标记为需要引用的文本（高出27%），这降低了对齐精度。相反，模型系统性地低估了数字句子（低22.6%）和包含人名的句子（低20.1%）的引用需求，而这些正是人类通常要求引用的类别。
AI.conclusion: LLMs在引用选择上存在偏差，过度引用标记文本，而低估数字和人名句子的引用需求。通过DPO等方法，可以调整LLMs的引用行为，使其更符合人类的引用偏好。本研究为进一步细化LLMs的引用偏好研究奠定了基础。

title: PoseGaussian: Pose-Driven Novel View Synthesis for Robust 3D Human Reconstruction
summary: We propose PoseGaussian, a pose-guided Gaussian Splatting framework for high-fidelity human novel view synthesis. Human body pose serves a dual purpose in our design: as a structural prior, it is fused with a color encoder to refine depth estimation; as a temporal cue, it is processed by a dedicated pose encoder to enhance temporal consistency across frames. These components are integrated into a fully differentiable, end-to-end trainable pipeline. Unlike prior works that use pose only as a condition or for warping, PoseGaussian embeds pose signals into both geometric and temporal stages to improve robustness and generalization. It is specifically designed to address challenges inherent in dynamic human scenes, such as articulated motion and severe self-occlusion. Notably, our framework achieves real-time rendering at 100 FPS, maintaining the efficiency of standard Gaussian Splatting pipelines. We validate our approach on ZJU-MoCap, THuman2.0, and in-house datasets, demonstrating state-of-the-art performance in perceptual quality and structural accuracy (PSNR 30.86, SSIM 0.979, LPIPS 0.028).

AI.tldr: PoseGaussian 是一种新颖的姿态引导高斯泼溅框架，用于高质量的人体新视角合成，通过融合姿态信息来改进深度估计和时间一致性，实现了实时渲染和领先的性能。
AI.motivation: 动态人体场景（如关节运动和自遮挡）的新视角合成面临挑战，现有方法仅将姿态用作条件或用于扭曲，无法充分利用其结构和时间信息。
AI.method: 将姿态信息作为结构先验，与颜色编码器融合以改进深度估计；将姿态作为时间线索，通过专用姿态编码器增强时间一致性。这些被整合到一个可微分的端到端训练流程中。
AI.result: 在 ZJU-MoCap, THuman2.0 和内部数据集上实现了最先进的性能，在感知质量和结构准确性方面表现出色（PSNR 30.86, SSIM 0.979, LPIPS 0.028），并实现了 100 FPS 的实时渲染。
AI.conclusion: PoseGaussian 通过将姿态信息嵌入几何和时间阶段，有效解决了动态人体场景中的新视角合成问题，提高了鲁棒性和泛化能力，同时保持了高斯泼溅的高效渲染特性。

title: SocialVeil: Probing Social Intelligence of Language Agents under Communication Barriers
summary: Large language models (LLMs) are increasingly evaluated in interactive environments to test their social intelligence. However, existing benchmarks often assume idealized communication between agents, limiting our ability to diagnose whether LLMs can maintain and repair interactions in more realistic, imperfect settings. To close this gap, we present \textsc{SocialVeil}, a social learning environment that can simulate social interaction under cognitive-difference-induced communication barriers. Grounded in a systematic literature review of communication challenges in human interaction, \textsc{SocialVeil} introduces three representative types of such disruption, \emph{semantic vagueness}, \emph{sociocultural mismatch}, and \emph{emotional interference}. We also introduce two barrier-aware evaluation metrics, \emph{unresolved confusion} and \emph{mutual understanding}, to evaluate interaction quality under impaired communication. Experiments across 720 scenarios and four frontier LLMs show that barriers consistently impair performance, with mutual understanding reduced by over 45\% on average, and confusion elevated by nearly 50\%. Human evaluations validate the fidelity of these simulated barriers (ICC$\approx$0.78, Pearson r$\approx$0.80). We further demonstrate that adaptation strategies (Repair Instruction and Interactive learning) only have a modest effect far from barrier-free performance. This work takes a step toward bringing social interaction environments closer to real-world communication, opening opportunities for exploring the social intelligence of LLM agents.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一个名为SocialVeil的模拟环境，用于评估大型语言模型（LLMs）在存在语义模糊、文化差异和情绪干扰等现实通信障碍时的社交智能。研究发现，这些障碍会显著降低LLMs的互动质量，并且现有的适应性策略（如修复指令和互动学习）效果有限。
AI.motivation: 现有的大型语言模型（LLMs）评估基准通常假设理想化的通信环境，无法有效诊断LLMs在现实、不完美的通信设置下维护和修复互动关系的能力。
AI.method: 构建了一个名为SocialVeil的社交学习环境，模拟了由认知差异引起的通信障碍，包括语义模糊、文化不匹配和情绪干扰。同时，引入了“未解决的困惑”和“相互理解”两个评估指标来衡量互动质量。通过在720个场景下测试四种前沿LLMs，并进行人类评估来验证模拟障碍的有效性。
AI.result: 通信障碍会持续损害LLMs的性能，平均而言，“相互理解”降低超过45%，“困惑”升高近50%。人类评估验证了模拟障碍的真实性（ICC≈0.78，Pearson r≈0.80）。适应性策略（修复指令和互动学习）对缓解障碍的效果有限，远未达到无障碍环境下的性能。
AI.conclusion: SocialVeil环境为评估LLMs在真实通信场景下的社交智能提供了更接近现实的平台。研究表明，通信障碍对LLMs的互动能力有显著负面影响，现有的适应策略不足以完全克服这些挑战，需要进一步研究更有效的解决方案。

title: Virtual-Tube-Based Cooperative Transport Control for Multi-UAV Systems in Constrained Environments
summary: This paper proposes a novel control framework for cooperative transportation of cable-suspended loads by multiple unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs) operating in constrained environments. Leveraging virtual tube theory and principles from dissipative systems theory, the framework facilitates efficient multi-UAV collaboration for navigating obstacle-rich areas. The proposed framework offers several key advantages. (1) It achieves tension distribution and coordinated transportation within the UAV-cable-load system with low computational overhead, dynamically adapting UAV configurations based on obstacle layouts to facilitate efficient navigation. (2) By integrating dissipative systems theory, the framework ensures high stability and robustness, essential for complex multi-UAV operations. The effectiveness of the proposed approach is validated through extensive simulations, demonstrating its scalability for large-scale multi-UAV systems. Furthermore, the method is experimentally validated in outdoor scenarios, showcasing its practical feasibility and robustness under real-world conditions.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种用于多无人机协同运输带缆负载的新型控制框架，该框架能够在约束环境下高效导航，并已通过仿真和实验验证。
AI.motivation: 在约束环境下实现多无人机协同运输带缆负载的挑战，尤其是在障碍物密集的区域。
AI.method: 利用虚拟管理论和耗散系统理论的原理，开发了一个控制框架，该框架可以动态调整无人机配置以适应障碍物布局，并确保张力分配和协调运输。
AI.result: 该框架具有低计算开销，能够实现高效导航和稳定的多无人机协同操作。仿真和实验结果均验证了其有效性、可扩展性和鲁棒性。
AI.conclusion: 该控制框架能够有效解决多无人机在约束环境下协同运输带缆负载的问题，并在实际应用中具有可行性和鲁棒性。

title: GUARDIAN: Safety Filtering for Systems with Perception Models Subject to Adversarial Attacks
summary: Safety filtering is an effective method for enforcing constraints in safety-critical systems, but existing methods typically assume perfect state information. This limitation is especially problematic for systems that rely on neural network (NN)-based state estimators, which can be highly sensitive to noise and adversarial input perturbations. We address these problems by introducing GUARDIAN: Guaranteed Uncertainty-Aware Reachability Defense against Adversarial INterference, a safety filtering framework that provides formal safety guarantees for systems with NN-based state estimators. At runtime, GUARDIAN uses neural network verification tools to provide guaranteed bounds on the system's state estimate given possible perturbations to its observation. It then uses a modified Hamilton-Jacobi reachability formulation to construct a safety filter that adjusts the nominal control input based on the verified state bounds and safety constraints. The result is an uncertainty-aware filter that ensures safety despite the system's reliance on an NN estimator with noisy, possibly adversarial, input observations. Theoretical analysis and numerical experiments demonstrate that GUARDIAN effectively defends systems against adversarial attacks that would otherwise lead to a violation of safety constraints.

AI.tldr: GUARDIAN是一个安全过滤框架，通过神经网络验证来界定状态估计的不确定性，并结合改进的Hamilton-Jacobi可达性方法，生成一个能够应对带噪声或对抗性观测的控制输入，从而保证系统的安全性。
AI.motivation: 现有的安全过滤方法通常假设状态信息是完美的，这对于依赖易受噪声和对抗性扰动影响的神经网络（NN）状态估计器的系统来说是一个严重问题。因此，需要一种能够处理NN状态估计器不确定性的安全过滤方法。
AI.method: GUARDIAN在运行时使用神经网络验证工具来确定系统状态估计在给定观测扰动下的界限。然后，它采用改进的Hamilton-Jacobi可达性方法来构建一个安全滤波器，该滤波器基于验证过的状态界限和安全约束来调整名义控制输入。
AI.result: GUARDIAN能够提供形式化的安全保证，并且在理论分析和数值实验中证明了其有效性，可以抵御导致安全约束违反的对抗性攻击。
AI.conclusion: GUARDIAN是一个不确定性感知型安全滤波器，即使在依赖于具有噪声或对抗性输入观测的NN估计器的系统上，也能确保安全性。

title: Quantifying the Knowledge Proximity Between Academic and Industry Research: An Entity and Semantic Perspective
summary: The academia and industry are characterized by a reciprocal shaping and dynamic feedback mechanism. Despite distinct institutional logics, they have adapted closely in collaborative publishing and talent mobility, demonstrating tension between institutional divergence and intensive collaboration. Existing studies on their knowledge proximity mainly rely on macro indicators such as the number of collaborative papers or patents, lacking an analysis of knowledge units in the literature. This has led to an insufficient grasp of fine-grained knowledge proximity between industry and academia, potentially undermining collaboration frameworks and resource allocation efficiency. To remedy the limitation, this study quantifies the trajectory of academia-industry co-evolution through fine-grained entities and semantic space. In the entity measurement part, we extract fine-grained knowledge entities via pre-trained models, measure sequence overlaps using cosine similarity, and analyze topological features through complex network analysis. At the semantic level, we employ unsupervised contrastive learning to quantify convergence in semantic spaces by measuring cross-institutional textual similarities. Finally, we use citation distribution patterns to examine correlations between bidirectional knowledge flows and similarity. Analysis reveals that knowledge proximity between academia and industry rises, particularly following technological change. This provides textual evidence of bidirectional adaptation in co-evolution. Additionally, academia's knowledge dominance weakens during technological paradigm shifts. The dataset and code for this paper can be accessed at https://github.com/tinierZhao/Academic-Industrial-associations.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过提取和分析细粒度的知识实体及其语义空间，量化了学术界和工业界的知识邻近度及其协同演化轨迹，发现知识邻近度在技术变革后上升，且学术界在技术范式转变期间的知识主导地位减弱。
AI.motivation: 现有研究主要依赖宏观指标来衡量学术界与工业界的知识邻近度，缺乏对文献中知识单元的细粒度分析，导致对细粒度知识邻近度的掌握不足，可能影响合作框架和资源配置效率。
AI.method: 研究通过两个层面量化学术界-工业界的协同演化：1. 实体测量：利用预训练模型提取细粒度知识实体，通过余弦相似度测量序列重叠，并借助复杂网络分析拓扑特征。2. 语义层面：采用无监督对比学习，通过测量跨机构的文本相似度来量化语义空间的收敛性。最后，利用引文分布模式检验了双向知识流与相似度之间的相关性。
AI.result: 分析显示，学术界与工业界的知识邻近度有所上升，尤其是在技术变革之后。这为协同演化中双向适应提供了文本证据。此外，在技术范式转变期间，学术界的知识主导地位有所减弱。
AI.conclusion: 本研究为学术界与工业界的协同演化提供了细粒度的量化证据，揭示了知识邻近度随技术变革的变化趋势以及学术界在技术范式转变中的角色变化，为理解和优化两者的合作关系提供了新的视角。

title: CAST-CKT: Chaos-Aware Spatio-Temporal and Cross-City Knowledge Transfer for Traffic Flow Prediction
summary: Traffic prediction in data-scarce, cross-city settings is challenging due to complex nonlinear dynamics and domain shifts. Existing methods often fail to capture traffic's inherent chaotic nature for effective few-shot learning. We propose CAST-CKT, a novel Chaos-Aware Spatio-Temporal and Cross-City Knowledge Transfer framework. It employs an efficient chaotic analyser to quantify traffic predictability regimes, driving several key innovations: chaos-aware attention for regime-adaptive temporal modelling; adaptive topology learning for dynamic spatial dependencies; and chaotic consistency-based cross-city alignment for knowledge transfer. The framework also provides horizon-specific predictions with uncertainty quantification. Theoretical analysis shows improved generalisation bounds. Extensive experiments on four benchmarks in cross-city few-shot settings show CAST-CKT outperforms state-of-the-art methods by significant margins in MAE and RMSE, while offering interpretable regime analysis. Code is available at https://github.com/afofanah/CAST-CKT.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为CAST-CKT的交通预测框架，用于数据稀疏和跨城市场景，该框架通过分析交通的混沌特性来改进预测，并能适应不同城市和不同预测时间范围，同时提供不确定性估计。
AI.motivation: 在数据稀疏和跨城市交通预测中，由于复杂的非线性动态和领域迁移问题，现有方法难以有效捕捉交通的混沌特性，并且在少样本学习方面表现不佳。
AI.method: 提出CAST-CKT框架，核心是高效混沌分析器，用于量化交通可预测性。在此基础上，该框架包含三个关键创新：1. 混沌感知注意力机制，用于适应不同可预测性区域的时间建模；2. 自适应拓扑学习，用于动态捕捉空间依赖性；3. 基于混沌一致性的跨城市对齐，用于知识迁移。此外，该框架还提供特定预测时间范围的预测和不确定性量化。
AI.result: 在四个跨城市少样本的基准数据集上的实验表明，CAST-CKT在MAE和RMSE指标上显著优于现有最先进方法，并且能够提供可解释的交通可预测性区域分析。
AI.conclusion: CAST-CKT框架通过其混沌分析能力、自适应建模和知识迁移机制，能够有效解决数据稀疏和跨城市交通预测的挑战，并在少样本场景下取得优越性能，同时提供对交通可预测性的洞察。

title: From Vision to Decision: Neuromorphic Control for Autonomous Navigation and Tracking
summary: Robotic navigation has historically struggled to reconcile reactive, sensor-based control with the decisive capabilities of model-based planners. This duality becomes critical when the absence of a predominant option among goals leads to indecision, challenging reactive systems to break symmetries without computationally-intense planners. We propose a parsimonious neuromorphic control framework that bridges this gap for vision-guided navigation and tracking. Image pixels from an onboard camera are encoded as inputs to dynamic neuronal populations that directly transform visual target excitation into egocentric motion commands. A dynamic bifurcation mechanism resolves indecision by delaying commitment until a critical point induced by the environmental geometry. Inspired by recently proposed mechanistic models of animal cognition and opinion dynamics, the neuromorphic controller provides real-time autonomy with a minimal computational burden, a small number of interpretable parameters, and can be seamlessly integrated with application-specific image processing pipelines. We validate our approach in simulation environments as well as on an experimental quadrotor platform.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种新的神经形态控制框架，用于解决机器人导航中的决策困难问题，该框架通过动态神经元群体直接将视觉信息转化为运动指令，并利用动态分岔机制在遇到多目标选择困难时进行决策。
AI.motivation: 传统的机器人导航方法在反应式控制和基于模型的规划之间存在矛盾，尤其是在目标选择不明确导致决策困难时，反应式系统难以打破对称性，而计算量大的规划器又过于耗时。研究旨在解决这一问题。
AI.method: 提出了一种精简的神经形态控制框架，该框架将摄像头输入的图像像素编码为动态神经元群体的输入，这些神经元群体直接将视觉目标激励转化为自我中心的运动指令。引入了一个动态分岔机制，该机制通过延迟决策直到环境几何引起的关键点出现来解决决策困难。
AI.result: 该神经形态控制器能够提供实时自主性，计算负担最小，参数数量少且易于解释。该方法在模拟环境和实验四旋翼飞行器平台上均得到了验证。
AI.conclusion: 提出的神经形态控制框架成功地弥合了反应式控制和模型规划之间的差距，尤其是在解决机器人导航中的决策困难问题上，实现了高效、低计算量的自主导航。

title: Bagpiper: Solving Open-Ended Audio Tasks via Rich Captions
summary: Current audio foundation models typically rely on rigid, task-specific supervision, addressing isolated factors of audio rather than the whole. In contrast, human intelligence processes audio holistically, seamlessly bridging physical signals with abstract cognitive concepts to execute complex tasks. Grounded in this philosophy, we introduce Bagpiper, an 8B audio foundation model that interprets physical audio via rich captions, i.e., comprehensive natural language descriptions that encapsulate the critical cognitive concepts inherent in the signal (e.g., transcription, audio events). By pre-training on a massive corpus of 600B tokens, the model establishes a robust bidirectional mapping between raw audio and this high-level conceptual space. During fine-tuning, Bagpiper adopts a caption-then-process workflow, simulating an intermediate cognitive reasoning step to solve diverse tasks without task-specific priors. Experimentally, Bagpiper outperforms Qwen-2.5-Omni on MMAU and AIRBench for audio understanding and surpasses CosyVoice3 and TangoFlux in generation quality, capable of synthesizing arbitrary compositions of speech, music, and sound effects. To the best of our knowledge, Bagpiper is among the first works that achieve unified understanding generation for general audio. Model, data, and code are available at Bagpiper Home Page.

AI.tldr: Bagpiper是一个80亿参数的音频基础模型，通过丰富的自然语言描述（caption）实现了音频的理解与生成，并在多个音频理解和生成任务上取得了 SOTA 性能，实现了通用的音频理解与生成。
AI.motivation: 现有的音频基础模型依赖于僵化的、任务特定的监督，未能像人类一样整体处理音频。研究动机是借鉴人类智能的整体性，开发一个能够无缝连接物理信号和抽象认知概念的音频模型。
AI.method: Bagpiper 模型通过在海量的6000亿 token 数据上进行预训练，建立了原始音频和高层概念空间之间的双向映射。在微调阶段，模型采用“caption-then-process”的工作流程，模拟中间的认知推理步骤来解决各种任务，而无需任务特定的先验知识。
AI.result: Bagpiper 在 MMAU 和 AIRBench 基准测试上超越了 Qwen-2.5-Omni，在音频理解方面表现更优。在生成质量方面，它优于 CosyVoice3 和 TangoFlux，能够合成任意的语音、音乐和音效组合。
AI.conclusion: Bagpiper 是首批实现通用音频统一理解和生成的研究工作之一，通过富文本描述实现了音频的深度理解和高质量生成，展现了其在多样的音频任务上的强大能力。

title: VLN-Pilot: Large Vision-Language Model as an Autonomous Indoor Drone Operator
summary: This paper introduces VLN-Pilot, a novel framework in which a large Vision-and-Language Model (VLLM) assumes the role of a human pilot for indoor drone navigation. By leveraging the multimodal reasoning abilities of VLLMs, VLN-Pilot interprets free-form natural language instructions and grounds them in visual observations to plan and execute drone trajectories in GPS-denied indoor environments. Unlike traditional rule-based or geometric path-planning approaches, our framework integrates language-driven semantic understanding with visual perception, enabling context-aware, high-level flight behaviors with minimal task-specific engineering. VLN-Pilot supports fully autonomous instruction-following for drones by reasoning about spatial relationships, obstacle avoidance, and dynamic reactivity to unforeseen events. We validate our framework on a custom photorealistic indoor simulation benchmark and demonstrate the ability of the VLLM-driven agent to achieve high success rates on complex instruction-following tasks, including long-horizon navigation with multiple semantic targets. Experimental results highlight the promise of replacing remote drone pilots with a language-guided autonomous agent, opening avenues for scalable, human-friendly control of indoor UAVs in tasks such as inspection, search-and-rescue, and facility monitoring. Our results suggest that VLLM-based pilots may dramatically reduce operator workload while improving safety and mission flexibility in constrained indoor environments.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为VLN-Pilot的框架，利用大型视觉语言模型（VLLM）在室内GPS受限环境中执行自主无人机导航任务，通过自然语言指令进行控制，实现了高成功率和可扩展性。
AI.motivation: 传统的室内无人机导航方法依赖于规则或几何路径规划，需要大量工程设计。本研究旨在探索利用大型视觉语言模型（VLLM）的语言理解和视觉感知能力，实现更灵活、上下文感知和易于操作的无人机自主导航。
AI.method: 引入VLN-Pilot框架，让VLLM扮演人类飞行员的角色。该框架将自然语言指令与视觉观察相结合，通过多模态推理进行室内无人机轨迹规划和执行，支持语义理解、空间关系推理、避障和对突发事件的动态响应。
AI.result: 在自定义的逼真室内模拟基准上进行了验证，证明了VLLM驱动的代理能够成功完成复杂的指令跟随任务，包括涉及多个语义目标的远距离导航。实验结果显示出高成功率。
AI.conclusion: VLN-Pilot框架证明了使用VLLM作为语言引导的自主代理来取代远程无人机操作员的可行性，有望提高室内UAV任务（如检查、搜救、监控）的可扩展性、安全性、任务灵活性，并显著减轻操作员的工作负荷。

title: GT-SVJ: Generative-Transformer-Based Self-Supervised Video Judge For Efficient Video Reward Modeling
summary: Aligning video generative models with human preferences remains challenging: current approaches rely on Vision-Language Models (VLMs) for reward modeling, but these models struggle to capture subtle temporal dynamics. We propose a fundamentally different approach: repurposing video generative models, which are inherently designed to model temporal structure, as reward models. We present the Generative-Transformer-based Self-Supervised Video Judge (\modelname), a novel evaluation model that transforms state-of-the-art video generation models into powerful temporally-aware reward models. Our key insight is that generative models can be reformulated as energy-based models (EBMs) that assign low energy to high-quality videos and high energy to degraded ones, enabling them to discriminate video quality with remarkable precision when trained via contrastive objectives. To prevent the model from exploiting superficial differences between real and generated videos, we design challenging synthetic negative videos through controlled latent-space perturbations: temporal slicing, feature swapping, and frame shuffling, which simulate realistic but subtle visual degradations. This forces the model to learn meaningful spatiotemporal features rather than trivial artifacts. \modelname achieves state-of-the-art performance on GenAI-Bench and MonteBench using only 30K human-annotations: $6\times$ to $65\times$ fewer than existing VLM-based approaches.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为 Generative-Transformer-based Self-Supervised Video Judge (model name) 的新方法，该方法将视频生成模型重新用作奖励模型，以更好地评估视频质量，特别关注时间动态。通过利用生成模型作为基于能量的模型，并设计巧妙的负样本生成策略，该模型在仅使用少量人类标注的情况下，在基准测试中取得了最先进的性能。
AI.motivation: 当前的视频生成模型在与人类偏好对齐方面存在挑战，主要依赖于视觉语言模型（VLMs）作为奖励模型，但 VLMs 难以捕捉视频中微妙的时间动态。作者希望找到一种新的方法来更有效地评估视频质量，并充分利用视频生成模型固有的时间建模能力。
AI.method: 该研究提出了一种名为 Generative-Transformer-based Self-Supervised Video Judge (model name) 的新模型。核心思想是将现有的视频生成模型重新用作奖励模型。作者将生成模型重新构建为基于能量的模型（EBMs），赋予高质量视频低能量，低质量视频高能量。为了训练模型区分真实视频和生成视频的质量，避免模型学习到虚假的模式，他们设计了通过控制潜空间扰动（如时间切片、特征交换、帧混洗）来生成具有挑战性的合成负样本视频。模型通过对比学习目标进行训练。
AI.result: 在 GenAI-Bench 和 MonteBench 基准测试中，model name 取得了最先进的性能。与现有的基于 VLM 的方法相比，model name 仅使用了 30K 的人类标注，比现有方法少 6 倍到 65 倍。
AI.conclusion: 将视频生成模型重新用作奖励模型，并结合巧妙设计的负样本生成策略，可以有效地构建出能够精确评估视频质量，尤其擅长捕捉时间动态的奖励模型。这种方法相比于传统的 VLM 方法，在数据效率和性能上都有显著提升。

title: HugRAG: Hierarchical Causal Knowledge Graph Design for RAG
summary: Retrieval augmented generation (RAG) has enhanced large language models by enabling access to external knowledge, with graph-based RAG emerging as a powerful paradigm for structured retrieval and reasoning. However, existing graph-based methods often over-rely on surface-level node matching and lack explicit causal modeling, leading to unfaithful or spurious answers. Prior attempts to incorporate causality are typically limited to local or single-document contexts and also suffer from information isolation that arises from modular graph structures, which hinders scalability and cross-module causal reasoning. To address these challenges, we propose HugRAG, a framework that rethinks knowledge organization for graph-based RAG through causal gating across hierarchical modules. HugRAG explicitly models causal relationships to suppress spurious correlations while enabling scalable reasoning over large-scale knowledge graphs. Extensive experiments demonstrate that HugRAG consistently outperforms competitive graph-based RAG baselines across multiple datasets and evaluation metrics. Our work establishes a principled foundation for structured, scalable, and causally grounded RAG systems.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为HugRAG的框架，通过因果门控和分层模块来改进基于图的检索增强生成（RAG），以解决现有方法在表面匹配、因果建模和可扩展性方面的不足，实验证明该方法优于现有基线。
AI.motivation: 现有基于图的RAG方法在表面匹配和因果建模方面存在不足，容易生成不准确或虚假的答案，且在处理大规模知识图谱和跨模块推理时存在可扩展性问题。
AI.method: 提出HugRAG框架，采用因果门控机制在分层模块之间进行知识组织，显式地建模因果关系以抑制虚假关联，并实现大规模知识图谱上的可扩展推理。
AI.result: 在多个数据集和评估指标上，HugRAG的表现一致优于竞争性的基于图的RAG基线。
AI.conclusion: HugRAG为构建结构化、可扩展且基于因果的RAG系统奠定了理论基础，有效解决了现有方法的局限性。

title: Dual-Representation Image Compression at Ultra-Low Bitrates via Explicit Semantics and Implicit Textures
summary: While recent neural codecs achieve strong performance at low bitrates when optimized for perceptual quality, their effectiveness deteriorates significantly under ultra-low bitrate conditions. To mitigate this, generative compression methods leveraging semantic priors from pretrained models have emerged as a promising paradigm. However, existing approaches are fundamentally constrained by a tradeoff between semantic faithfulness and perceptual realism. Methods based on explicit representations preserve content structure but often lack fine-grained textures, whereas implicit methods can synthesize visually plausible details at the cost of semantic drift. In this work, we propose a unified framework that bridges this gap by coherently integrating explicit and implicit representations in a training-free manner. Specifically, We condition a diffusion model on explicit high-level semantics while employing reverse-channel coding to implicitly convey fine-grained details. Moreover, we introduce a plug-in encoder that enables flexible control of the distortion-perception tradeoff by modulating the implicit information. Extensive experiments demonstrate that the proposed framework achieves state-of-the-art rate-perception performance, outperforming existing methods and surpassing DiffC by 29.92%, 19.33%, and 20.89% in DISTS BD-Rate on the Kodak, DIV2K, and CLIC2020 datasets, respectively.

AI.tldr: 提出一种无训练的统一框架，通过整合显式和隐式表示来弥合语义保真度和感知真实度之间的差距，以克服超低比特率下的神经编解码器性能下降问题，并在多个数据集上取得了最先进的性能。
AI.motivation: 现有的神经编解码器在超低比特率下性能急剧下降。基于语义先验的生成式压缩方法虽然有潜力，但在语义保真度和感知真实度之间存在权衡。本文旨在解决这一问题。
AI.method: 提出一个统一的框架，该框架以无训练的方式整合了显式和隐式表示。具体来说，将扩散模型以显式高层语义为条件，并使用反向通道编码隐式传达细粒度细节。此外，引入了一个可插拔的编码器，通过调制隐式信息来灵活控制失真-感知权衡。
AI.result: 该框架在 Kodak、DIV2K 和 CLIC2020 数据集上取得了最先进的速率-感知性能，在 DISTS BD-Rate 上分别超越现有方法 29.92%、19.33% 和 20.89%。
AI.conclusion: 提出的统一框架成功地整合了显式和隐式表示，解决了超低比特率下的神经编解码器性能问题，并在率失真感知性能方面取得了显著的改进。

title: First Proof
comment: 9 pages, including the statements of the ten questions
summary: To assess the ability of current AI systems to correctly answer research-level mathematics questions, we share a set of ten math questions which have arisen naturally in the research process of the authors. The questions had not been shared publicly until now; the answers are known to the authors of the questions but will remain encrypted for a short time.

AI.tldr: 评估当前 AI 系统解答研究级数学问题的能力，并分享一套由作者在研究过程中自然产生的十道数学题。
AI.motivation: 作者希望评估当前 AI 系统在处理高难度、研究级别的数学问题上的能力。
AI.method: 创建并分享一套包含十道研究过程中自然产生的数学题，这些题目目前未公开，答案由作者保存但暂时加密。
AI.result: 待 AI 系统对这些题目进行解答后，将评估其正确性。
AI.conclusion: 通过对 AI 系统解答结果的评估，可以了解当前 AI 在解决复杂数学问题上的局限性和潜力。

title: TOLEBI: Learning Fault-Tolerant Bipedal Locomotion via Online Status Estimation and Fallibility Rewards
comment: Accepted for Publication at IEEE International Conference on Robotics and Automation (ICRA) 2026
summary: With the growing employment of learning algorithms in robotic applications, research on reinforcement learning for bipedal locomotion has become a central topic for humanoid robotics. While recently published contributions achieve high success rates in locomotion tasks, scarce attention has been devoted to the development of methods that enable to handle hardware faults that may occur during the locomotion process. However, in real-world settings, environmental disturbances or sudden occurrences of hardware faults might yield severe consequences. To address these issues, this paper presents TOLEBI (A faulT-tOlerant Learning framEwork for Bipedal locomotIon) that handles faults on the robot during operation. Specifically, joint locking, power loss and external disturbances are injected in simulation to learn fault-tolerant locomotion strategies. In addition to transferring the learned policy to the real robot via sim-to-real transfer, an online joint status module incorporated. This module enables to classify joint conditions by referring to the actual observations at runtime under real-world conditions. The validation experiments conducted both in real-world and simulation with the humanoid robot TOCABI highlight the applicability of the proposed approach. To our knowledge, this manuscript provides the first learning-based fault-tolerant framework for bipedal locomotion, thereby fostering the development of efficient learning methods in this field.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一个名为TOLEBI的面向双足行走的容错学习框架，该框架能够处理机器人运行过程中发生的硬件故障，并通过在线关节状态模块实现对真实世界运行条件的适应。
AI.motivation: 现有关于机器人行走的研究主要集中在提高行走成功率，但忽视了在实际应用中可能出现的硬件故障问题，而这些故障可能导致严重后果。
AI.method: 通过在仿真环境中模拟关节锁定、断电和外部干扰等故障，学习容错行走策略。利用仿真到现实（sim-to-real）迁移将学到的策略应用到真实机器人上，并集成了一个在线关节状态模块，该模块能够根据运行时观测到的实际情况对关节状态进行分类。
AI.result: 在真实机器人TOCABI和仿真环境中进行的验证实验表明，该方法具有良好的适用性，能够实现容错行走。
AI.conclusion: TOLEBI是首个基于学习的双足行走容错框架，为该领域的高效学习方法开发奠定了基础。

title: E.M.Ground: A Temporal Grounding Vid-LLM with Holistic Event Perception and Matching
summary: Despite recent advances in Video Large Language Models (Vid-LLMs), Temporal Video Grounding (TVG), which aims to precisely localize time segments corresponding to query events, remains a significant challenge. Existing methods often match start and end frames by comparing frame features with two separate tokens, relying heavily on exact timestamps. However, this approach fails to capture the event's semantic continuity and integrity, leading to ambiguities. To address this, we propose E.M.Ground, a novel Vid-LLM for TVG that focuses on holistic and coherent event perception. E.M.Ground introduces three key innovations: (i) a special <event> token that aggregates information from all frames of a query event, preserving semantic continuity for accurate event matching; (ii) Savitzky-Golay smoothing to reduce noise in token-to-frame similarities across timestamps, improving prediction accuracy; (iii) multi-grained frame feature aggregation to enhance matching reliability and temporal understanding, compensating for compression-induced information loss. Extensive experiments on benchmark datasets show that E.M.Ground consistently outperforms state-of-the-art Vid-LLMs by significant margins.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为E.M.Ground的新型视频大语言模型（Vid-LLM），用于解决视频时间段定位（TVG）的挑战，通过引入特殊的<event> token、Savitzky-Golay平滑以及多粒度帧特征聚合来提升事件语义的连续性和完整性感知，从而在基准数据集上取得了显著优于现有SOTA方法的结果。
AI.motivation: 现有视频时间段定位方法通过匹配独立的起止帧特征，忽略了事件的语义连续性，导致不准确和歧义。
AI.method: 提出E.M.Ground模型，包含：1. 特殊的<event> token，聚合事件所有帧信息以保持语义连续性；2. Savitzky-Golay平滑，减少时间戳上token-to-frame相似度中的噪声；3. 多粒度帧特征聚合，增强匹配可靠性并弥补压缩损失。
AI.result: E.M.Ground在多个基准数据集上，持续显著优于当前最先进的Vid-LLMs。
AI.conclusion: E.M.Ground通过关注整体和连贯的事件感知，有效解决了现有TVG方法的局限性，在视频时间段定位任务上展现出优越性能。

title: FedMosaic: Federated Retrieval-Augmented Generation via Parametric Adapters
summary: Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) enhances Large Language Models (LLMs) by grounding generation in external knowledge to improve factuality and reduce hallucinations. Yet most deployments assume a centralized corpus, which is infeasible in privacy aware domains where knowledge remains siloed. This motivates federated RAG (FedRAG), where a central LLM server collaborates with distributed silos without sharing raw documents. In context RAG violates this requirement by transmitting verbatim documents, whereas parametric RAG encodes documents into lightweight adapters that merge with a frozen LLM at inference, avoiding raw-text exchange. We adopt the parametric approach but face two unique challenges induced by FedRAG: high storage and communication from per-document adapters, and destructive aggregation caused by indiscriminately merging multiple adapters. We present FedMosaic, the first federated RAG framework built on parametric adapters. FedMosaic clusters semantically related documents into multi-document adapters with document-specific masks to reduce overhead while preserving specificity, and performs selective adapter aggregation to combine only relevance-aligned, nonconflicting adapters. Experiments show that FedMosaic achieves an average 10.9% higher accuracy than state-of-the-art methods in four categories, while lowering storage costs by 78.8% to 86.3% and communication costs by 91.4%, and never sharing raw documents.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为 FedMosaic 的新联邦检索增强生成（FedRAG）框架，用于在不共享原始文档的情况下，在隐私受限的环境中增强大型语言模型（LLM）。FedMosaic 使用参数化适配器，通过文档聚类和选择性聚合来减少存储和通信开销，同时保持准确性。
AI.motivation: 现有的检索增强生成（RAG）方法通常依赖于中心化知识库，这在隐私敏感领域不可行，因为知识被孤立。因此，需要一种能够在不共享原始文档的情况下，让中心 LLM 服务器与分布式知识孤岛协同工作的联邦 RAG（FedRAG）。
AI.method: FedMosaic 采用参数化 RAG 方法，将文档编码为轻量级适配器。该框架解决了 FedRAG 带来的两个主要挑战：1）通过将语义上相关的文档聚类成多文档适配器，并为每个文档使用特定掩码来减少适配器的数量和存储/通信开销；2）通过选择性聚合来避免冲突，仅合并相关且不冲突的适配器。
AI.result: FedMosaic 在四个类别中平均比最先进的方法提高了 10.9% 的准确性。同时，存储成本降低了 78.8% 至 86.3%，通信成本降低了 91.4%。整个过程从未共享原始文档。
