AI.conclusion: FedMosaic 是第一个基于参数化适配器的联邦 RAG 框架，它有效地解决了 FedRAG 中的存储和通信开销问题，同时保持了高准确性，并且完全符合隐私要求，即不共享原始文档。

title: HiCrowd: Hierarchical Crowd Flow Alignment for Dense Human Environments
comment: Accepted to the 2026 IEEE International Conference on Robotics and Automation (ICRA)
summary: Navigating through dense human crowds remains a significant challenge for mobile robots. A key issue is the freezing robot problem, where the robot struggles to find safe motions and becomes stuck within the crowd. To address this, we propose HiCrowd, a hierarchical framework that integrates reinforcement learning (RL) with model predictive control (MPC). HiCrowd leverages surrounding pedestrian motion as guidance, enabling the robot to align with compatible crowd flows. A high-level RL policy generates a follow point to align the robot with a suitable pedestrian group, while a low-level MPC safely tracks this guidance with short horizon planning. The method combines long-term crowd aware decision making with safe short-term execution. We evaluate HiCrowd against reactive and learning-based baselines in offline setting (replaying recorded human trajectories) and online setting (human trajectories are updated to react to the robot in simulation). Experiments on a real-world dataset and a synthetic crowd dataset show that our method outperforms in navigation efficiency and safety, while reducing freezing behaviors. Our results suggest that leveraging human motion as guidance, rather than treating humans solely as dynamic obstacles, provides a powerful principle for safe and efficient robot navigation in crowds.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为HiCrowd的混合式框架，结合了强化学习(RL)和模型预测控制(MPC)，通过引导机器人跟随人群流动来解决机器人穿越密集人群时遇到的“冻结”问题，提高了导航效率和安全性。
AI.motivation: 机器人穿越密集人群时，常常会遇到“冻结机器人问题”，即机器人难以找到安全路径而卡在人群中。因此，需要一种新的方法来解决这个问题。
AI.method: HiCrowd采用分层框架：高层RL策略生成一个跟随点，引导机器人与合适的人群流动对齐；低层MPC在短时间内安全地跟踪该引导点。该方法结合了长期的、关注人群的决策与短期的安全执行。
AI.result: 在离线和在线设置的实验中，HiCrowd在导航效率和安全性方面优于现有方法，并减少了冻结行为。方法在真实世界和合成数据集上都得到了验证。
AI.conclusion: 将人类运动作为导航引导，而非仅仅视为动态障碍物，是实现安全高效人群导航的有效原则。

title: Copyright Detective: A Forensic System to Evidence LLMs Flickering Copyright Leakage Risks
summary: We present Copyright Detective, the first interactive forensic system for detecting, analyzing, and visualizing potential copyright risks in LLM outputs. The system treats copyright infringement versus compliance as an evidence discovery process rather than a static classification task due to the complex nature of copyright law. It integrates multiple detection paradigms, including content recall testing, paraphrase-level similarity analysis, persuasive jailbreak probing, and unlearning verification, within a unified and extensible framework. Through interactive prompting, response collection, and iterative workflows, our system enables systematic auditing of verbatim memorization and paraphrase-level leakage, supporting responsible deployment and transparent evaluation of LLM copyright risks even with black-box access.

AI.tldr: Copyright Detective 是一个创新的交互式取证系统，用于检测、分析和可视化大型语言模型 (LLM) 输出中的潜在版权风险。它将版权侵权视为证据发现过程，集成了内容回忆测试、释义相似度分析、诱导性越狱探测和遗忘验证等多种检测方法。该系统支持通过交互式提示、响应收集和迭代工作流程来审计文本记忆和释义泄露，从而在黑盒访问下也能负责任地部署和评估 LLM 版权风险。
AI.motivation: 大型语言模型 (LLM) 的广泛应用带来了潜在的版权侵权风险。现有方法难以有效应对版权法的复杂性，因此需要一个系统来系统地检测、分析和可视化这些风险。
AI.method: 该系统将版权侵权检测视为证据发现过程，而非静态分类任务。它集成了多种检测范式，包括：内容回忆测试、释义级别相似度分析、诱导性越狱探测和遗忘验证。系统通过交互式提示、响应收集和迭代工作流程来实现这些功能。
AI.result: Copyright Detective 提供了一个统一且可扩展的框架，能够通过交互式方式进行版权风险审计，检测文本记忆和释义泄露。即使在黑盒访问 LLM 的情况下，该系统也能支持。
AI.conclusion: Copyright Detective 是首个用于 LLM 输出版权风险检测、分析和可视化的交互式取证系统。它通过整合多种检测方法并采用证据发现的视角，为负责任的 LLM 部署和透明的版权风险评估提供了有效的工具。

title: Traceable Cross-Source RAG for Chinese Tibetan Medicine Question Answering
summary: Retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) promises grounded question answering, yet domain settings with multiple heterogeneous knowledge bases (KBs) remain challenging. In Chinese Tibetan medicine, encyclopedia entries are often dense and easy to match, which can dominate retrieval even when classics or clinical papers provide more authoritative evidence. We study a practical setting with three KBs (encyclopedia, classics, and clinical papers) and a 500-query benchmark (cutoff $K{=}5$) covering both single-KB and cross-KB questions. We propose two complementary methods to improve traceability, reduce hallucinations, and enable cross-KB verification. First, DAKS performs KB routing and budgeted retrieval to mitigate density-driven bias and to prioritize authoritative sources when appropriate. Second, we use an alignment graph to guide evidence fusion and coverage-aware packing, improving cross-KB evidence coverage without relying on naive concatenation. All answers are generated by a lightweight generator, \textsc{openPangu-Embedded-7B}. Experiments show consistent gains in routing quality and cross-KB evidence coverage, with the full system achieving the best CrossEv@5 while maintaining strong faithfulness and citation correctness.

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了两种方法（DAKS 和基于对齐图的证据融合）来改进检索增强生成（RAG）在面对中文藏医药领域多个异构知识库时的表现，解决了知识库密度差异导致的偏差问题，并提高了跨知识库证据的覆盖率和可验证性。
AI.motivation: 在中文藏医药领域，由于百科条目信息密集易匹配，容易在检索时占据主导地位，即使经典著作或临床论文提供了更权威的证据。这导致RAG在处理多异构知识库时面临挑战，难以保证答案的权威性和准确性。
AI.method: 提出了两种互补方法：1. DAKS：执行知识库路由和预算检索，以减轻密度驱动的偏差，并优先选择权威来源。2. 基于对齐图的方法：用于指导证据融合和覆盖感知打包，改进跨知识库证据覆盖，避免简单拼接。所有答案由轻量级生成器 	extsc{openPangu-Embedded-7B} 生成。
AI.result: 实验表明，DAKS 提高了路由质量，基于对齐图的方法提升了跨知识库证据覆盖率。完整系统在 CrossEv@5 指标上取得了最佳表现，同时保持了较高的忠实度和引用正确性。
AI.conclusion: 研究提出的 DAKS 和基于对齐图的方法能够有效解决中文藏医药领域多异构知识库RAG的挑战，提高答案的溯源性、减少幻觉，并实现跨知识库验证，显著提升了RAG在复杂领域的性能。

title: CoPE: Clipped RoPE as A Scalable Free Lunch for Long Context LLMs
summary: Rotary Positional Embedding (RoPE) is a key component of context scaling in Large Language Models (LLMs). While various methods have been proposed to adapt RoPE to longer contexts, their guiding principles generally fall into two categories: (1) out-of-distribution (OOD) mitigation, which scales RoPE frequencies to accommodate unseen positions, and (2) Semantic Modeling, which posits that the attention scores computed with RoPE should always prioritize semantically similar tokens. In this work, we unify these seemingly distinct objectives through a minimalist intervention, namely CoPE: soft clipping lowfrequency components of RoPE. CoPE not only eliminates OOD outliers and refines semantic signals, but also prevents spectral leakage caused by hard clipping. Extensive experiments demonstrate that simply applying our soft clipping strategy to RoPE yields significant performance gains that scale up to 256k context length, validating our theoretical analysis and establishing CoPE as a new state-of-the-art for length generalization. Our code, data, and models are available at https://github.com/hrlics/CoPE.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为CoPE（Contextual Positional Embedding）的方法，通过软裁剪RoPE（Rotary Positional Embedding）的低频分量来改进LLM处理长上下文的能力。CoPE统一了已有方法中用于处理长上下文的两种主要思路（OOD缓解和语义建模），并在长达256k的上下文长度下实现了显著的性能提升。
AI.motivation: 现有的RoPE适应长上下文的方法主要分为两类：OOD缓解（调整频率以适应未见过的位置）和语义建模（确保注意力分数优先考虑语义相似的token）。研究者希望找到一个统一的、更有效的方法来处理长上下文，并提升LLM的长度泛化能力。
AI.method: 提出CoPE方法，通过对RoPE的低频分量进行软裁剪（soft clipping）来实现。这种方法旨在消除OOD离群值，精炼语义信号，并避免硬裁剪可能引起的频谱泄漏。
AI.result: CoPE方法在RoPE上的简单应用，在长达256k的上下文长度下，带来了显著的性能提升。实验结果验证了该方法的理论分析，并证明其在长度泛化方面达到了新的SOTA水平。
AI.conclusion: CoPE是一种通过软裁剪RoPE低频分量来增强LLM长上下文处理能力的新方法。它统一了现有的长上下文适应策略，并在实验中取得了显著的性能提升，证明了其在长度泛化方面的有效性。

title: Cross-Domain Few-Shot Segmentation via Multi-view Progressive Adaptation
summary: Cross-Domain Few-Shot Segmentation aims to segment categories in data-scarce domains conditioned on a few exemplars. Typical methods first establish few-shot capability in a large-scale source domain and then adapt it to target domains. However, due to the limited quantity and diversity of target samples, existing methods still exhibit constrained performance. Moreover, the source-trained model's initially weak few-shot capability in target domains, coupled with substantial domain gaps, severely hinders the effective utilization of target samples and further impedes adaptation. To this end, we propose Multi-view Progressive Adaptation, which progressively adapts few-shot capability to target domains from both data and strategy perspectives. (i) From the data perspective, we introduce Hybrid Progressive Augmentation, which progressively generates more diverse and complex views through cumulative strong augmentations, thereby creating increasingly challenging learning scenarios. (ii) From the strategy perspective, we design Dual-chain Multi-view Prediction, which fully leverages these progressively complex views through sequential and parallel learning paths under extensive supervision. By jointly enforcing prediction consistency across diverse and complex views, MPA achieves both robust and accurate adaptation to target domains. Extensive experiments demonstrate that MPA effectively adapts few-shot capability to target domains, outperforming state-of-the-art methods by a large margin (+7.0%).

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为多视图渐进式适应（MPA）的新方法，通过数据增强和多视图预测策略，提高了跨域少样本分割的性能。
AI.motivation: 现有方法在目标域样本有限且多样性不足时性能受限，且源域训练的模型在目标域的少样本能力较弱，跨域差距大，阻碍了有效利用目标样本和进一步适应。
AI.method: 提出多视图渐进式适应（MPA），从数据和策略两个角度渐进式地适应目标域的少样本能力。数据方面，采用混合渐进式增强（Hybrid Progressive Augmentation）生成更多样、更复杂的视图。策略方面，设计了双链多视图预测（Dual-chain Multi-view Prediction），通过顺序和并行学习路径，利用这些渐进复杂的视图，并强制不同视图之间的预测一致性。
AI.result: MPA 在跨域少样本分割任务上取得了显著的性能提升，比现有最先进方法高出 7.0%。
AI.conclusion: MPA 能够有效地将少样本能力适应到目标域，通过渐进增强和多视图预测，实现了鲁棒且准确的适应。

title: Task-Oriented Robot-Human Handovers on Legged Manipulators
comment: Accepted to 21st ACM/IEEE International Conference on Human-Robot Interaction (HRI) 2026
summary: Task-oriented handovers (TOH) are fundamental to effective human-robot collaboration, requiring robots to present objects in a way that supports the human's intended post-handover use. Existing approaches are typically based on object- or task-specific affordances, but their ability to generalize to novel scenarios is limited. To address this gap, we present AFT-Handover, a framework that integrates large language model (LLM)-driven affordance reasoning with efficient texture-based affordance transfer to achieve zero-shot, generalizable TOH. Given a novel object-task pair, the method retrieves a proxy exemplar from a database, establishes part-level correspondences via LLM reasoning, and texturizes affordances for feature-based point cloud transfer. We evaluate AFT-Handover across diverse task-object pairs, showing improved handover success rates and stronger generalization compared to baselines. In a comparative user study, our framework is significantly preferred over the current state-of-the-art, effectively reducing human regrasping before tool use. Finally, we demonstrate TOH on legged manipulators, highlighting the potential of our framework for real-world robot-human handovers.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为AFT-Handover的框架，利用大型语言模型（LLM）进行通用任务导向式物体抓取，实现了零样本、可泛化的物体抓取。
AI.motivation: 现有方法在处理新物体或新任务时泛化能力有限，因此需要一种更通用的方法来处理任务导向式物体抓取。
AI.method: 该框架整合了LLM驱动的潜在语义推理和基于纹理的潜在语义迁移。在给定新的物体-任务对时，方法会从数据库中检索一个代理示例，通过LLM推理建立部件级别的对应关系，然后进行纹理化以实现基于特征的点云迁移。
AI.result: 在多样化的任务-物体对的评估中，AFT-Handover展示了更高的抓取成功率和更强的泛化能力。在用户研究中，该框架显著优于现有最先进的方法，有效减少了人类在工具使用前的重新抓握。
AI.conclusion: AFT-Handover框架通过结合LLM的推理能力和纹理迁移技术，能够实现零样本、可泛化的任务导向式物体抓取，并在机器人-人类协作中展现出巨大潜力。

title: Surgery: Mitigating Harmful Fine-Tuning for Large Language Models via Attention Sink
summary: Harmful fine-tuning can invalidate safety alignment of large language models, exposing significant safety risks. In this paper, we utilize the attention sink mechanism to mitigate harmful fine-tuning. Specifically, we first measure a statistic named \emph{sink divergence} for each attention head and observe that \emph{different attention heads exhibit two different signs of sink divergence}. To understand its safety implications, we conduct experiments and find that the number of attention heads of positive sink divergence increases along with the increase of the model's harmfulness when undergoing harmful fine-tuning. Based on this finding, we propose a separable sink divergence hypothesis -- \emph{attention heads associating with learning harmful patterns during fine-tuning are separable by their sign of sink divergence}. Based on the hypothesis, we propose a fine-tuning-stage defense, dubbed Surgery. Surgery utilizes a regularizer for sink divergence suppression, which steers attention heads toward the negative sink divergence group, thereby reducing the model's tendency to learn and amplify harmful patterns. Extensive experiments demonstrate that Surgery improves defense performance by 5.90\%, 11.25\%, and 9.55\% on the BeaverTails, HarmBench, and SorryBench benchmarks, respectively. Source code is available on https://github.com/Lslland/Surgery.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为“Surgery”的防御方法，通过利用注意力机制的“汇聚点发散”（sink divergence）特性，来缓解语言模型因有害微调而产生的安全风险。实验表明，Surgery能够有效提升模型在有害指令数据集上的安全性。
AI.motivation: 有害微调（Harmful fine-tuning）可能导致大型语言模型失去安全对齐，带来严重的安全风险。因此，需要开发能够抵御这种有害微调的方法。
AI.method: 文章首先提出了“汇聚点发散”（sink divergence）这一统计量，并观察到不同的注意力头表现出不同符号的汇聚点发散。在此基础上，提出了“可分离汇聚点发散假说”（separable sink divergence hypothesis），认为与学习有害模式相关的注意力头可以通过其汇聚点发散的符号来区分。基于此假说，作者提出了一种在微调阶段进行的防御方法——Surgery。Surgery使用一种汇聚点发散抑制正则化器，将注意力头引导至负汇聚点发散组，从而降低模型学习和放大有害模式的倾向。
AI.result: 在BeaverTails、HarmBench和SorryBench三个基准测试中，Surgery分别将防御性能提高了5.90%、11.25%和9.55%。
AI.conclusion: Surgery是一种有效的、在微调阶段进行的安全对齐防御方法，通过调节注意力头的汇聚点发散，能够显著减轻有害微调带来的安全风险，提升模型的安全性。

title: Boosting SAM for Cross-Domain Few-Shot Segmentation via Conditional Point Sparsification
summary: Motivated by the success of the Segment Anything Model (SAM) in promptable segmentation, recent studies leverage SAM to develop training-free solutions for few-shot segmentation, which aims to predict object masks in the target image based on a few reference exemplars. These SAM-based methods typically rely on point matching between reference and target images and use the matched dense points as prompts for mask prediction. However, we observe that dense points perform poorly in Cross-Domain Few-Shot Segmentation (CD-FSS), where target images are from medical or satellite domains. We attribute this issue to large domain shifts that disrupt the point-image interactions learned by SAM, and find that point density plays a crucial role under such conditions. To address this challenge, we propose Conditional Point Sparsification (CPS), a training-free approach that adaptively guides SAM interactions for cross-domain images based on reference exemplars. Leveraging ground-truth masks, the reference images provide reliable guidance for adaptively sparsifying dense matched points, enabling more accurate segmentation results. Extensive experiments demonstrate that CPS outperforms existing training-free SAM-based methods across diverse CD-FSS datasets.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为条件点稀疏化（CPS）的训练无关方法，通过自适应地稀疏化点匹配来提高SAM在跨领域少样本分割任务中的性能，尤其是在医疗和卫星图像等领域。
AI.motivation: 现有的基于SAM的训练无关少样本分割方法在跨领域场景（如医疗或卫星图像）中表现不佳，这是由于领域偏移破坏了SAM学习到的点-图像交互。研究者发现点密度在这些条件下起着关键作用。
AI.method: 提出了一种名为条件点稀疏化（CPS）的训练无关方法。该方法利用参考图像的真实分割掩码，自适应地指导SAM与跨领域图像的交互，通过稀疏化匹配到的密集点来提高分割精度。
AI.result: CPS方法在多个跨领域少样本分割数据集上进行了广泛的实验，结果表明其性能优于现有的其他训练无关的基于SAM的方法。
AI.conclusion: CPS是一种有效的训练无关方法，能够通过条件点稀疏化来解决跨领域少样本分割中的挑战，提高SAM在具有领域偏移的数据集上的分割准确性。

title: Explainable AI: A Combined XAI Framework for Explaining Brain Tumour Detection Models
summary: This study explores the integration of multiple Explainable AI (XAI) techniques to enhance the interpretability of deep learning models for brain tumour detection. A custom Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) was developed and trained on the BraTS 2021 dataset, achieving 91.24% accuracy in distinguishing between tumour and non-tumour regions. This research combines Gradient-weighted Class Activation Mapping (GRAD-CAM), Layer-wise Relevance Propagation (LRP) and SHapley Additive exPlanations (SHAP) to provide comprehensive insights into the model's decision-making process. This multi-technique approach successfully identified both full and partial tumours, offering layered explanations ranging from broad regions of interest to pixel-level details. GRAD-CAM highlighted important spatial regions, LRP provided detailed pixel-level relevance and SHAP quantified feature contributions. The integrated approach effectively explained model predictions, including cases with partial tumour visibility thus showing superior explanatory power compared to individual XAI methods. This research enhances transparency and trust in AI-driven medical imaging analysis by offering a more comprehensive perspective on the model's reasoning. The study demonstrates the potential of integrated XAI techniques in improving the reliability and interpretability of AI systems in healthcare, particularly for critical tasks like brain tumour detection.

AI.tldr: 本研究结合了 GRAD-CAM、LRP 和 SHAP 等多种可解释人工智能（XAI）技术，用于解释用于脑肿瘤检测的深度学习模型，提高了模型的可解释性和可靠性。
AI.motivation: 提高用于脑肿瘤检测的深度学习模型的可解释性，增强对模型决策过程的理解和信任，尤其是在处理部分可见的肿瘤时。
AI.method: 开发并训练了一个自定义卷积神经网络（CNN）在 BraTS 2021 数据集上，并结合使用 GRAD-CAM、LRP 和 SHAP 三种 XAI 技术来提供多层次的解释。
AI.result: CNN 模型在区分肿瘤和非肿瘤区域时达到了 91.24% 的准确率。集成的 XAI 方法能够提供从大范围兴趣区域到像素级细节的解释，有效解释了模型的预测，包括部分肿瘤可见的情况，优于单一 XAI 方法。
AI.conclusion: 集成多种 XAI 技术能够为医疗成像分析中的 AI 模型提供更全面的解释视角，提高透明度和可信度，特别是在脑肿瘤检测等关键任务中，显示出提高 AI 系统可靠性和可解释性的潜力。

title: Length-Unbiased Sequence Policy Optimization: Revealing and Controlling Response Length Variation in RLVR
summary: Recent applications of Reinforcement Learning with Verifiable Rewards (RLVR) to Large Language Models (LLMs) and Vision-Language Models (VLMs) have demonstrated significant success in enhancing reasoning capabilities for complex tasks. During RLVR training, an increase in response length is often regarded as a key factor contributing to the growth of reasoning ability. However, the patterns of change in response length vary significantly across different RLVR algorithms during the training process. To provide a fundamental explanation for these variations, this paper conducts an in-depth analysis of the components of mainstream RLVR algorithms. We present a theoretical analysis of the factors influencing response length and validate our theory through extensive experimentation. Building upon these theoretical findings, we propose the Length-Unbiased Sequence Policy Optimization (LUSPO) algorithm. Specifically, we rectify the length bias inherent in Group Sequence Policy Optimization (GSPO), rendering its loss function unbiased with respect to response length and thereby resolving the issue of response length collapse. We conduct extensive experiments across mathematical reasoning benchmarks and multimodal reasoning scenarios, where LUSPO consistently achieves superior performance. Empirical results demonstrate that LUSPO represents a novel, state-of-the-art optimization strategy compared to existing methods such as GRPO and GSPO.

AI.tldr: 本文分析了影响强化学习（RLVR）训练中LLM/VLM响应长度变化的因素，并提出了一种名为LUSPO的新算法，旨在解决现有算法（如GSPO）中存在的长度偏差问题，并在多个推理基准测试中取得了优于现有方法的性能。
AI.motivation: 现有RLVR算法在训练LLM/VLM时，响应长度的变化模式各不相同，影响了推理能力的提升。作者希望从根本上解释这些变化，并改进算法。
AI.method: 首先，对主流RLVR算法的组件进行深入分析，并提出一个影响响应长度的理论模型。然后，通过实验验证该理论。最后，基于理论发现，提出LUSPO算法，该算法修正了GSPO算法中的长度偏差，使其损失函数对响应长度无偏。
AI.result: LUSPO算法在数学推理和多模态推理的实验中，一致取得了优于GRPO和GSPO等现有方法的性能。
AI.conclusion: LUSPO是一种新颖且先进的序列策略优化算法，能够有效解决RLVR训练中响应长度偏差的问题，从而提升LLM/VLM的推理能力，并在各项基准测试中展现出SOTA性能。

title: PatchFlow: Leveraging a Flow-Based Model with Patch Features
summary: Die casting plays a crucial role across various industries due to its ability to craft intricate shapes with high precision and smooth surfaces. However, surface defects remain a major issue that impedes die casting quality control. Recently, computer vision techniques have been explored to automate and improve defect detection. In this work, we combine local neighbor-aware patch features with a normalizing flow model and bridge the gap between the generic pretrained feature extractor and industrial product images by introducing an adapter module to increase the efficiency and accuracy of automated anomaly detection. Compared to state-of-the-art methods, our approach reduces the error rate by 20\% on the MVTec AD dataset, achieving an image-level AUROC of 99.28\%. Our approach has also enhanced performance on the VisA dataset , achieving an image-level AUROC of 96.48\%. Compared to the state-of-the-art models, this represents a 28.2\% reduction in error. Additionally, experiments on a proprietary die casting dataset yield an accuracy of 95.77\% for anomaly detection, without requiring any anomalous samples for training. Our method illustrates the potential of leveraging computer vision and deep learning techniques to advance inspection capabilities for the die casting industry

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种结合局部邻域感知块特征和归一化流模型的方法，并通过引入适配器模块来提高自动化异常检测在工业产品图像上的效率和准确性，在多个数据集上取得了优于现有方法的性能。
AI.motivation: 压铸件表面缺陷是影响压铸质量控制的主要问题，需要自动化和改进的缺陷检测技术。
AI.method: 结合局部邻域感知块特征和归一化流模型，并引入适配器模块来连接预训练特征提取器和工业产品图像。该方法在训练过程中不需要异常样本。
AI.result: 在 MVTec AD 数据集上，错误率降低了 20%，图像级 AUROC 达到 99.28%。在 VisA 数据集上，错误率降低了 28.2%，图像级 AUROC 达到 96.48%。在专有的压铸数据集上，异常检测准确率达到 95.77%。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的方法展示了利用计算机视觉和深度学习技术提升压铸行业检测能力的潜力，能够实现高效准确的自动化异常检测，且无需异常样本进行训练。

title: Scalable and General Whole-Body Control for Cross-Humanoid Locomotion
summary: Learning-based whole-body controllers have become a key driver for humanoid robots, yet most existing approaches require robot-specific training. In this paper, we study the problem of cross-embodiment humanoid control and show that a single policy can robustly generalize across a wide range of humanoid robot designs with one-time training. We introduce XHugWBC, a novel cross-embodiment training framework that enables generalist humanoid control through: (1) physics-consistent morphological randomization, (2) semantically aligned observation and action spaces across diverse humanoid robots, and (3) effective policy architectures modeling morphological and dynamical properties. XHugWBC is not tied to any specific robot. Instead, it internalizes a broad distribution of morphological and dynamical characteristics during training. By learning motion priors from diverse randomized embodiments, the policy acquires a strong structural bias that supports zero-shot transfer to previously unseen robots. Experiments on twelve simulated humanoids and seven real-world robots demonstrate the strong generalization and robustness of the resulting universal controller.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为XHugWBC的跨具身训练框架，使得单一策略能够通过一次训练后，鲁棒地泛化到多种不同设计的类人机器人上，实现通用类人机器人控制。
AI.motivation: 现有基于学习的类人机器人全身控制器大多需要针对特定机器人进行训练，限制了其通用性。研究动机在于开发一种能够跨具身（cross-embodiment）泛化的类人机器人控制方法。
AI.method: XHugWBC框架通过以下三种方式实现跨具身控制：1. 物理一致的形态随机化；2. 跨越不同类人机器人的语义对齐的观测和动作空间；3. 有效的策略架构，能够建模形态和动力学属性。
AI.result: 该方法在十二个模拟类人机器人和七个真实世界机器人上的实验表明，其生成的通用控制器具有强大的泛化能力和鲁棒性，能够在零样本（zero-shot）情况下迁移到未见过的机器人上。
AI.conclusion: 通过在训练中内化广泛的形态和动力学特征，并从多样化的随机具身中学习运动先验，XHugWBC训练出的策略获得了强大的结构偏置，能够实现零样本跨具身泛化，从而克服了传统机器人控制方法对特定设计的依赖。

title: Towards a Science of Collective AI: LLM-based Multi-Agent Systems Need a Transition from Blind Trial-and-Error to Rigorous Science
summary: Recent advancements in Large Language Models (LLMs) have greatly extended the capabilities of Multi-Agent Systems (MAS), demonstrating significant effectiveness across a wide range of complex and open-ended domains. However, despite this rapid progress, the field still relies heavily on empirical trial-and-error. It lacks a unified and principled scientific framework necessary for systematic optimization and improvement. This bottleneck stems from the ambiguity of attribution: first, the absence of a structured taxonomy of factors leaves researchers restricted to unguided adjustments; second, the lack of a unified metric fails to distinguish genuine collaboration gain from mere resource accumulation. In this paper, we advocate for a transition to design science through an integrated framework. We advocate to establish the collaboration gain metric ($Γ$) as the scientific standard to isolate intrinsic gains from increased budgets. Leveraging $Γ$, we propose a factor attribution paradigm to systematically identify collaboration-driving factors. To support this, we construct a systematic MAS factor library, structuring the design space into control-level presets and information-level dynamics. Ultimately, this framework facilitates the transition from blind experimentation to rigorous science, paving the way towards a true science of Collective AI.

AI.tldr: 本文提出一个整合框架，旨在将多智能体系统（MAS）的研究从经验试错转向设计科学，通过引入协作增益指标（Γ）和因素归因范式，以系统地识别和优化协作驱动因素，从而推动集体人工智能（Collective AI）的科学发展。
AI.motivation: 当前多智能体系统（MAS）研究过度依赖经验试错，缺乏系统优化和改进的科学框架。主要瓶颈在于因素归因的模糊性：缺乏结构化分类限制了研究人员的调整，缺乏统一指标无法区分真正的协作收益和资源累积。
AI.method: 提出一个整合框架，包括：1. 建立协作增益指标（Γ）作为科学标准，以分离增益和预算；2. 提出因素归因范式，利用Γ系统识别协作驱动因素；3. 构建系统化的MAS因素库，将设计空间结构化为控制层预设和信息层动态。
AI.result: 该框架促进了从盲目实验到严谨科学的转变，能够系统地识别和度量影响MAS协作效率的因素，为未来的MAS研究提供了更科学的方法论。
AI.conclusion: 通过引入协作增益指标（Γ）和因素归因范式，本研究为MAS研究提供了一个从经验主义转向设计科学的途径，有望实现对集体人工智能（Collective AI）的更深入理解和系统性提升。

title: Active Label Cleaning for Reliable Detection of Electron Dense Deposits in Transmission Electron Microscopy Images
summary: Automated detection of electron dense deposits (EDD) in glomerular disease is hindered by the scarcity of high-quality labeled data. While crowdsourcing reduces annotation cost, it introduces label noise. We propose an active label cleaning method to efficiently denoise crowdsourced datasets. Our approach uses active learning to select the most valuable noisy samples for expert re-annotation, building high-accuracy cleaning models. A Label Selection Module leverages discrepancies between crowdsourced labels and model predictions for both sample selection and instance-level noise grading. Experiments show our method achieves 67.18% AP\textsubscript{50} on a private dataset, an 18.83% improvement over training on noisy labels. This performance reaches 95.79% of that with full expert annotation while reducing annotation cost by 73.30%. The method provides a practical, cost-effective solution for developing reliable medical AI with limited expert resources.

AI.tldr: 提出一种主动学习方法，通过选择最有价值的带噪样本进行专家重新标注，来高效地清理众包标注数据，从而在减少标注成本的同时，显著提高模型性能。
AI.motivation: 高质量的带标注医学影像数据稀缺，而众包标注虽然成本低，但引入了噪声。因此，需要一种方法来有效处理众包数据中的噪声。
AI.method: 利用主动学习选择最有可能包含噪声的样本进行专家重新标注。设计了一个标签选择模块，通过比较众包标签和模型预测之间的差异来选择样本和评估噪声等级。
AI.result: 在私有数据集上，该方法达到了67.18%的AP₅₀，比直接使用噪声标签训练提高了18.83%。此性能接近完全专家标注的95.79%，同时 annotation cost 降低了73.30%。
AI.conclusion: 该方法提供了一种实用且经济高效的解决方案，能够以有限的专家资源开发可靠的医学人工智能模型，尤其适用于处理众包数据中的噪声问题。

title: Automatic Cognitive Task Generation for In-Situ Evaluation of Embodied Agents
summary: As general intelligent agents are poised for widespread deployment in diverse households, evaluation tailored to each unique unseen 3D environment has become a critical prerequisite. However, existing benchmarks suffer from severe data contamination and a lack of scene specificity, inadequate for assessing agent capabilities in unseen settings. To address this, we propose a dynamic in-situ task generation method for unseen environments inspired by human cognition. We define tasks through a structured graph representation and construct a two-stage interaction-evolution task generation system for embodied agents (TEA). In the interaction stage, the agent actively interacts with the environment, creating a loop between task execution and generation that allows for continuous task generation. In the evolution stage, task graph modeling allows us to recombine and reuse existing tasks to generate new ones without external data. Experiments across 10 unseen scenes demonstrate that TEA automatically generated 87,876 tasks in two cycles, which human verification confirmed to be physically reasonable and encompassing essential daily cognitive capabilities. Benchmarking SOTA models against humans on our in-situ tasks reveals that models, despite excelling on public benchmarks, perform surprisingly poorly on basic perception tasks, severely lack 3D interaction awareness and show high sensitivity to task types in reasoning. These sobering findings highlight the necessity of in-situ evaluation before deploying agents into real-world human environments.

AI.tldr: 研究提出了一种动态的原位任务生成方法（TEA），用于评估通用智能代理在未见过环境中的能力。该方法通过与环境交互和任务图重组生成新任务，实验表明当前SOTA模型在真实场景下表现不佳，凸显了原位评估的必要性。
AI.motivation: 现有通用智能代理的评估基准存在数据污染和缺乏场景特异性问题，无法有效评估代理在未见过环境中的能力。因此，需要一种针对特定未见过环境的原位评估方法。
AI.method: 提出了一种动态的原位任务生成方法（TEA），包含两个阶段：1. 交互阶段：代理与环境互动，形成任务执行与生成的闭环，实现任务的连续生成。2. 演化阶段：利用任务图模型重组和复用现有任务，生成新任务，无需外部数据。
AI.result: TEA在10个未见过场景中自动生成了87,876个任务，经验证是合理且涵盖日常认知能力的。在TEA生成的任务上，SOTA模型表现远不如人类，尤其在基础感知、3D交互意识和任务类型推理方面存在显著不足。
AI.conclusion: 通用智能代理在部署到真实家庭环境前，必须进行原位评估。现有模型在未见过场景下的表现不佳，揭示了其在感知、交互和推理能力上的局限性，强调了开发更鲁棒的代理和评估方法的迫切性。

title: A Hybrid Autoencoder for Robust Heightmap Generation from Fused Lidar and Depth Data for Humanoid Robot Locomotion
summary: Reliable terrain perception is a critical prerequisite for the deployment of humanoid robots in unstructured, human-centric environments. While traditional systems often rely on manually engineered, single-sensor pipelines, this paper presents a learning-based framework that uses an intermediate, robot-centric heightmap representation. A hybrid Encoder-Decoder Structure (EDS) is introduced, utilizing a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) for spatial feature extraction fused with a Gated Recurrent Unit (GRU) core for temporal consistency. The architecture integrates multimodal data from an Intel RealSense depth camera, a LIVOX MID-360 LiDAR processed via efficient spherical projection, and an onboard IMU. Quantitative results demonstrate that multimodal fusion improves reconstruction accuracy by 7.2% over depth-only and 9.9% over LiDAR-only configurations. Furthermore, the integration of a 3.2 s temporal context reduces mapping drift.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于学习的无人机地形感知框架，通过融合深度相机、激光雷达和IMU数据，并利用时间上下文，提高了地形重建的准确性和鲁棒性。
AI.motivation: 在非结构化、以人为中心的复杂环境中可靠地感知地形是人形机器人部署的关键前提。
AI.method: 提出了一种混合式编码器-解码器结构（EDS），结合卷积神经网络（CNN）进行空间特征提取和门控循环单元（GRU）进行时间一致性处理。该架构集成了Intel RealSense深度相机、Livox Mid-360激光雷达（通过球面投影处理）和板载IMU的多模态数据。
AI.result: 多模态融合相比仅使用深度数据或仅使用激光雷达数据，分别提高了7.2%和9.9%的重建精度。集成3.2秒的时间上下文可以减少建图漂移。
AI.conclusion: 基于学习的多模态融合框架，结合时间上下文，能够提供更准确、更可靠的地形感知，为人形机器人在复杂环境中的导航和操作奠定基础。

title: MentorCollab: Selective Large-to-Small Inference-Time Guidance for Efficient Reasoning
summary: Large reasoning models (LRMs) achieve strong performance by producing long chains of thought, but their inference costs are high and often generate redundant reasoning. Small language models (SLMs) are far more efficient, yet struggle on multi-step reasoning tasks. A natural idea is to let a large model guide a small one at inference time as a mentor, yet existing collaboration methods often promote imitation, resulting in verbose reasoning without consistent error correction. We propose MentorCollab, an inference-time collaboration method in which an LRM selectively and sparsely guides an SLM, rather than taking over generation. At randomly sampled token positions, we probe for divergences between the two models and use a lightweight verifier to decide whether the SLM should follow a short lookahead segment from its mentor or continue on its own. Across 15 SLM--LRM pairs and 3 domains (math reasoning, general knowledge, and commonsense reasoning), our method improves performance in 12 settings, with average gains of 3.0% and up to 8.0%, while adopting only having 18.4% tokens generated by the expensive mentor model on average. We find that short segments and selective probing are sufficient for effective collaboration. Our results show that selective inference-time guidance restores large-model reasoning ability without substantial inference overhead.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为MentorCollab的推理时协作方法，该方法允许大型模型（LRM）稀疏地指导小型模型（SLM），从而在不显著增加推理成本的情况下提升SLM在复杂推理任务上的表现。
AI.motivation: 现有方法在利用大型模型（LRM）和小型模型（SLM）的优势时存在不足。LRM推理成本高且易产生冗余，而SLM在多步推理上表现不佳。现有的协作方法倾向于模仿，导致SLM生成冗长的推理且错误无法得到有效修正。
AI.method: MentorCollab在推理时，LRM选择性地、稀疏地指导SLM。在随机采样到的token位置，探测SLM和LRM之间的差异，并使用一个轻量级验证器决定SLM是遵循LRM生成的简短预测片段，还是自行继续生成。
AI.result: 在15个SLM-LRM对和3个领域（数学推理、常识推理、通用知识）的实验中，MentorCollab在12种设置下提升了性能，平均提升3.0%，最高可达8.0%。平均而言，只有18.4%的token由昂贵的LRM生成。研究发现，简短的预测片段和选择性探测足以实现有效的协作。
AI.conclusion: 选择性的推理时指导可以在不增加大量推理开销的情况下恢复大型模型的推理能力，表明MentorCollab是一种有效的SLM与LRM协作策略。

title: Residual Reinforcement Learning for Waste-Container Lifting Using Large-Scale Cranes with Underactuated Tools
summary: This paper studies the container lifting phase of a waste-container recycling task in urban environments, performed by a hydraulic loader crane equipped with an underactuated discharge unit, and proposes a residual reinforcement learning (RRL) approach that combines a nominal Cartesian controller with a learned residual policy. All experiments are conducted in simulation, where the task is characterized by tight geometric tolerances between the discharge-unit hooks and the container rings relative to the overall crane scale, making precise trajectory tracking and swing suppression essential. The nominal controller uses admittance control for trajectory tracking and pendulum-aware swing damping, followed by damped least-squares inverse kinematics with a nullspace posture term to generate joint velocity commands. A PPO-trained residual policy in Isaac Lab compensates for unmodeled dynamics and parameter variations, improving precision and robustness without requiring end-to-end learning from scratch. We further employ randomized episode initialization and domain randomization over payload properties, actuator gains, and passive joint parameters to enhance generalization. Simulation results demonstrate improved tracking accuracy, reduced oscillations, and higher lifting success rates compared to the nominal controller alone.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种残差强化学习（RRL）方法，用于解决城市环境中液压装载机起重机进行垃圾箱回收任务时的容器提升阶段，通过结合一个名义笛卡尔控制器和一个学习到的残差策略来提高精度和鲁棒性。
AI.motivation: 城市环境中垃圾箱回收任务对液压装载机起重机的精确轨迹跟踪和抑制摆动提出了挑战，特别是容器钩和容器环之间的几何公差很小。现有的名义控制器在处理未建模动力学和参数变化时存在不足。
AI.method: 研究采用残差强化学习（RRL）方法。首先，使用名义控制器（包括导纳控制进行轨迹跟踪和感知摆动的阻尼，以及阻尼最小二乘逆运动学生成关节速度指令）进行基本控制。然后，训练一个PPO（Proximal Policy Optimization）残差策略来补偿名义控制器未能处理的未建模动力学和参数变化。为了增强泛化能力，还采用了随机回合初始化和域随机化（针对负载属性、执行器增益和被动关节参数）。
AI.result: 仿真结果表明，与仅使用名义控制器相比，RRL方法提高了跟踪精度，减少了振荡，并提高了起重成功率。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的残差强化学习方法能够有效地提高液压装载机起重机在垃圾箱回收任务中的容器提升性能，通过学习补偿名义控制器中的未建模动态和参数变化，实现了更高的精度和鲁棒性，并能有效泛化到不同的工作条件。

title: Beyond Cosine Similarity
summary: Cosine similarity, the standard metric for measuring semantic similarity in vector spaces, is mathematically grounded in the Cauchy-Schwarz inequality, which inherently limits it to capturing linear relationships--a constraint that fails to model the complex, nonlinear structures of real-world semantic spaces. We advance this theoretical underpinning by deriving a tighter upper bound for the dot product than the classical Cauchy-Schwarz bound. This new bound leads directly to recos, a similarity metric that normalizes the dot product by the sorted vector components. recos relaxes the condition for perfect similarity from strict linear dependence to ordinal concordance, thereby capturing a broader class of relationships. Extensive experiments across 11 embedding models--spanning static, contextualized, and universal types--demonstrate that recos consistently outperforms traditional cosine similarity, achieving higher correlation with human judgments on standard Semantic Textual Similarity (STS) benchmarks. Our work establishes recos as a mathematically principled and empirically superior alternative, offering enhanced accuracy for semantic analysis in complex embedding spaces.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为 recos 的新语义相似度度量方法，它通过改进的 Cauchy-Schwarz 不等式理论基础，能够捕捉比余弦相似度更复杂的非线性关系，并在多项实验中取得了优于余弦相似度的结果。
AI.motivation: 余弦相似度在衡量向量空间中的语义相似度时，其数学基础（Cauchy-Schwarz 不等式）限制了它只能捕捉线性关系，无法充分模拟真实世界语义空间的复杂非线性结构。
AI.method: 通过推导比经典 Cauchy-Schwarz 边界更紧密的点积上界，引出了 recos 度量方法。recos 通过将点积除以排序后的向量分量进行归一化，将完美相似的条件从严格的线性依赖放宽到序数一致性，从而捕捉更广泛的关系。
AI.result: 在 11 种不同类型的嵌入模型（包括静态、上下文感知和通用模型）上的广泛实验表明，recos 在标准的语义文本相似度（STS）基准测试中，与人类判断的相关性持续高于传统的余弦相似度。
AI.conclusion: recos 是一种在数学上合理且经验上优越的替代方案，为复杂嵌入空间中的语义分析提供了更高的准确性。

title: How Do Language Models Acquire Character-Level Information?
summary: Language models (LMs) have been reported to implicitly encode character-level information, despite not being explicitly provided during training. However, the mechanisms underlying this phenomenon remain largely unexplored. To reveal the mechanisms, we analyze how models acquire character-level knowledge by comparing LMs trained under controlled settings, such as specifying the pre-training dataset or tokenizer, with those trained under standard settings. We categorize the contributing factors into those independent of tokenization. Our analysis reveals that merge rules and orthographic constraints constitute primary factors arising from tokenization, whereas semantic associations of substrings and syntactic information function as key factors independent of tokenization.

AI.tldr: 本文探究了语言模型（LMs）在没有显式训练的情况下，如何隐式地编码字符级信息，并揭示了其背后的机制。
AI.motivation: 尽管语言模型被报告能隐式编码字符级信息，但其潜在机制仍未得到充分研究。
AI.method: 通过比较在受控设置（指定预训练数据集或分词器）和标准设置下训练的语言模型，分析模型获取字符级知识的过程。将影响因素分为与分词相关的和独立于分词的。
AI.result: 研究发现，分词相关的因素主要包括合并规则和正交约束；而与分词无关的因素则主要是子字符串的语义关联和句法信息。
AI.conclusion: 语言模型通过分词（合并规则、正交约束）和非分词（语义关联、句法信息）机制隐式地获取字符级知识。

title: RFM-Pose:Reinforcement-Guided Flow Matching for Fast Category-Level 6D Pose Estimation
comment: This work has been submitted to the IEEE for possible publication
summary: Object pose estimation is a fundamental problem in computer vision and plays a critical role in virtual reality and embodied intelligence, where agents must understand and interact with objects in 3D space. Recently, score based generative models have to some extent solved the rotational symmetry ambiguity problem in category level pose estimation, but their efficiency remains limited by the high sampling cost of score-based diffusion. In this work, we propose a new framework, RFM-Pose, that accelerates category-level 6D object pose generation while actively evaluating sampled hypotheses. To improve sampling efficiency, we adopt a flow-matching generative model and generate pose candidates along an optimal transport path from a simple prior to the pose distribution. To further refine these candidates, we cast the flow-matching sampling process as a Markov decision process and apply proximal policy optimization to fine-tune the sampling policy. In particular, we interpret the flow field as a learnable policy and map an estimator to a value network, enabling joint optimization of pose generation and hypothesis scoring within a reinforcement learning framework. Experiments on the REAL275 benchmark demonstrate that RFM-Pose achieves favorable performance while significantly reducing computational cost. Moreover, similar to prior work, our approach can be readily adapted to object pose tracking and attains competitive results in this setting.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种名为 RFM-Pose 的新框架，通过结合流匹配生成模型和强化学习，显著提高了类别级 6D 对象姿态估计的效率和准确性，并将其成功应用于姿态跟踪任务。
AI.motivation: 现有的基于得分的生成模型在解决类别级姿态估计的旋转对称性模糊问题上取得了一定进展，但其高采样成本限制了效率。因此，需要一种更高效的姿态生成方法。
AI.method: RFM-Pose 框架采用流匹配生成模型，沿着最优传输路径生成姿态候选。同时，将流匹配采样过程建模为马尔可夫决策过程，并使用近端策略优化（PPO）来微调采样策略。其中，流场被视为可学习策略，估计器被映射到价值网络，实现了姿态生成和假设评分的联合优化。
AI.result: 在 REAL275 基准测试中，RFM-Pose 取得了出色的性能，同时显著降低了计算成本。此外，该方法还可以轻松应用于对象姿态跟踪，并获得了有竞争力的结果。
AI.conclusion: RFM-Pose 框架成功地提高了类别级 6D 对象姿态估计的效率和准确性，并且易于扩展到姿态跟踪任务，证明了其在计算机视觉和具身智能领域的潜力。

title: From Bench to Flight: Translating Drone Impact Tests into Operational Safety Limits
summary: Indoor micro-aerial vehicles (MAVs) are increasingly used for tasks that require close proximity to people, yet practitioners lack practical methods to tune motion limits based on measured impact risk. We present an end-to-end, open toolchain that converts benchtop impact tests into deployable safety governors for drones. First, we describe a compact and replicable impact rig and protocol for capturing force-time profiles across drone classes and contact surfaces. Second, we provide data-driven models that map pre-impact speed to impulse and contact duration, enabling direct computation of speed bounds for a target force limit. Third, we release scripts and a ROS2 node that enforce these bounds online and log compliance, with support for facility-specific policies. We validate the workflow on multiple commercial off-the-shelf quadrotors and representative indoor assets, demonstrating that the derived governors preserve task throughput while meeting force constraints specified by safety stakeholders. Our contribution is a practical bridge from measured impacts to runtime limits, with shareable datasets, code, and a repeatable process that teams can adopt to certify indoor MAV operations near humans.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种端到端的工具链，可以将碰撞测试结果转化为无人机的安全控制器，用于室内微型飞行器（MAV）在靠近人时安全运行。
AI.motivation: 室内MAV常用于近距离接触人体的任务，但缺乏实用的方法来根据实际的冲击风险来调整运动限制。
AI.method: 1. 设计并描述了一个紧凑且可复制的冲击测试平台和协议，用于捕捉不同无人机类型和接触表面的力-时间曲线。2. 开发了数据驱动模型，将碰撞前的速度映射到冲量和接触时长，从而可以直接计算出满足目标力限制的速度边界。3. 发布了实现这些边界在线强制执行和日志记录的脚本和ROS2节点，并支持特定策略。
AI.result: 通过在多种商用四旋翼无人机和典型的室内环境中进行验证，证明了所开发的控制器在满足安全要求的同时，能够保持任务吞吐量。
AI.conclusion: 本文提供了一个从测量冲击到运行时限制的实用桥梁，通过可分享的数据集、代码和可重复的流程，支持团队认证室内MAV在人附近的安全运行。

title: ReGLA: Efficient Receptive-Field Modeling with Gated Linear Attention Network
summary: Balancing accuracy and latency on high-resolution images is a critical challenge for lightweight models, particularly for Transformer-based architectures that often suffer from excessive latency. To address this issue, we introduce \textbf{ReGLA}, a series of lightweight hybrid networks, which integrates efficient convolutions for local feature extraction with ReLU-based gated linear attention for global modeling. The design incorporates three key innovations: the Efficient Large Receptive Field (ELRF) module for enhancing convolutional efficiency while preserving a large receptive field; the ReLU Gated Modulated Attention (RGMA) module for maintaining linear complexity while enhancing local feature representation; and a multi-teacher distillation strategy to boost performance on downstream tasks. Extensive experiments validate the superiority of ReGLA; particularly the ReGLA-M achieves \textbf{80.85\%} Top-1 accuracy on ImageNet-1K at $224px$, with only \textbf{4.98 ms} latency at $512px$. Furthermore, ReGLA outperforms similarly scaled iFormer models in downstream tasks, achieving gains of \textbf{3.1\%} AP on COCO object detection and \textbf{3.6\%} mIoU on ADE20K semantic segmentation, establishing it as a state-of-the-art solution for high-resolution visual applications.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为ReGLA的轻量级混合网络，通过结合高效卷积和基于ReLU的门控线性注意力机制，在保持低延迟的同时提高了高分辨率图像处理的准确性，并在ImageNet、COCO和ADE20K等任务上取得了SOTA的性能。
AI.motivation: 现有轻量级Transformer模型在高分辨率图像处理时面临准确性和延迟难以平衡的挑战。
AI.method: 设计了ReGLA系列混合网络，包含高效大感受野（ELRF）模块和ReLU门控调制注意力（RGMA）模块。ELRF模块用于增强卷积的效率和感受野，RGMA模块用于保持线性复杂度同时增强局部特征表示。此外，采用多教师蒸馏策略提升下游任务性能。
AI.result: ReGLA-M模型在ImageNet-1K $224px$ 分辨率下达到了80.85%的Top-1准确率，并且在$512px$ 分辨率下仅有4.98 ms的延迟。在下游任务上，ReGLA相比iFormer模型在COCO目标检测上提升了3.1% AP，在ADE20K语义分割上提升了3.6% mIoU。
AI.conclusion: ReGLA是一种有效的轻量级混合网络，能够显著提升在高分辨率图像上的准确性和效率，并在多种下游视觉任务上表现出优越的性能，是高分辨率视觉应用的SOTA解决方案。

title: Hallucination-Resistant Security Planning with a Large Language Model
comment: Accepted to IEEE/IFIP Network Operations and Management Symposium 2026. To appear in the conference proceedings
summary: Large language models (LLMs) are promising tools for supporting security management tasks, such as incident response planning. However, their unreliability and tendency to hallucinate remain significant challenges. In this paper, we address these challenges by introducing a principled framework for using an LLM as decision support in security management. Our framework integrates the LLM in an iterative loop where it generates candidate actions that are checked for consistency with system constraints and lookahead predictions. When consistency is low, we abstain from the generated actions and instead collect external feedback, e.g., by evaluating actions in a digital twin. This feedback is then used to refine the candidate actions through in-context learning (ICL). We prove that this design allows to control the hallucination risk by tuning the consistency threshold. Moreover, we establish a bound on the regret of ICL under certain assumptions. To evaluate our framework, we apply it to an incident response use case where the goal is to generate a response and recovery plan based on system logs. Experiments on four public datasets show that our framework reduces recovery times by up to 30% compared to frontier LLMs.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一种将大型语言模型（LLM）用作安全管理决策支持的框架，通过迭代过程结合LLM生成、约束检查、预测和外部反馈，有效控制了幻觉风险并提高了响应效率。
AI.motivation: 大型语言模型在安全管理任务（如事件响应规划）方面潜力巨大，但其不可靠性和产生幻觉的倾向是主要挑战。
AI.method: 框架采用迭代循环：LLM生成候选行动，通过与系统约束和前瞻预测的一致性检查。当一致性低时，收集外部反馈（如在数字孪生中评估），并通过上下文学习（ICL）来优化候选行动。论文证明了通过调整一致性阈值可以控制幻觉风险，并给出了ICL的后悔界限。
AI.result: 在处理事件响应用例时，该框架通过利用系统日志生成响应和恢复计划。在四个公开数据集上的实验表明，与前沿LLM相比，该框架可以将恢复时间缩短高达30%。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的框架能够有效地将LLM集成到安全管理决策中，通过结合约束检查、前瞻预测和反馈机制，显著降低了幻觉风险，并提高了事件响应的效率。

title: PACE: Defying the Scaling Hypothesis of Exploration in Iterative Alignment for Mathematical Reasoning
summary: Iterative Direct Preference Optimization has emerged as the state-of-the-art paradigm for aligning Large Language Models on reasoning tasks. Standard implementations (DPO-R1) rely on Best-of-N sampling (e.g., $N \ge 8$) to mine golden trajectories from the distribution tail. In this paper, we challenge this scaling hypothesis and reveal a counter-intuitive phenomenon: in mathematical reasoning, aggressive exploration yields diminishing returns and even catastrophic policy collapse. We theoretically demonstrate that scaling $N$ amplifies verifier noise and induces detrimental distribution shifts. To resolve this, we introduce \textbf{PACE} (Proximal Alignment via Corrective Exploration), which replaces brute-force mining with a generation-based corrective strategy. Operating with a minimal budget ($2<N<3$), PACE synthesizes high-fidelity preference pairs from failed explorations. Empirical evaluations show that PACE outperforms DPO-R1 $(N=16)$ while using only about $1/5$ of the compute, demonstrating superior robustness against reward hacking and label noise.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为PACE的新方法，用于优化大型语言模型在推理任务上的对齐，通过纠正性探索取代传统的Best-of-N采样，能够在更低的采样预算下实现更好的性能，并减少算力消耗。
AI.motivation: 现有迭代式直接偏好优化（DPO）方法在推理任务上依赖于Best-of-N采样，本文作者质疑这种扩展假设，并发现过度的探索会带来边际效益递减甚至策略崩溃，尤其在数学推理任务中。
AI.method: 本文引入了PACE（Proximal Alignment via Corrective Exploration）方法，用生成式纠正策略替代暴力挖掘。PACE在最小预算（2 < N < 3）下，从失败的探索中合成高质量的偏好对。
AI.result: PACE在数学推理任务上的表现优于DPO-R1（N=16），同时计算量仅为DPO-R1的约1/5。PACE还展示了对奖励欺骗和标签噪声的更高鲁棒性。
AI.conclusion: PACE方法通过纠正性探索，克服了传统Best-of-N采样在推理任务中遇到的问题，实现了更高效、更鲁棒的模型对齐，并显著降低了计算成本。

title: Position: Universal Time Series Foundation Models Rest on a Category Error
summary: This position paper argues that the pursuit of "Universal Foundation Models for Time Series" rests on a fundamental category error, mistaking a structural Container for a semantic Modality. We contend that because time series hold incompatible generative processes (e.g., finance vs. fluid dynamics), monolithic models degenerate into expensive "Generic Filters" that fail to generalize under distributional drift. To address this, we introduce the "Autoregressive Blindness Bound," a theoretical limit proving that history-only models cannot predict intervention-driven regime shifts. We advocate replacing universality with a Causal Control Agent paradigm, where an agent leverages external context to orchestrate a hierarchy of specialized solvers, from frozen domain experts to lightweight Just-in-Time adaptors. We conclude by calling for a shift in benchmarks from "Zero-Shot Accuracy" to "Drift Adaptation Speed" to prioritize robust, control-theoretic systems.

AI.tldr: 本文认为“通用时间序列基础模型”存在范畴错误，将结构性容器误认为语义模态。由于时间序列包含不兼容的生成过程，单体模型会退化为昂贵的“通用过滤器”，无法应对分布漂移。文章提出了“自回归盲点界限”理论，证明仅依赖历史的模型无法预测干预驱动的模式转变。作者提倡用“因果控制代理”范式取代通用性，其中代理利用外部上下文协调一系列专业求解器。最后，文章呼吁将基准从“零样本准确率”转向“漂移适应速度”，以促进鲁棒的、控制理论驱动的系统。
AI.motivation: 时间序列数据具有复杂的、不兼容的生成过程，导致通用的基础模型在应对分布漂移和模式转变时表现不佳。
AI.method: 提出“自回归盲点界限”理论证明历史模型无法预测干预驱动的模式转变；提倡“因果控制代理”范式，利用外部上下文协调专业求解器。
AI.result: 理论上证明了历史模型无法预测干预驱动的模式转变；提出了一个替代通用模型的新范式。
AI.conclusion: 应放弃追求“通用时间序列基础模型”，转而发展“因果控制代理”范式，并通过改变基准评估标准来促进更鲁棒、更适应变化的时间序列系统。

title: Visuo-Tactile World Models
summary: We introduce multi-task Visuo-Tactile World Models (VT-WM), which capture the physics of contact through touch reasoning. By complementing vision with tactile sensing, VT-WM better understands robot-object interactions in contact-rich tasks, avoiding common failure modes of vision-only models under occlusion or ambiguous contact states, such as objects disappearing, teleporting, or moving in ways that violate basic physics. Trained across a set of contact-rich manipulation tasks, VT-WM improves physical fidelity in imagination, achieving 33% better performance at maintaining object permanence and 29% better compliance with the laws of motion in autoregressive rollouts. Moreover, experiments show that grounding in contact dynamics also translates to planning. In zero-shot real-robot experiments, VT-WM achieves up to 35% higher success rates, with the largest gains in multi-step, contact-rich tasks. Finally, VT-WM demonstrates significant downstream versatility, effectively adapting its learned contact dynamics to a novel task and achieving reliable planning success with only a limited set of demonstrations.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种多任务的视觉-触觉世界模型（VT-WM），通过融合视觉和触觉信息来更好地理解机器人与物体的接触交互，在避免遮挡和模糊接触状态下的常见失败模式方面表现优于纯视觉模型，并在实际机器人操作任务中取得了显著的性能提升。
AI.motivation: 现有基于视觉的模型在处理接触丰富的机器人任务时，在物体遮挡或接触状态不明确时容易出现失败，如物体消失、瞬移或违反物理定律的移动。因此，需要一种能够结合触觉信息来改进机器人对物理世界的理解，尤其是在接触交互方面。
AI.method: 引入了多任务的视觉-触觉世界模型（VT-WM），通过融合视觉和触觉感知来捕捉接触的物理规律。该模型在多种接触丰富的操纵任务上进行训练，以提高物理保真度。
AI.result: VT-WM在保持物体不变性方面提高了33%，在自动回归滚动中遵守运动定律方面提高了29%。在零样本真实机器人实验中，VT-WM的成功率提高了35%，尤其是在多步、接触丰富的任务中。此外，VT-WM能够有效地将其学到的接触动力学适应到新任务中，并以有限的演示实现可靠的规划。
AI.conclusion: 视觉-触觉世界模型（VT-WM）能够通过触觉推理来捕捉接触的物理规律，显著提高了机器人在接触丰富任务中的物理保真度和规划能力，并展示了其在下游任务中的通用性。

title: Unlocking Prototype Potential: An Efficient Tuning Framework for Few-Shot Class-Incremental Learning
summary: Few-shot class-incremental learning (FSCIL) seeks to continuously learn new classes from very limited samples while preserving previously acquired knowledge. Traditional methods often utilize a frozen pre-trained feature extractor to generate static class prototypes, which suffer from the inherent representation bias of the backbone. While recent prompt-based tuning methods attempt to adapt the backbone via minimal parameter updates, given the constraint of extreme data scarcity, the model's capacity to assimilate novel information and substantively enhance its global discriminative power is inherently limited. In this paper, we propose a novel shift in perspective: freezing the feature extractor while fine-tuning the prototypes. We argue that the primary challenge in FSCIL is not feature acquisition, but rather the optimization of decision regions within a static, high-quality feature space. To this end, we introduce an efficient prototype fine-tuning framework that evolves static centroids into dynamic, learnable components. The framework employs a dual-calibration method consisting of class-specific and task-aware offsets. These components function synergistically to improve the discriminative capacity of prototypes for ongoing incremental classes. Extensive results demonstrate that our method attains superior performance across multiple benchmarks while requiring minimal learnable parameters.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种新颖的解决方案，通过在冻结特征提取器的同时微调原型来解决少样本类增量学习（FSCIL）问题。该方法通过引入类特定的和任务感知的偏移量，使静态质心变为动态的、可学习的组件，从而提高原型对新类的区分能力，并在多个基准测试中取得了优越的性能。
AI.motivation: 传统的FSCIL方法依赖于冻结的特征提取器，这会导致表示偏差。尽管提示调优方法有所改进，但在样本极端稀缺的情况下，模型吸收新信息和提升全局判别能力的能力仍然有限。因此，作者认为FSCIL的核心挑战在于优化决策区域，而不是特征获取。
AI.method: 作者提出了一种新颖的视角，即冻结特征提取器并微调原型。他们引入了一个高效的原型微调框架，将静态质心转变为动态的、可学习的组件。该框架采用双重校准方法，包括类特定的偏移量和任务感知的偏移量，以提高原型对持续增量类的区分能力。
AI.result: 通过广泛的实验结果表明，该方法在多个基准测试中取得了优于现有方法的性能，并且仅需要极少的学习参数。
AI.conclusion: 作者提出的原型微调框架通过动态调整决策区域，有效地解决了FSCIL中的表示偏差问题，并在极度数据稀缺的情况下实现了高性能，证明了在固定特征空间中优化决策区域的重要性。

title: CommCP: Efficient Multi-Agent Coordination via LLM-Based Communication with Conformal Prediction
comment: IEEE International Conference on Robotics and Automation (ICRA 2026); Project Website: https://comm-cp.github.io/
summary: To complete assignments provided by humans in natural language, robots must interpret commands, generate and answer relevant questions for scene understanding, and manipulate target objects. Real-world deployments often require multiple heterogeneous robots with different manipulation capabilities to handle different assignments cooperatively. Beyond the need for specialized manipulation skills, effective information gathering is important in completing these assignments. To address this component of the problem, we formalize the information-gathering process in a fully cooperative setting as an underexplored multi-agent multi-task Embodied Question Answering (MM-EQA) problem, which is a novel extension of canonical Embodied Question Answering (EQA), where effective communication is crucial for coordinating efforts without redundancy. To address this problem, we propose CommCP, a novel LLM-based decentralized communication framework designed for MM-EQA. Our framework employs conformal prediction to calibrate the generated messages, thereby minimizing receiver distractions and enhancing communication reliability. To evaluate our framework, we introduce an MM-EQA benchmark featuring diverse, photo-realistic household scenarios with embodied questions. Experimental results demonstrate that CommCP significantly enhances the task success rate and exploration efficiency over baselines. The experiment videos, code, and dataset are available on our project website: https://comm-cp.github.io.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为CommCP的基于LLM的去中心化通信框架，用于解决多智能体多任务具身问答（MM-EQA）问题，通过共形预测来校准通信，以提高协作效率和任务成功率。
AI.motivation: 现实世界中机器人需要合作完成人类指令，这需要机器人具备信息收集和有效沟通能力，而现有的具身问答（EQA）问题形式化程度不够，尤其是在多智能体协作和信息收集方面。
AI.method: 提出MM-EQA问题，一个新颖的多智能体多任务具身问答问题。提出CommCP框架，一个基于LLM的去中心化通信框架，并结合共形预测来校准生成的消息，减少干扰，提高通信可靠性。
AI.result: 在引入的MM-EQA基准测试上，CommCP相比于基线方法显著提高了任务成功率和探索效率。
AI.conclusion: CommCP是一个有效的去中心化通信框架，能够显著提升多智能体在具身问答任务中的协作表现，特别是在信息收集和任务完成方面。

title: Aspect-Aware MOOC Recommendation in a Heterogeneous Network
summary: MOOC recommendation systems have received increasing attention to help learners navigate and select preferred learning content. Traditional methods such as collaborative filtering and content-based filtering suffer from data sparsity and over-specialization. To alleviate these limitations, graph-based approaches have been proposed; however, they still rely heavily on manually predefined metapaths, which often capture only superficial structural relationships and impose substantial burdens on domain experts as well as significant engineering costs. To overcome these limitations, we propose AMR (Aspect-aware MOOC Recommendation), a novel framework that models path-specific multiple aspects by embedding the semantic content of nodes within each metapath. AMR automatically discovers metapaths through bi-directional walks, derives aspect-aware path representations using a bi-LSTM-based encoder, and incorporates these representations as edge features in the learner-learner and KC-KC subgraphs to achieve fine-grained semantically informed KC recommendations. Extensive experiments on the large-scale MOOCCube and PEEK datasets show that AMR consistently outperforms state-of-the-art graph neural network baselines across key metrics such as HR@K and nDCG@K. Further analysis confirms that AMR effectively captures rich path-specific aspect information, allowing more accurate recommendations than those methods that rely solely on predefined metapaths. The code will be available upon accepted.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为AMR的新型MOOC推荐框架，通过自动发现和学习路径特定方面的嵌入表示，克服了传统图方法依赖手动预定义元路径的局限性，并在两个大规模数据集上取得了优于现有方法的性能。
AI.motivation: 传统的MOOC推荐方法（如协同过滤和基于内容的过滤）存在数据稀疏和过度专业化的问题。图方法虽然有所改进，但仍依赖于手动预定义的元路径，这会带来巨大的专家负担和工程成本，并且只能捕捉到浅层结构关系。
AI.method: AMR框架通过双向游走自动发现元路径，利用基于bi-LSTM的编码器学习路径特定的多方面嵌入表示，并将这些表示作为学习者-学习者和知识点-知识点子图的边特征，从而实现细粒度的、语义丰富的知识点推荐。
AI.result: 在MOOCCube和PEEK两个大规模数据集上的实验表明，AMR在HR@K和nDCG@K等关键指标上 consistently 优于最先进的图神经网络基线方法。进一步分析证实AMR能有效捕捉丰富的路径特定方面信息，实现比仅依赖预定义元路径的方法更准确的推荐。
AI.conclusion: AMR框架能够通过自动学习路径特定方面嵌入来克服手动预定义元路径的缺点，从而实现更准确、更细粒度的MOOC推荐。

title: Cross-Lingual Empirical Evaluation of Large Language Models for Arabic Medical Tasks
summary: In recent years, Large Language Models (LLMs) have become widely used in medical applications, such as clinical decision support, medical education, and medical question answering. Yet, these models are often English-centric, limiting their robustness and reliability for linguistically diverse communities. Recent work has highlighted discrepancies in performance in low-resource languages for various medical tasks, but the underlying causes remain poorly understood. In this study, we conduct a cross-lingual empirical analysis of LLM performance on Arabic and English medical question and answering. Our findings reveal a persistent language-driven performance gap that intensifies with increasing task complexity. Tokenization analysis exposes structural fragmentation in Arabic medical text, while reliability analysis suggests that model-reported confidence and explanations exhibit limited correlation with correctness. Together, these findings underscore the need for language-aware design and evaluation strategies in LLMs for medical tasks.

AI.tldr: 大型语言模型（LLMs）在医学领域的应用日益广泛，但目前多为英语中心，限制了其在语言多样化社区的稳健性和可靠性。本研究对阿拉伯语和英语医学问答任务中的LLM性能进行了跨语言实证分析，发现语言差异导致的性能差距会随着任务复杂度的增加而加剧。对阿拉伯语医学文本的词元化分析揭示了其结构碎片化问题，而可靠性分析表明模型报告的置信度和解释与正确性相关性有限。研究强调了在医学任务中设计和评估LLM时，需要考虑语言的因素。
AI.motivation: 当前大型语言模型（LLMs）在医学领域应用广泛，但其英语中心化的特性限制了其在非英语语言社区中的可靠性。现有研究虽已注意到低资源语言下LLM性能的差异，但其根本原因尚不明确，因此需要进行深入的跨语言分析。
AI.method: 本研究采用跨语言实证分析方法，对LLMs在阿拉伯语和英语医学问答任务上的表现进行评估。分析内容包括性能差距、任务复杂度对性能的影响、阿拉伯语医学文本的词元化结构，以及模型报告的置信度和解释与正确性之间的相关性。
AI.result: 研究发现，在阿拉伯语和英语的医学问答任务中，存在持续存在的由语言驱动的性能差距，且这种差距随着任务复杂度的增加而加剧。对阿拉伯语文本的词元化分析显示出其结构碎片化问题。此外，模型报告的置信度和解释与预测的正确性之间的相关性有限。
AI.conclusion: 语言差异是影响LLMs在医学领域跨语言应用的关键因素，尤其是对于阿拉伯语等低资源语言。词元化和模型自身可靠性（置信度、解释）是造成性能差距的重要原因。因此，在开发和评估用于医学任务的LLMs时，必须采用语言感知的设计和评估策略。

title: IESR:Efficient MCTS-Based Modular Reasoning for Text-to-SQL with Large Language Models
comment: 25 pages, 16 figures, 8 tables. Hongyin Zan is corresponding author, Jiafan Lu is first co-author
summary: Text-to-SQL is a key natural language processing task that maps natural language questions to SQL queries, enabling intuitive interaction with web-based databases. Although current methods perform well on benchmarks like BIRD and Spider, they struggle with complex reasoning, domain knowledge, and hypothetical queries, and remain costly in enterprise deployment. To address these issues, we propose a framework named IESR(Information Enhanced Structured Reasoning) for lightweight large language models: (i) leverages LLMs for key information understanding and schema linking, and decoupling mathematical computation and SQL generation, (ii) integrates a multi-path reasoning mechanism based on Monte Carlo Tree Search (MCTS) with majority voting, and (iii) introduces a trajectory consistency verification module with a discriminator model to ensure accuracy and consistency. Experimental results demonstrate that IESR achieves state-of-the-art performance on the complex reasoning benchmark LogicCat (24.28 EX) and the Archer dataset (37.28 EX) using only compact lightweight models without fine-tuning. Furthermore, our analysis reveals that current coder models exhibit notable biases and deficiencies in physical knowledge, mathematical computation, and common-sense reasoning, highlighting important directions for future research. We released code at https://github.com/Ffunkytao/IESR-SLM.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一个名为IESR（Information Enhanced Structured Reasoning）的框架，用于轻量级大语言模型，以解决Text-to-SQL任务中复杂推理、领域知识和部署成本的问题。IESR通过信息增强、多路径推理和轨迹一致性验证来提高准确性和效率，并在LogicCat和Archer数据集上取得了最先进的性能。
AI.motivation: 现有Text-to-SQL方法在处理复杂推理、领域知识和假设性查询时存在困难，且在企业部署成本高昂。因此，需要一种更轻量级、更高效的解决方案。
AI.method: IESR框架包括三个主要部分：1. 利用LLM进行关键信息理解和模式链接，并将数学计算与SQL生成解耦；2. 基于蒙特卡洛树搜索（MCTS）并结合多数投票的多路径推理机制；3. 引入具有判别器模型的轨迹一致性验证模块，以确保准确性和一致性。
AI.result: IESR在复杂推理基准LogicCat（24.28 EX）和Archer数据集（37.28 EX）上取得了最先进的性能，且仅使用了紧凑的轻量级模型，无需微调。研究还揭示了现有代码模型在物理知识、数学计算和常识推理方面存在偏差和不足。
AI.conclusion: IESR框架有效地解决了Text-to-SQL任务中的复杂推理和效率问题，为轻量级大语言模型在数据库交互领域的应用提供了新的思路。同时，研究也指出了当前模型在特定知识领域存在的局限性，为未来的研究方向提供了参考。

title: Magic-MM-Embedding: Towards Visual-Token-Efficient Universal Multimodal Embedding with MLLMs
summary: Multimodal Large Language Models (MLLMs) have shown immense promise in universal multimodal retrieval, which aims to find relevant items of various modalities for a given query. But their practical application is often hindered by the substantial computational cost incurred from processing a large number of tokens from visual inputs. In this paper, we propose Magic-MM-Embedding, a series of novel models that achieve both high efficiency and state-of-the-art performance in universal multimodal embedding. Our approach is built on two synergistic pillars: (1) a highly efficient MLLM architecture incorporating visual token compression to drastically reduce inference latency and memory footprint, and (2) a multi-stage progressive training strategy designed to not only recover but significantly boost performance. This coarse-to-fine training paradigm begins with extensive continue pretraining to restore multimodal understanding and generation capabilities, progresses to large-scale contrastive pretraining and hard negative mining to enhance discriminative power, and culminates in a task-aware fine-tuning stage guided by an MLLM-as-a-Judge for precise data curation. Comprehensive experiments show that our model outperforms existing methods by a large margin while being more inference-efficient.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为 Magic-MM-Embedding 的高效 MLLM 模型，通过视觉令牌压缩和多阶段渐进式训练策略，在保证高性能的同时显著降低了推理成本，并在通用多模态检索任务上取得了 SOTA 表现。
AI.motivation: 现有 MLLM 在处理大量视觉令牌时计算成本高昂，限制了其在通用多模态检索中的实际应用。
AI.method: 1. 设计了一种高效的 MLLM 架构，采用视觉令牌压缩技术降低推理延迟和内存占用。2. 提出了一种多阶段渐进式训练策略：先进行广泛的持续预训练以恢复理解和生成能力，然后进行大规模对比预训练和困难负例挖掘以增强区分能力，最后通过 MLLM-as-a-Judge 进行任务感知微调以精确的数据策选。
AI.result: Magic-MM-Embedding 模型在通用多模态检索任务上，相比现有方法在性能上取得了显著优势，同时在推理效率上也更加优越。
AI.conclusion: Magic-MM-Embedding 通过高效的架构设计和创新的训练策略，成功地在保持甚至提升性能的同时，大幅降低了 MLLM 在多模态检索中的计算成本，为通用多模态检索的应用提供了更具可行性的解决方案。

title: Fast-SAM3D: 3Dfy Anything in Images but Faster
summary: SAM3D enables scalable, open-world 3D reconstruction from complex scenes, yet its deployment is hindered by prohibitive inference latency. In this work, we conduct the \textbf{first systematic investigation} into its inference dynamics, revealing that generic acceleration strategies are brittle in this context. We demonstrate that these failures stem from neglecting the pipeline's inherent multi-level \textbf{heterogeneity}: the kinematic distinctiveness between shape and layout, the intrinsic sparsity of texture refinement, and the spectral variance across geometries. To address this, we present \textbf{Fast-SAM3D}, a training-free framework that dynamically aligns computation with instantaneous generation complexity. Our approach integrates three heterogeneity-aware mechanisms: (1) \textit{Modality-Aware Step Caching} to decouple structural evolution from sensitive layout updates; (2) \textit{Joint Spatiotemporal Token Carving} to concentrate refinement on high-entropy regions; and (3) \textit{Spectral-Aware Token Aggregation} to adapt decoding resolution. Extensive experiments demonstrate that Fast-SAM3D delivers up to \textbf{2.67$\times$} end-to-end speedup with negligible fidelity loss, establishing a new Pareto frontier for efficient single-view 3D generation. Our code is released in https://github.com/wlfeng0509/Fast-SAM3D.

AI.tldr: Fast-SAM3D 是一个无需训练的框架，通过利用 SAM3D 的多层次异质性来动态优化计算，在不损失保真度的情况下实现了高达 2.67 倍的加速，从而在单视图 3D 生成领域树立了新的效率标杆。
AI.motivation: SAM3D 在 3D 重建方面表现出色，但其推理延迟过高，限制了实际应用。现有通用加速策略在此场景下效果不佳。
AI.method: 作者提出了 Fast-SAM3D，一个训练自由的框架，通过整合三种异质性感知机制来动态匹配计算复杂度：1. 模态感知步缓存，用于解耦结构演化和布局更新；2. 联合时空令牌裁剪，专注于高熵区域的精炼；3. 谱感知令牌聚合，适应解码分辨率。
AI.result: Fast-SAM3D 实现了高达 2.67 倍的端到端加速，同时几乎没有保真度损失，在单视图 3D 生成方面达到了新的效率和性能平衡点。
AI.conclusion: Fast-SAM3D 成功解决了 SAM3D 推理延迟过高的问题，通过充分利用其内在的多层次异质性，显著提升了效率，并在不牺牲质量的情况下推动了单视图 3D 生成的技术前沿。

title: IndustryShapes: An RGB-D Benchmark dataset for 6D object pose estimation of industrial assembly components and tools
summary: We introduce IndustryShapes, a new RGB-D benchmark dataset of industrial tools and components, designed for both instance-level and novel object 6D pose estimation approaches. The dataset provides a realistic and application-relevant testbed for benchmarking these methods in the context of industrial robotics bridging the gap between lab-based research and deployment in real-world manufacturing scenarios. Unlike many previous datasets that focus on household or consumer products or use synthetic, clean tabletop datasets, or objects captured solely in controlled lab environments, IndustryShapes introduces five new object types with challenging properties, also captured in realistic industrial assembly settings. The dataset has diverse complexity, from simple to more challenging scenes, with single and multiple objects, including scenes with multiple instances of the same object and it is organized in two parts: the classic set and the extended set. The classic set includes a total of 4,6k images and 6k annotated poses. The extended set introduces additional data modalities to support the evaluation of model-free and sequence-based approaches. To the best of our knowledge, IndustryShapes is the first dataset to offer RGB-D static onboarding sequences. We further evaluate the dataset on a representative set of state-of-the art methods for instance-based and novel object 6D pose estimation, including also object detection, segmentation, showing that there is room for improvement in this domain. The dataset page can be found in https://pose-lab.github.io/IndustryShapes.

AI.tldr: 介绍了一个名为IndustryShapes的新RGB-D数据集，包含工业工具和部件，用于6D姿态估计，旨在弥合实验室研究与实际工业应用之间的差距，并评估了现有方法的性能。
AI.motivation: 现有数据集多集中于家居用品或合成数据，缺乏在真实工业环境下捕获的、具有挑战性的工业部件数据，难以满足工业机器人实际部署的需求。
AI.method: 创建了一个名为IndustryShapes的RGB-D数据集，包含五种新的、具有挑战性的工业对象，并在真实的工业装配场景下进行拍摄。数据集分为经典集（4.6k图像，6k姿态）和扩展集（包含更多数据模态以支持无模型和序列化方法）。
AI.result: 在IndustryShapes数据集上评估了一系列先进的6D姿态估计、物体检测和分割方法，表明在这些任务上仍有改进空间。
AI.conclusion: IndustryShapes数据集为工业6D姿态估计提供了一个真实、多样且具有挑战性的基准，能够更好地评估方法在实际工业场景中的性能，并突出了该领域进一步研究的必要性。

title: Beyond Length: Context-Aware Expansion and Independence as Developmentally Sensitive Evaluation in Child Utterances
summary: Evaluating the quality of children's utterances in adult-child dialogue remains challenging due to insufficient context-sensitive metrics. Common proxies such as Mean Length of Utterance (MLU), lexical diversity (vocd-D), and readability indices (Flesch-Kincaid Grade Level, Gunning Fog Index) are dominated by length and ignore conversational context, missing aspects of response quality such as reasoning depth, topic maintenance, and discourse planning. We introduce an LLM-as-a-judge framework that first classifies the Previous Adult Utterance Type and then scores the child's response along two axes: Expansion (contextual elaboration and inferential depth) and Independence (the child's contribution to advancing the discourse). These axes reflect fundamental dimensions in child language development, where Expansion captures elaboration, clause combining, and causal and contrastive connectives. Independence captures initiative, topic control, decreasing reliance on adult scaffolding through growing self-regulation, and audience design. We establish developmental validity by showing age-related patterns and demonstrate predictive value by improving age estimation over common baselines. We further confirm semantic sensitivity by detecting differences tied to discourse relations. Our metrics align with human judgments, enabling large-scale evaluation. This shifts child utterance assessment from simply measuring length to evaluating how meaningfully the child's speech contributes to and advances the conversation within its context.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种基于大型语言模型（LLM）的儿童话语质量评估框架，超越了传统的基于长度的指标，通过评估儿童回应的“扩展性”（contextual elaboration and inferential depth）和“独立性”（contribution to advancing the discourse），以更全面地衡量儿童语言发展的质量和对话贡献。
AI.motivation: 现有的儿童话语质量评估指标（如MLU、词汇多样性、可读性指数）主要关注长度，忽略了对话的上下文，无法有效捕捉推理深度、话题维持和话语规划等关键方面，尤其是在成人-儿童对话中。
AI.method: 研究者构建了一个“LLM-as-a-judge”框架，首先对上一句成人话语进行类型分类，然后从“扩展性”和“独立性”两个维度对儿童的回应进行评分。这两个维度分别代表了儿童语言发展中的阐述、从句组合、因果/对比连接词（扩展性），以及主动性、话题控制、减少对成人依赖、自我调节和听众设计（独立性）。
AI.result: 该框架在发展有效性上展现了与年龄相关的模式，并在年龄估计方面优于现有基线。同时，它也证实了语义敏感性，能够检测到与话语关系相关的差异。此外，评估结果与人类判断高度一致，使得大规模评估成为可能。
AI.conclusion: 本研究提出了一种创新的、基于LLM的儿童话语评估方法，将评估重心从单纯的长度测量转移到在特定语境下评估儿童话语对对话的意义贡献和推进作用，为儿童语言发展评估提供了更强大、更具上下文意识的工具。

title: MerNav: A Highly Generalizable Memory-Execute-Review Framework for Zero-Shot Object Goal Navigation
summary: Visual Language Navigation (VLN) is one of the fundamental capabilities for embodied intelligence and a critical challenge that urgently needs to be addressed. However, existing methods are still unsatisfactory in terms of both success rate (SR) and generalization: Supervised Fine-Tuning (SFT) approaches typically achieve higher SR, while Training-Free (TF) approaches often generalize better, but it is difficult to obtain both simultaneously. To this end, we propose a Memory-Execute-Review framework. It consists of three parts: a hierarchical memory module for providing information support, an execute module for routine decision-making and actions, and a review module for handling abnormal situations and correcting behavior. We validated the effectiveness of this framework on the Object Goal Navigation task. Across 4 datasets, our average SR achieved absolute improvements of 7% and 5% compared to all baseline methods under TF and Zero-Shot (ZS) settings, respectively. On the most commonly used HM3D_v0.1 and the more challenging open vocabulary dataset HM3D_OVON, the SR improved by 8% and 6%, under ZS settings. Furthermore, on the MP3D and HM3D_OVON datasets, our method not only outperformed all TF methods but also surpassed all SFT methods, achieving comprehensive leadership in both SR (5% and 2%) and generalization.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种名为“记忆-执行-审查”（Memory-Execute-Review, MER）的框架，旨在解决视觉语言导航（VLN）任务中监督微调（SFT）方法成功率高但泛化性差，以及无训练（TF）方法泛化性好但成功率低的难题。MER框架结合了分层记忆模块、执行模块和审查模块，在多个数据集上显著提高了成功率和泛化能力，并且在某些设置下超越了SFT和TF方法。
AI.motivation: 现有的视觉语言导航（VLN）方法在成功率（SR）和泛化能力上存在权衡，SFT方法成功率高但泛化性差，TF方法泛化性好但成功率低，难以同时实现两者。研究者希望提出一种新框架，能够同时提升VLN的成功率和泛化能力。
AI.method: 提出了一种名为“记忆-执行-审查”（Memory-Execute-Review, MER）的框架。该框架包含三个主要部分：1. 分层记忆模块（hierarchical memory module）：提供信息支持。2. 执行模块（execute module）：进行常规的决策和动作。3. 审查模块（review module）：处理异常情况并纠正行为。该框架被应用于目标导航任务。
AI.result: 在4个数据集上，MER框架在TF和零样本（ZS）设置下，平均成功率（SR）分别比所有基线方法提高了7%和5%。在HM3D_v0.1和HM3D_OVON数据集上，零样本（ZS）设置下的SR分别提高了8%和6%。在MP3D和HM3D_OVON数据集上，MER不仅超越了所有TF方法，也超越了所有SFT方法，在SR（分别提高5%和2%）和泛化能力上均取得了领先。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的“记忆-执行-审查”（MER）框架能够有效解决VLN任务中成功率和泛化性之间的权衡问题，在目标导航任务上取得了显著的性能提升，并在多种设置下展现出超越现有SFT和TF方法的综合优势。

title: ProAct: Agentic Lookahead in Interactive Environments
summary: Existing Large Language Model (LLM) agents struggle in interactive environments requiring long-horizon planning, primarily due to compounding errors when simulating future states. To address this, we propose ProAct, a framework that enables agents to internalize accurate lookahead reasoning through a two-stage training paradigm. First, we introduce Grounded LookAhead Distillation (GLAD), where the agent undergoes supervised fine-tuning on trajectories derived from environment-based search. By compressing complex search trees into concise, causal reasoning chains, the agent learns the logic of foresight without the computational overhead of inference-time search. Second, to further refine decision accuracy, we propose the Monte-Carlo Critic (MC-Critic), a plug-and-play auxiliary value estimator designed to enhance policy-gradient algorithms like PPO and GRPO. By leveraging lightweight environment rollouts to calibrate value estimates, MC-Critic provides a low-variance signal that facilitates stable policy optimization without relying on expensive model-based value approximation. Experiments on both stochastic (e.g., 2048) and deterministic (e.g., Sokoban) environments demonstrate that ProAct significantly improves planning accuracy. Notably, a 4B parameter model trained with ProAct outperforms all open-source baselines and rivals state-of-the-art closed-source models, while demonstrating robust generalization to unseen environments. The codes and models are available at https://github.com/GreatX3/ProAct

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种名为ProAct的框架，通过两阶段训练（Grounded LookAhead Distillation 和 Monte-Carlo Critic）来提升大型语言模型（LLM）在需要长远规划的交互式环境中的表现，有效解决了现有模型在长远规划中存在的误差累积问题。
AI.motivation: 现有的大型语言模型（LLM）在需要长远规划的交互式环境中表现不佳，主要原因是模拟未来状态时误差会不断累积。为了解决这个问题，研究者提出了ProAct框架。
AI.method: ProAct框架采用两阶段训练：1. Grounded LookAhead Distillation (GLAD)，通过对基于环境搜索的轨迹进行监督微调，将复杂的搜索树压缩为简洁的因果推理链，使模型在不依赖推理时搜索的计算开销的情况下学习预见能力。2. Monte-Carlo Critic (MC-Critic)，一种即插即用的辅助价值估计器，用于增强PPO和GRPO等策略梯度算法。它利用轻量级的环境模拟来校准价值估计，提供低方差信号，稳定策略优化。
AI.result: 在随机（如2048）和确定性（如Sokoban）环境的实验表明，ProAct显著提高了规划准确性。特别是，使用ProAct训练的40亿参数模型超越了所有开源基线模型，并可与最先进的闭源模型相媲美，同时表现出对未见过环境的鲁棒泛化能力。
AI.conclusion: ProAct框架通过Grounded LookAhead Distillation和Monte-Carlo Critic的结合，能够有效提升LLM在长远规划任务中的性能，克服了现有方法的局限性，并在多种环境中展现出优越的性能和泛化能力。

title: FlashBlock: Attention Caching for Efficient Long-Context Block Diffusion
summary: Generating long-form content, such as minute-long videos and extended texts, is increasingly important for modern generative models. Block diffusion improves inference efficiency via KV caching and block-wise causal inference and has been widely adopted in diffusion language models and video generation. However, in long-context settings, block diffusion still incurs substantial overhead from repeatedly computing attention over a growing KV cache. We identify an underexplored property of block diffusion: cross-step redundancy of attention within a block. Our analysis shows that attention outputs from tokens outside the current block remain largely stable across diffusion steps, while block-internal attention varies significantly. Based on this observation, we propose FlashBlock, a cached block-external attention mechanism that reuses stable attention output, reducing attention computation and KV cache access without modifying the diffusion process. Moreover, FlashBlock is orthogonal to sparse attention and can be combined as a complementary residual reuse strategy, substantially improving model accuracy under aggressive sparsification. Experiments on diffusion language models and video generation demonstrate up to 1.44$\times$ higher token throughput and up to 1.6$\times$ reduction in attention time, with negligible impact on generation quality. Project page: https://caesarhhh.github.io/FlashBlock/.

AI.tldr: 提出FlashBlock，一种缓存块外部注意力机制，通过重用稳定的注意力输出来减少计算量和KV缓存访问，从而提高长文本和视频生成效率，且不影响生成质量。
AI.motivation: 现有块扩散模型在长上下文生成中，由于重复计算注意力以及不断增长的KV缓存，仍然存在显著的开销。作者观察到块扩散中的一个未被充分利用的特性：块内注意力的跨步冗余。
AI.method: 提出FlashBlock，一种缓存块外部注意力机制。该机制重用块外部注意力计算中稳定的输出，从而减少了注意力计算和KV缓存的访问，同时不修改扩散过程。FlashBlock可以与稀疏注意力结合使用，作为一种互补的残差重用策略。
AI.result: 在扩散语言模型和视频生成实验中，FlashBlock实现了高达1.44倍的token吞吐量提升和高达1.6倍的注意力时间缩减，同时对生成质量几乎没有影响。与稀疏注意力结合时，能够显著提高模型在激进稀疏化下的准确性。
AI.conclusion: FlashBlock是一种有效的缓存块外部注意力机制，能够显著提高长文本和视频生成效率，并且不损害生成质量，同时还可以作为稀疏注意力机制的补充，提升其性能。

title: Late-to-Early Training: LET LLMs Learn Earlier, So Faster and Better
summary: As Large Language Models (LLMs) achieve remarkable empirical success through scaling model and data size, pretraining has become increasingly critical yet computationally prohibitive, hindering rapid development. Despite the availability of numerous pretrained LLMs developed at significant computational expense, a fundamental real-world question remains underexplored: \textit{Can we leverage existing small pretrained models to accelerate the training of larger models?} In this paper, we propose a Late-to-Early Training (LET) paradigm that enables LLMs to explicitly learn later knowledge in earlier steps and earlier layers. The core idea is to guide the early layers of an LLM during early training using representations from the late layers of a pretrained (i.e. late training phase) model. We identify two key mechanisms that drive LET's effectiveness: late-to-early-step learning and late-to-early-layer learning. These mechanisms significantly accelerate training convergence while robustly enhancing both language modeling capabilities and downstream task performance, enabling faster training with superior performance. Extensive experiments on 1.4B and 7B parameter models demonstrate LET's efficiency and effectiveness. Notably, when training a 1.4B LLM on the Pile dataset, our method achieves up to 1.6$\times$ speedup with nearly 5\% improvement in downstream task accuracy compared to standard training, even when using a pretrained model with 10$\times$ fewer parameters than the target model.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种 late-to-early training (LET) 范式，利用预训练模型的晚期知识来加速和改进大型语言模型 (LLM) 的早期训练，取得了显著的训练速度提升和下游任务性能改善。
AI.motivation: 现有的大型语言模型预训练成本高昂，阻碍了其快速发展。文章旨在探索如何利用已有的、计算成本较低的小型预训练模型来加速更大模型的训练。
AI.method: LET 范式通过将预训练模型的晚期层表示引导至目标模型（更大模型）的早期层，并在早期训练步骤中实现“晚到早”的学习（late-to-early-step learning）和“晚到早”的层间知识传递（late-to-early-layer learning），从而加速收敛并提升性能。
AI.result: 在 1.4B 和 7B 参数的模型上进行了实验，结果表明 LET 方法在训练 1.4B LLM 时，相较于标准训练，训练速度最高可提升 1.6 倍，同时下游任务准确率提高近 5%。即使使用参数量为目标模型十分之一的预训练模型，LET 依然有效。
AI.conclusion: LET 范式能够有效地利用预训练模型的晚期知识来加速大型语言模型的训练，并在不牺牲或提升性能的情况下显著提高训练效率，为 LLM 的开发提供了一种有前景的方法。

title: PieArena: Frontier Language Agents Achieve MBA-Level Negotiation Performance and Reveal Novel Behavioral Differences
summary: We present an in-depth evaluation of LLMs' ability to negotiate, a central business task that requires strategic reasoning, theory of mind, and economic value creation. To do so, we introduce PieArena, a large-scale negotiation benchmark grounded in multi-agent interactions over realistic scenarios drawn from an MBA negotiation course at an elite business school. We find systematic evidence of AGI-level performance in which a representative frontier agent (GPT-5) matches or outperforms trained business-school students, despite a semester of general negotiation instruction and targeted coaching immediately prior to the task. We further study the effects of joint-intentionality agentic scaffolding and find asymmetric gains, with large improvements for mid- and lower-tier LMs and diminishing returns for frontier LMs. Beyond deal outcomes, PieArena provides a multi-dimensional negotiation behavioral profile, revealing novel cross-model heterogeneity, masked by deal-outcome-only benchmarks, in deception, computation accuracy, instruction compliance, and perceived reputation. Overall, our results suggest that frontier language agents are already intellectually and psychologically capable of deployment in high-stakes economic settings, but deficiencies in robustness and trustworthiness remain open challenges.

AI.tldr: 本文评估了大型语言模型（LLMs）在谈判任务中的能力，并引入了一个名为PieArena的大规模谈判基准。研究发现，前沿LLM（如GPT-5）在谈判表现上可与顶尖商学院学生匹敌，甚至超越。同时，研究还探讨了联合意图性代理脚手架的效果，并发现它能显著提升中低层LLM的性能。此外，PieArena通过多维度行为剖析，揭示了模型在欺骗、计算准确性、指令遵从和声誉感知等方面的差异。结论是，前沿LLM在智力和心理上已具备在高风险经济环境中部署的能力，但在鲁棒性和可信度方面仍需改进。
AI.motivation: 评估大型语言模型（LLMs）在需要战略推理、心智理论和经济价值创造的复杂商业任务——谈判——中的能力。
AI.method: 引入了一个名为PieArena的大规模谈判基准，该基准基于来自精英商学院MBA谈判课程的真实场景中的多智能体交互。通过让LLM与学生进行谈判，并分析谈判结果和行为特征来评估LLMs的能力。研究还探究了联合意图性代理脚手架对不同层级LLMs的影响。
AI.result: 一个代表性的前沿LLM（GPT-5）在谈判任务中匹配或超越了经过MBA谈判课程培训并接受过即时指导的商学院学生。联合意图性代理脚手架对中低层LLMs的性能有显著提升，而对前沿LLMs的提升效果递减。PieArena展示了模型在欺骗、计算准确性、指令遵从和声誉感知等方面的异质性。
AI.conclusion: 前沿LLM在智力和心理上已经能够胜任高风险的经济谈判场景，但其在鲁棒性和可信度方面仍存在挑战，需要进一步的研究和开发。

title: Wid3R: Wide Field-of-View 3D Reconstruction via Camera Model Conditioning
summary: We present Wid3R, a feed-forward neural network for visual geometry reconstruction that supports wide field-of-view camera models.
